Paint Room Escape is a puzzle escape game where creativity is key to finding your way out of a room with four walls, a desk, a shelf, an air conditioner, a safe, and a locked door. The only way out is to problem-solve your way to freedom by solving riddles using colors, paints, and painting tools that can be found throughout the room. Each clue will lead to the next, until finally, your colorful journey leads you to an exit.

How to Play Paint Room Escape

In Paint Room Escape, your objective is to unlock doors by solving color-based puzzles. One of the first tasks is to paint the colorless door using hints scattered throughout the room. Search for items like palettes and pencil holders and get guided into selecting the correct colors. For example, one puzzle requires painting a door with specific color patterns by observing how circles and squares are divided on a palette. As you progress, different combinations of colors help you unlock new areas and doors, with red and yellow paint being crucial early on.

As you move through the rooms, you will come across more complex puzzles. In one scenario, you must rotate color samples and match a sequence of pale blue to dark blue shades. You'll also encounter digit-based locks, like a door that requires entering a secret code to unlock.

Completing these challenges rewards you with items such as paint tubes, allowing you to progress by filling in corresponding door sections. New color clues emerge as you rinse objects in water, revealing hidden numbers and hints for further puzzles.

Manipulating various tools, such as temperature controls and stencils, adds even more challenging layers of complexity. At one point, you must adjust the temperature to paint the door a certain color, then adjust it once more to switch to another color.

One of the final challenges involves arranging pencils, rotating objects, and solving shape-based puzzles to activate switches and unlock the exit door. Mixing colors like blue and yellow to create green and using a screwdriver to access hidden compartments are essential steps to achieving your ultimate creative goal—escape by color!

More Games Like This

Want more puzzle game fun? Try some of our popular games like Zoom Boom, a fun animal-themed match-3 game with a mission-based style; Candy Riddles, a puzzle match-3 game where you match cookies, donuts, ice creams, and more to rack up points and progress through challenging levels; or Fairyland Merge & Magic, a casual merge game where every move you make has the power to shape your own whimsical world. Check out more of our escape games as well!

Mirror Room Escape is a puzzle adventure where you must navigate a mysterious room filled with reflective illusions. Solve intricate challenges by deciphering clues hidden within the mirrors, and testing your wits and perception. Every step unveils secrets and unexpected twists as you race against time to unlock the path to freedom. Will you outsmart the reflections?

How to Play Mirror Escape Room

Step into a room filled with mirrors and intricate puzzles, where every reflection holds a clue. Your goal is to decipher the hidden patterns, align the mirrors correctly, and unlock the path to escape.

This first-person pov game will have you nudging at door knobs and circling the room looking for the next clue.

Start by analyzing the mirror with digit tiles: observe how numbers reflect and use them to crack the passcode. As you progress, you'll encounter color-coded symbols, stepping platforms, and a locked drawer requiring precise rotations. Each puzzle builds upon the last, challenging you to interpret mirrored hints, decipher sequences, and manipulate objects strategically.

Use collected mirrors to reveal new clues, unlock compartments, and align reflections. Rotate objects according to their mirrored angles, match colors based on their reflections, and follow step-by-step sequences to activate hidden mechanisms. Keep an eye on details like the positioning of arrows, reflections of letters, and the direction of laser beams bouncing off mirrors.

With each successful puzzle solved, you'll gather keys, tools, and hints leading you closer to the final escape. Precision, observation, and logical thinking will guide you through this mind-bending mirrored maze.

More Games Like This

There are plenty more puzzle games for you to explore. Try some from our Match 3 catalog like Zoo Boom, Candy Riddles, or Mergest Kingdom. Other fun puzzle games include Mahjong Online, Mahjongg Solitaire, and Mahjongg, all in our Mahjong category.

Controls

Use the left mouse button to play.

Chessformer is a challenging puzzle arcade game where your movements are confined to the chess piece you're given. Use your chess pieces' unique abilities to navigate through each stage and reach the king.

How to Play Chessformer
Chess piece movements

Chessformer utilizes the movement principles of chess pieces to overcome various challenges on a 2D grid. That means rooks move only in straight lines, bishops only move diagonally, etc. The difference is that you're moving sideways, so moving your piece up the board also causes it to fall.

Tricky challenges

Chessformer gives you an easy introduction to how the game works, with the first few levels being quite simple. However, the difficulty quickly increases. You'll have to get your problem-solving cap on and think creatively to progress through the levels.

More Games Like This

Chessformer isn't your typical chess game. If you want to play chess, head to our chess games, where you'll find plenty more. For similar classic puzzle games, check out titles like Classic Solitaire, Mahjongg, Uno Online, and Sudoku.

Features
Clever mechanics based on chess pieces
Movement confined to a chessboard grid
24 challenging levels put your mind to work
Satisfying visuals, sounds, and music

Click (or touch) on pieces to select, then click to move them.

FAQ
How to play Chessformer?

Each piece in Chessformer follows its traditional movement rules: rooks in straight lines, bishops diagonally, and so on. The twist is that you navigate sideways, so moving a piece upward also shifts its position downward on the board.

How many levels are there in Chessformer?

There are 48 levels in Chessformer.

Growmi is a platformer puzzle game where you solve puzzles to regain power. Your character has a limited set of moves that increase over time as you clear more areas of the game. Show the world how smart your Growmi is and complete the game!

How to Play
Limited moves

Follow the game’s instructions to grasp the basics at the start. Your character is a slime that can only move a limited number of times when off the ground. That makes certain moves more challenging, and you’ll have to plan ahead to figure out how to complete each task.

Learn how to Growmi

Once you overcome the initial difficulty of thinking like a Growmi, it does get easier. If you get stuck, use the hints button in the bottom right corner to show you how to complete the challenge correctly. Once you see how it works, your skills will definitely improve.

Fix your mistakes

Every new area has a unique challenge to keep you on your toes, and it keeps the game engaging for you. Sometimes, you might need to restart the challenge by clicking R, or undo a previous move with U. That’s because some actions can’t be fixed without taking a step back!

Progress through the game to unlock more abilities and a longer Growmi!

More puzzles to play

If you enjoy a stimulating brain-busting challenge, check out more of our puzzle games. Cups Water Sort Puzzle is another tricky but super fun challenge, and Rope Color Sort 3D poses similar puzzles to solve.

Features
Clever challenges to make you think
Various unique puzzles throughout the game
Cute and colorful pixel-art aesthetic
Become a better Growmi as you progress

Green is a challenging puzzle game made by Bart Bonte. Like his previous games, black and blue, you must turn the whole screen a single color by solving the puzzle. This time the color is green. Have fun!

How to Play Green

Each level on Green comes with a new and novel puzzle to complete. The puzzles don't follow any predictable mechanics, meaning you have to figure out how each unique puzzle works. The only constant requirement is that you turn the whole screen green.

If you get stuck on any level, click the lightbulb in the top right for hints. Each time you click, you get a more obvious clue.

There are 25 levels of increasing complexity in Green. How long will it take you to solve them all?

More Puzzle Games

If you enjoy playing clever and innovative puzzle games try any of the 100s of games available to play for free on CrazyGames. Two other popular games in this category are Emoji Puzzle and Little Alchemy 2.

Crimson Room is an escape room game originally developed in Flash. It was one of the first of its kind. Toshimitsu Takagi developed the game in 2004 and helped to popularize the escape room genre. To play the game, simply point and click. See if you can escape the Crimson Room!
Safe Password

The game directs you to a certain URL to get the password to the safe. The URL no longer exists, but the password is '1994'.

How to Play Crimson Room

You wake up in a Crimson Room, suffering from retrograde amnesia. You don't know where you are, or how you got there. All you know is that you need to escape this mysterious red room.

The objective is simple. Find the key to the door and escape. Search for clues around the room and look for clues that help you reach your goal of escaping.

Escape Room Games

Do you love a challenge? Escape rooms are great for logical, puzzle-solvers. You'll find plenty of them in our Escape Games collection. Many escape room games feature an element of horror, like House of Celestina. For a less frightening alternative, check out Space Museum Escape.

Release Date
2004
Developer
Crimson Room was made by Toshimitsu Takagi.

Web browser

Timberland Arrange Puzzle Game is a logic puzzle game where you need to place three foxes, three owls, and three elephants on a 3x3 grid. Each animal must be in a specific spot, and they should be colored in three different colors. This game is suitable for both children and adults, offering a relaxing experience while enhancing your logical thinking. Arrange and color animals in this addictive game that blends classic Tag and Sudoku elements. Each level challenges you to solve puzzles by finding intersections between different hints, with the difficulty increasing as you progress. Enjoy the vibrant hand-drawn graphics, soothing nature sounds, and cheerful animal cries. With over 120 levels and a variety of mechanics, you'll encounter unexpected challenges that will test your skills. This game will sharpen your mind and provide a meditative escape, making it a perfect balance of fun and mental exercise.

How to Play
The goal is to find a suitable place for each animal on the field and paint them in 3 colors, finding intersections between different types of hints.
Use the left mouse button to select the animals, then click on the cell to carve the animal on stone.
Choose a color, click on the carved animal to brush color to it, and it will come to life!
If you can't pass the level, then don't worry! After viewing a short ad, you will receive a new clue.
If you want to clear your head, just arrange the animals and color them according to the prompts. Or arrange a workout and solve everything yourself to keep your mind in good shape!
Features
Marking of used hints. If you have already installed animals on the field and painted them, mark the hint.
You can erase any animal or color that is in the wrong place.

Voxorp is a thrilling multiplayer spaceship battle game that challenges you to mine, upgrade, and dominate the galaxy. Collect resources to gain experience points (XP) and level up your ship. Each level unlocks new ships and modules—offering unique abilities like mining, attacking, or boosting speed. To equip a module, simply drag it from your inventory into one of your ship’s module slots. Customizing your ship’s loadout allows you to adapt to different strategies and playstyles.

To climb the leaderboard, you’ll need to build and protect your base. Use the toolbar at the bottom of the screen to access different building types, each with its own cost and function. Make sure you’ve mined enough resources before constructing anything, then drag and drop buildings onto the map grid.

Dynamo: The heart of your base, powering nearby tiles when fueled. Click it or drag a resource to it to supply power.
Scorer: Generates leaderboard points over time, but only when powered by a nearby Dynamo.
Turrets: Automatically defend your base against enemies, but require power to function.
Walls: Strong, low-cost defenses ideal for protecting your core structures.

Stay alert! Other players can attack your base at any time! If your ship is destroyed, you’ll lose everything: your modules, inventory, and progress. On the flip side, defeating other players earns you valuable XP.

Strategy Tips
Focus on leveling up your ship first before building a base. A stronger ship makes resource collection faster and safer.
Experiment with modules. You can freely swap them out to match your current objectives.
Use the edges of the map as natural defenses for your base, but keep in mind that resources are scarcer there.

Master resource management, smart base-building, and tactical ship upgrades to become the top pilot in Voxorp!

Last Updated

Oct 28, 2025

Controls
WASD / arrow keys = move around
Hold the left mouse button on resources = mine resources
Drag the left mouse button = drag modules from your inventory into your ship

Mini Games Quiz is a fast-paced trivia game that reimagines what a quiz can be. Forget the boring multiple-choice routine of picking A, B, C, or D. This game isn’t about memorizing dates or random facts nobody cares about. Instead, it challenges your reflexes, precision, and quick thinking through fun and unpredictable mini-games.

Cut a pizza into equal slices, guess a battery’s charge just by looking at it, stop a timer at exactly 00:00, locate cities on a world map, or find the odd emoji in a crowd of identical ones. Every question is an interactive challenge that keeps you engaged from start to finish.

Want to compete with friends? Create a custom match, invite them, and watch the chaos unfold as they try to draw a perfect circle or click a moving mouse ten times in a row. You can even add bots for extra competition. Each match has ten mini-games, and you’ll earn up to 100 points per round based on your speed and accuracy, so every second counts.

If you’re feeling competitive, jump into ranked mode and climb the leaderboard. The higher your rank, the tougher your opponents become, with quicker reflexes and sharper focus. Whether you’re chasing the top spot or just having fun with friends, Mini Games Quiz is a fast, challenging, and entertaining experience where every match is packed with excitement.

Cozy Golf is a relaxing golf adventure that invites you to unwind across beautifully designed courses filled with charm and color. You’ll perfect your swing, line up satisfying shots, and enjoy a calm atmosphere backed by soothing music. Easy to learn yet delightfully challenging, it’s the ideal escape for anyone who loves precision and peaceful competition.

Features
Beautiful Courses: Explore 3 unique courses, each with 9 handcrafted holes (27 in total). And look out for more courses in future updates!
Star-Based Progression: Master each hole by aiming for Par or better! You'll earn 3 stars for being under par, 2 stars for par, and 1 star for a bogey. Use your collected stars to unlock new courses and take on fresh challenges.
Relaxing Atmosphere: Enjoy a calm soundtrack, satisfying sound effects, and lovely animations that make every shot, splash, and hole-in-one a delight.
Player-Friendly Design: Get the perfect overview with a switchable bird's-eye camera. Made a mistake? No problem! Use the handy "undo" button to retry your last shot.
Guide
Click and hold the golf ball.
Drag downwards and away from the ball. A trajectory line will appear.
The distance you drag determines the power of your shot.
The direction you drag (left or right) sets your aim.
At the end of the trajectory, you'll see an accuracy indicator with a moving arrow. To hit the ball straight, release the mouse button (or your finger) when the arrow is exactly in the center. Releasing it off-center will cause your shot to curve left or right.
Camera View (Top-Left): Tap the icon to toggle between the standard 3D view and a top-down bird's-eye view for a better look at the hole.
Undo Shot (Bottom-Right): Next to the Par info, this button lets you take back your last stroke and try again.
Menu (Top-Right): Access the menu to restart the current hole, adjust sound and music settings, or exit to the course selection screen.

Controls

Spider Solitaire is a timeless card puzzle where strategy and precision lead to victory. Arrange cards in descending order from King to Ace within the same suit to clear the tableau. Move and stack cards carefully to reveal hidden ones, planning each move to minimize mistakes. When all suits are completed and the table is cleared, you win the game. Aim for the fewest moves to earn the highest score.

Game Type

Spider Solitaire can be played with 3 types of suits:

1-Suit is played with only one suit (Spades).
2-Suit is played with two suits (Spades and Hearts).
4-Suit is played with four suits (Spades, Hearts, Clubs, and Diamonds).

All Suit Games follow Spider Solitaire Classic rules. Do you like classic and fun games? Do you enjoy playing other types of solitaire like Klondike, Pyramid solitaire, and FreeCell solitaire?

Features
Clean and user-friendly designs.
Big and easy-to-see cards.
Drag and drop functionality for moving cards.
Beautiful Spider Solitaire experience inspired by the classic Solitaire game.- Unlimited undo feature.
Unlimited smart Hint assistance.
Landscape orientation support.
Card highlighting to indicate movable cards.
3 suit varieties: 1 suit (Easy), 2 suits (Medium), and 4 suits (Hard).
Mixed suit Option to complete a row even if all the cards are not from the same suit.
Realistic card sound effects.
Phone and tablet support for an optimal gaming experience.
Statistics page displaying the best score and best moves.

Age of Steam Tower Defense is a steampunk-inspired strategy game where brass, gears, and gunpowder power your fight for survival. You’ll construct intricate defenses, balance your resources, and face waves of increasingly fierce enemies. Each battle tests your planning and precision as you defend your mechanical realm against unstoppable forces of chaos.

In Age of Steam Tower Defence, you command a line of clockwork-era fortifications against waves of hostile units determined to breach your HQ. Place and combine a variety of distinct towers ranging from classic artillery to experimental energy weapons, each with clear strengths, trade-offs, and optimal placements. Every decision matters: funnel enemies through chokepoints, cover long lanes with precision weapons, and reserve splash damage for clustered formations. Start from a quiet map, press Play, and watch as each wave escalates the tension and tests your strategy.

Choose from multiple handcrafted maps: arid canyons, river crossings, and mountainous passes, each emphasizing different tactics. Save your favorite setups and experiment with new layouts to perfect your approach. A clean UI, readable combat feedback, and thematic audio round out a focused, replayable experience designed for fast iteration and satisfying victories.

Features
Strategic tower placement: Layer ranges, coverage, and synergies to shape enemy paths and maximize damage.
Distinct tower roster: Field over a dozen unique defenses, including Ballista, Cannon, Howitzer, Rifle, Gattling Gun, Crossbow, Laser, Plasma Cannon, Mortar, Tesla, Storm, Radar, and more.
Enemy variety: Defend against infantry, steam riders, steam tanks, tesla droids, clockwork beasts, blimps, and massive leviathans, each with different speed, armor, and threat profiles.
Multiple maps: Tackle different terrain types such as arid deserts, river crossings, and mountain halls, each changing sightlines, chokepoints, and tactics.
Wave-based escalation: Press Start to trigger the next wave; enemies scale up in composition and challenge.
Clean UI with quick actions: One-click wave control, funds, and HQ health indicators, and a focused build sidebar for fast decision-making.Sound options: Master, music, and SFX volume sliders so you can dial in the experience.
Play instantly: Runs in modern desktop browsers—no installation or account required.
How to play
Open the game in your browser and wait for assets to finish loading, then press Play.
Pick a map via the Map button if you want a different battlefield; you can also save/load setups.
Build your defenses from the sidebar; place towers to cover lanes and chokepoints.
Start the next wave with the Wave button; earn funds by surviving and expand your defenses.
Protect your HQ: If its HP hits zero, the war is lost.
Controls

Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

FrontWars.io is a multiplayer .io battle game where players battle it out to dominate as much of the globe as possible. You begin small and slowly work your way to conquer the world. Take control of 72% of the map, and victory is yours.

How to Play Front Wars

Front Wars is a real-time strategy game where you go to war with other players in an attempt to expand your territory and protect your people. The game panels are pretty intricate and give you a lot of info to keep track of attacks and alliances. Use these wisely to plan your next moves.

The Event Panel shows everything happening in the game. You’ll see alliance requests, incoming attacks, and Quick Chat messages. You can focus on a player sending an alliance request, track incoming attacks, and retreat troops if needed, though this costs 25 percent of your attacking troops. Boats can return to their starting point if the land has changed hands, but nukes cannot be recalled. Quick Chat makes it easy to send preset messages or emojis to allies and opponents.

Alliances are important. You can send or receive troops and gold to help your allies, whether they are under attack or building up their strength. Betraying an ally ends the alliance, pauses trade for a few minutes, and leaves you with weaker defenses. You’ll also be marked as a traitor for 30 seconds, so think carefully before making a move. Bots and human players react differently depending on your actions, so diplomacy matters.

The Radial Menu is your main control hub. Right-click a location to build, attack, send boats, request alliances, or betray an ally. The Options Panel lets you pause or unpause the game, check the timer, access settings, and see detailed information about other players. Hover over a country to see if it’s a human, a smart AI, or a bot, and find out how they feel about you.

The Game UI helps you track your progress. The leaderboard shows top players by land, troops, and gold, while the control panel lets you adjust your attack ratios. Icons tell you who is an ally, a traitor, or has stopped trading, which helps with planning your next move.

Buildings and Units in Front Wars
City: Increases population and lets you expand your territory
Defense Post: Protects borders, slows enemy attacks, and increases enemy losses
Port: Lets you build Warships and trade with other ports, either automatically or manually
Warship: Patrols water, intercepts enemy trade ships, and attacks enemy vessels
Missile Silo: Launches atomic, hydrogen, or MIRV bombs
SAM Launcher: Intercepts enemy missiles with different success depending on the type of bomb

Bombs have different effects. Atom Bombs cause localized destruction, Hydrogen Bombs hit larger areas, and MIRVs split to hit multiple points, affecting only the player you targeted.

Interacting with other players is simple:

Chat messages and emojis let you communicate quickly
Target markers help coordinate attacks with allies
Alliance requests grow your network of support

Tips

Always try to help allies with troops or gold to strengthen relationships. Focusing on building relationships in Front Wars is key to winning.

More Games Like This

Check out our .io category for more battle games like this one. Try 1v1 LOL, Diep.io, or Smash Karts, and continue the fun!

Controls
Space = alternate view (terrain/countries)
Shift + Left Mouse Button = attack (when left click is set to open menu)
Cmd + Left Mouse Button = open build menu
\ + Left Mouse Button = open emote menu
C = Center camera on player
Q / E = Zoom in/out
WASD = move camera
1 / 2 = decrease/increase attack ratio
Shift + Mouse Wheel Up/Down = decrease/increase attack ratio
\ + R = reset graphics
Middle Mouse Button → Auto-upgrade nearest building
FAQ
Do military games still exist?

Military games sure do exist. Front Wars is a classic battle io game, ideal for strategy seekers.

Can I play Front Wars on my phone?

Front Wars is available on mobile, as well as desktop and Steam.

Once you're equipped, you'll need to locate the weather drone. But how do you find it?

EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

How to Play EvoWars.io

Embark on an epic quest across the digital battlefield, where you’ll collect powerful orbs to evolve your warrior into unstoppable forms. As you slash through enemies with swords, axes, and a brutal arsenal of weapons, each battle pushes you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. With more than 15 unique character models to unlock, your journey is one of constant evolution and power.

You control a constantly advancing warrior with your mouse, swinging your weapon to defeat enemies and collect XP to evolve into stronger forms with bigger weapons and greater attack range. As you play, you'll unlock more evolutions and customize your warrior with different weapons and gear to eliminate all other fighters on the field while growing stronger.

As you accumulate points, you will be able to upgrade gameplay dynamics. It will take some time to reach your desired destination. It's not the easiest game to master.

The key to this 2D top-down game is winning battles. Each victory allows you to grow stronger, but the battlefield isn’t just about brute strength; you’ll need to define your play style and use every opportunity to outmaneuver your enemies. Whether you’re charging headfirst into combat or taking a more tactical approach, dominance is at your fingertips.

There is a very large online community around EvoWars.io and when playing it you'll face opponents from every part of the world: it is particularly popular in Vietnam, where it is one of the most popular browser games.

Game modes in EwoWars.io
Deatmatch: Free For All, the classic Battle Royale mode where everyone is an enemy
Teams: you are part of one of the two teams, either red or blue, and your objective is to defend the team’s Guardian while defeating enemies and, ultimately, the enemy’s Guardian
Duel: a 1 vs 1 match with a random opponent. You and they both start at a random level. The first to win three duels wins the match
Monster Hunt: a cooperative mode where you and the other players face hordes of AI-controlled monsters
Classic: it’s the old version of EvoWars
Tips
Focus on collecting orbs around the outside of the map when you are at a low level rather than battling against other players.
Your weapon range improves as you grow larger, but you also become slower, so remember to remain cautious and alert.
When you're smaller, you can move faster; use this to your advantage and play more evasively at lower levels
Features
Intense slashing gameplay to eliminate opponents
You can level up to increase the size and evolve to more than 15 character models
Define your play style and use every opportunity as much as possible
Sprint ability at the cost of your experience points
More IO game action

If you like EvoWars, make sure to try our other smash hit .io games, such as Agar.io, and ZombsRoyale.io.

If you are up for something different, try Sprunki or Friday Night Funkin', instead.

Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be.

How to Play Space Waves

All 33 levels of Space Waves more or less have the same scope – get to the end of the level without crashing your arrow into a wall, a rotating cog or thorns. Each level has its own degree of difficulty.

If you choose a “green” level, you’ll be met with wider space and angles, making it possible to gain some straight momentum with your arrow. As you choose more difficult levels, you can expect more obstacles, tighter angles and more of them.

Space Waves allows you to choose any level you want to play, so you can start with the most difficult which can quickly give you a sense of the need for quick reaction times.

Tips and Tricks

Move in a zigzag when obstacles are ahead, as this will give you the momentum of a straight line trajectory.

Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

How to Play Smash Karts
Battle and earn XP

Face off with other players in the arena for 3 minutes of kart-smashing mayhem. The game features several maps to explore, and it is continually updated with new ones. Each public match you play will give you XP, which you can then use to level up. 

Leveling up will reward you with coins, hats, wheels, and character tokens. You can use character tokens in the prize machine to unlock new characters with varying rarity levels.

Pick up weapons

Drive over the boxes containing question marks to pick up random weapons and power-ups. You’ll find anything from invincibility to missiles, machine guns, and mines to use against your opponents. Get in your kart and cause some chaos!

Available Weapons

Rockets: fairly straightforward, helpful for hitting opponents in front of you.
Machine Gun: it rapidly fires several projectiles and can take down enemies around you, as long as you are close by.
Bullets: with these, you’ll fire a series of bullets that will go straight from your position. It can be useful to fire at enemies in crowded contexts or on long, straight alleys.
Mines: you can deploy three mines that serve as a static trap for your challengers. Mines are particularly effective when placed around corners or hidden behind item boxes.
Cannonballs: using this will send four cannonballs in the direction of your choice. Cannonballs require precision to be effective, but can eliminate multiple adversaries simultaneously.
Spiky-Go-Round: activating the spiky-go-round will add rotating balls with spikes to your vehicle, which will make any contact with opponents lethal for them.
Nuke: a very powerful missile that has a wide impact radius.
Lobgrenuke: with a lobgrenuke you are placing a TNT-like static bomb on the ground. It gets activated when one of your enemies passes nearby or a few seconds after deployment.
Snowball Blaster: fires ice at opponents and blocks them for 3 seconds in a block of ice. Touching this block while active will eliminate the kart containing it.
Invincibility: the most powerful of all weapons, allows you to neutralize any shot aimed at you and, at the same time, to take down any kart by simply touching it.
Customize your kart!

Choose between a selection of wacky little characters and karts. You can customize your kart and characters in the customize menu. There, you’ll find a selection of karts, characters, hats, and holiday items! Use your coins, character tokens, and gems to buy various in-game items.

Play in events

Various seasonal events occur throughout the year, so make sure to come back and play Smash Karts at special times of year for new content. New maps are available around Halloween, Christmas, and other festive occasions, and you can reap unique rewards.

More Games Like This

Kart games like SmashKarts.io combine two awesome game modes: deathmatch arena and kart driving.

Agar.io is another popular game that challenges players to compete against online opponents in multiplayer mode. For easier driving options, you can try playing Eggy Car or Snow Rider.

Features
Action-packed multiplayer kart battles
Level up, earn coins, and save your stats
Several weapons, from miniguns to bombs!
Customizable karts and characters

Fish Orbit is a casual fishing game where you cast your hook into the depths of the ocean and even beyond! Explore the underwater world and its legendary fish to unlock a variety of unique characters. Your goal is to become the most excellent fisher on the planet. Get ready for surprises in every layer of the deep, as they get bigger and bigger.

How to Play Fish Orbit

Fish Orbit is a fast-paced fishing game where each cast takes you deeper into the ocean. Drop your line, reel in exotic catches, and unlock new characters as you work toward becoming the ultimate fisher. Every layer of the sea holds surprises, from schools of small fish to rare creatures hidden in the depths.

Your goal is to cast your line as far and deep as possible. Timing is crucial. Tap when the color bar hits green to launch your line at maximum power, yellow for a solid throw, and red for a weak cast. Once your hook is in the water, keep tapping to push it deeper and uncover new species.

Four key stats that influence your fishing include strength, weight, rebound, and resistance. They determine how far your hook travels, how deep it sinks, and how many fish you can bring in with a single cast.

Upgrades drive your progress. Boost strength for longer throws, increase weight for deeper dives, upgrade rebound for better water bounces, and up the resistance to pull in more fish at once. Unlock new zones, collect rare catches, and expand your character roster as you advance.

To accelerate progress, watch ads to earn extra rewards and invest them in upgrades. With patience and careful upgrades, you can steadily work your way to fishing mastery.

More Games Like This

We have plenty of games to keep you entertained. Browse our casual category and queue up games like Snow Rider 3D, which will put you in a completely different environment, from water to snow. Or stick with a classic like Bubble Shooter, and match your way to success. Other fun games include Little Alchemy and Little Alchemy 2.

Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

How to Play Bloxd.io

Bloxd.io is a sandbox game in which you navigate challenging obstacle courses by timing your jumps and movements accurately. In survival mode, you gather resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to stay alive. There are several game modes to choose from to start the game, each with a variety of challenges.

Bloxd.io Game Modes

Choose from one of the many game modes to begin your Bloxd.io journey.

BloxdHop.io

In the BloxdHop game mode your mission is to reach the end of the map within the given timeframe. To reach the end, you must hop through the level parkour-style onto blocks of various sizes.

DoodleCube

This game mode is similar to drawing games like Gartic.io. Players create objects based on the theme presented, and other users vote on how representative they are of that object.

EvilTower

The mission is to reach the top of the Evil Tower! Similar to BloxdHop, you use your parkour skills to reach the end. EvilTower is inspired by Roblox’s Tower of Hell.

Peaceful

Peaceful mode is like creative mode in Minecraft. You can roam freely collecting resources and building here.

CubeWarfare

This game mode adds exciting battles. Compete against other players in a third-person shooter setting where you can also build blocks.

Growden.io is an .io farming game where you manage a small plot of land, starting off with some carrot seeds and a vision for success! This community-based game is based on progressive management of your farm, so be sure to stay logged in to get the whole experience. Grow a garden from a humble carrot and tomato harvest to a gorgeous, rare plant paradise filled with blossoms, fruits, and exotic crops that showcase your farming mastery!

How to Play Growden.io

Growden is one of those games you start playing on a random evening and find yourself still playing two months later. Its rotating community rooms filled with players from all around the world, constant reward system, and continuous growth cycle make this game very hard to put down.

You start with basic $10 carrot seeds that disappear once you pick them. Then you move on to strawberry seeds for $50. Work your way up to something more uncommon, like blueberry seeds for $100, or rare seeds like tomato seeds for $800. (The rarer, the more expensive!)

How to plant seeds and harvest in Growden:
Buy seeds, then click on them in your inventory to put them in your hands.
Click on the brown plots in your farm to place them wherever you want them to grow.
Wait as your plant begins to grow. (Meet other farmers or shop as you wait!)
Once it’s fully grown, harvest by clicking E and enjoy the rewards!
Sell your plants at the shop when ready.

When you've mastered the basics of farming, you will soon find yourself itching to save for the ultimate seed (cue the music): the moon blossom, which costs tens of millions.

Everyone Wants the Moon Blossom

Before you get to the moon blossom, you’re likely going to encounter any one of these seeds: eggplant, bamboo, pepper, beanstalk, pumpkin, cacao, cauliflower, cactus, watermelon, dragonfruit, mango, coconut, nectarine, pear, avocado, banana, pinklily, pineapple, kiwi, candy blossom, cherry blossom, or sugar apple.

Slow and steady wins the farm race, but once you get a candy blossom or cherry blossom, you’re likely to reach a whole new level of farming where your earnings begin reaching six or seven figures.

The more money you have, the more you can deck out your garden. Buy eggs at the egg shop. Each garden is allowed five pets. Pets help you harvest—not too much, but considering the game allows them to harvest while idle or away, you could find yourself with interesting items in your backpack when you’re back from a break.

Only 100 items fit into your backpack, so after each harvest, be sure to go sell your goods. You can sell one thing, price your items, or sell your entire inventory. It’s always fun to price new, shiny, and one-of-a-kind fruits.

Mutated Plants

Mutations on your plants happen during weather events. Mutated plants are worth more. The types of direct mutations are: Silver, Golden, Rainbow, and BIG mutations (which make your plants HUGE; this is a very rare mutation).

There are currently 5 weather events, with more coming soon: Daytime, Nighttime, Desert, Rain, and Frosty. Grow a Garden is receiving continuous updates, which will unlock new weather events, mutations, seeds, plants, and more.

Gifts in Growden

This is a community-based game. The community is very active and includes a Discord channel. Where there is community, there is sharing. Depending on what room you are in, you can find some very generous players who gift you expensive flowers or fruits.

On the downside, there is also stealing, but this is a bit less common than kindness in these gardens. There is a chat, and if a farmer steals, you will get a notification and can call them out. Usually, a public note will deter further stealing.

Essential Tips to Grow a Garden in Growden.io
Stay logged in so you can keep your progress. If you log out and refresh your browser, you're likely going to lose your garden.
If you ever feel uncomfortable in a room, refresh your page, and it will get you to a new room.
Stay anonymous in the chat and don't give out any personal info.
More Games Like This

If you like Growden, you may want to check out our .io selection of games with classics like Agario, or go for similar graphics in Bloxd.io, or try something different like Skribbl.io.

Controls
WASD and arrow keys = move
Space = jump
E = pick up plants or talk to the seed shop/sell area
Hold the right mouse button = move the camera

Is Grow a Garden on CrazyGames?

Growden: Grow a Garden is on CrazyGames and can be played for free on desktop or mobile.

Is Grow a Garden free to play?

Yes, Grow a Garden: Growden is free to play, depending on where you play it. CrazyGames features Grow a Garden: Growden for free.

Why is Grow a Garden so addictive?

There are several reasons it's hard to put Grow a Garden down. There is a very generous reward system that incentivizes players to keep coming back, and the community in the rooms is constantly rotating, which makes each room a completely new social adventure.

Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything.

This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.

Slice Master reviewed

We really enjoyed the fun tactile slicing of this game. The sounds are just perfect. I liked how the kids had to work out which mathematical operator was the best to go for at the end of the level - "is x4 better than +60?" Also, because you play it with just one button, it was a game that the whole family could have a go at, even from the youngest of us. In fact, our grandparents also got involved and turned out to be pretty competitive.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase

How to Play Slice Master

Slice Master is a one-button game controlled by the space pad on your keyboard or the left click on your mouse. All the control lies in this one simple movement. The game has an ASMR quality, and the consistent slicing is oddly soothing to the ear.

The aim is simple: slice everything in sight: fruit, shapes, walls, furniture, and more. You can slice most things, but don’t add the white wall to your target list—it’s just a holding material for your knife.

You will get to shop along the way, using the coins accumulated to unlock sharper blades, swords, maces, and more: anything to help you slice even more!

Tips
Stay away from the pink spiked metal shapes. They are too strong for your knife and will take you straight back to the beginning of the round. Sometimes these can be found at the bottom of a pile of objects to slice, so be careful to lift your knife in time to avoid them
Hit the correct numeric target at the end of each level to multiply your points by the target number and boost your score.

FAQ
How can I earn more points in Slice Masters?

When you reach the end of the level, make sure you hit the numbered targets to multiply your points. The higher the number, the more points you will receive, so aim high.

Can I cut the white pillar in Slice Masters?

No, the white pillar can’t be cut, but you can attach it and use it as a safety net to prevent it from hitting the ground.

Can I go backwards in Slice Masters?

No, you can only go forward in Slice Masters.

How many knives can I unlock in Slice Masters?

You can unlock 9 knives in Slice Masters so keep those points coming.

Shell Shockers (Shellshock.io) is a multiplayer .io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns. You control one of these weapon-wielding eggs in one of four online game modes where the aim is to shatter your opponents with bullets and bombs. It's the ultimate online egg shooting game!

Kids love games where they shoot other players. Whatever you think about guns this seems to always be the case. We let our children play Shell Shockers before the older rating games with guns because it's a less violent way to have fun online. In fact, they enjoyed it so much that even though they are older they still go back to play this again and again.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase.

How to Play Shell Shockers

Jump into the game and select your character name, customize your egg,  and choose one of four game modes. In this game, you must work hard to protect yourself and dish out damage to opposing eggs. Try out each game mode and see if you can conquer the Shell Shockers arena. 

Tips and tricks
Play tactically
Act quickly
Collect egg ammunition
Think like an egg
Game modes
Teams

Join a team (either red or blue) and fight against the enemy eggs until your team has the most kills collectively.

Free For All

Every egg for themselves. If you see an egg, you shoot. Unless you want to be scrambled yourself. There is only one winner in this mode.

Captula the Spatula

Two teams battle for control of the spatula. The team with the spatula earns points for kills, but these can be lost if the player holding the spatula dies.

King of the Coop

King of the Coop was added in December 2021 with a host of cosmetic items and a new map. Two teams battle to capture a defined area known as the coop. The players on the winning team get 250 golden eggs each!

Weapons

There are seven main weapon types in Shell Shockers. Each weapon has its advantages and drawbacks. If you have eggcellent aim, a weapon like the Crackshot would be great. If you’re more of a spray-and-pray type, try out the Whipper. The complete weapon list for Shell Shockers is:

EggK-47 - classic medium-range automatic
Scrambler - high-damage shotgun
Free Ranger - semi-automatic sniper rifle
RPEGG - huge damage RPG
Whipper - close to medium range rapid-fire rifle
Crackshot - bolt-action sniper rifle
TriHard - accurate medium-range burst-fire rifle

Additionally, each player has an additional gun and can pick up grenades from the map.

Currency

The game uses Golden Eggs as currency; you can use them to upgrade the way your character appears in the game or the weapons it uses. Mind you, using the Golden Eggs in the shop won’t allow you to buy items that give you an advantage during combat.

If you are looking for something totally different, consider trying Bubble Shooter or 2048.

Polytrack is a classic car racing game with a slight twist. You race a car you've customized, on a track you might have designed yourself. This is a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts.

Inspired by TrackMania, it challenges you to race against the clock, constantly striving to improve your time on various tracks built by you and the Polytrack community! It doesn't get any more hands-on than that.

How to Play Polytrack

You can race on the racecourses you've designed, but it's probably easier to start with the existing ones. You not only have to think about beating your own record when it comes to time, but you also need to master the craft of building for speed and precision.

Start by creating your track using the game’s design tools or choosing from pre-made tracks. Customize the track with various obstacles, ramps, and curves to suit your preferences. Don't know exactly what track to build? Get help from the Polytrack community. There are plenty of forums that share design codes and customization tips.

With a built-in level editor, you can unleash your creativity by designing custom tracks. You can also export and share these tracks with others for endless racing (and design) fun.

The game will require time and patience, as you don't just go into it like other driving games, with your foot on the pedal and ready to rev and drift. Initially, the easiest tracks to build are straight lines, but as soon as you get the hang of it, you will have a track jumping over mountains, sending your car and score soaring.

You can also customize your vehicle by choosing a primary and secondary color, as well as the color of the car frame and rims.

A series of premade tracks is available for those who want to begin practicing and getting a feel for other designs.

PolyTrack Unique Features

When selecting a track, you can see the best lap times recorded by verified players on it and measure yourself against them.

One cool feature that differentiates PolyTrack from other driving games is the opportunity to challenge opponents asynchronously, by selecting them from the leaderboard before starting the game, and seeing them as “ghosts” as you race the track. You can also challenge yourself by shaving off some decimals from your best time and then have your car “ghosted” on the track.

Available Tracks

There are currently 15 Official tracks and 22 Community-made tracks:

Official tracks:

7 summer tracks
4 winter tracks
4 desert tracks

Community tracks:

9 summer tracks
4 winter tracks
9 desert tracks

The driving experience remains unaltered, independent of the track season: what changes is the scenery surrounding the track.

More Games Like This

Once you've mastered building your tracks, you can enjoy these other thrilling driving games: Moto X3M, where you experience high-octane motocross action with challenging courses, stunts, and exciting levels, or Drift Hunters, where you test your drifting skills in this game that features a variety of cars and tracks designed for perfecting those thrilling drifts.

Basket Random is a chaotic 2-player arcade sports game with unpredictable physics. Bounce and battle for the ball across wild courts, with each dunk launching you to the next level!

How to Play Basket Random

Basket Random shares similar features with other games in the "Random" series: your characters defy the laws of physics and may react unexpectedly to your input. You can challenge the CPU or play with a friend.

This two-player basketball game shares the same concept as a typical basketball game: shoot the ball into the net, but with a few unusual and humorous twists. You can challenge the CPU or play with a friend.

There are two teams, each consisting of two players. Controls guide both your players, but be warned that their actions may not coincide with exactly how you expected them to move. Slam dunks are still very possible!

Use the W key to control player one and the up arrow to control player two. Fight frantically over the basketball, bouncing and spinning in the air, trying to make the shot. Whatever team scores first wins that round. The first team to reach 5 wins the game!

After each basket, you’re transported to a new place where the court and the surroundings have changed, and physics and attire may differ, shaking up each new round with random changes! In some cases, players will have longer arms, in others, the ball might be heavier, or baskets might be worth double points! Bobble around, shooting hoops and having fun in this wacky take on basketball.

Paper.io 2 is an .io game where you have to capture as much territory as possible by painting it. Paint the map in your own color to take over the Paper.io world! Look out for other players vying to claim your space.

How to Play

Use your mouse to move around and cover the floor with your color. Glide over white space and other players’ paint, then create a connection back to your color to claim that area. You can also destroy other players' territory completely by crashing into their tail when they are exposed.

That also means when you’re moving outside of your color, your tail is exposed to attack. Other players can crash into it to obliterate you.

Complete objectives and eliminate other players to unlock new skins and make the map more colorful.

You’ll constantly be battling with other Paper.io 2 players to reclaim your territory and take theirs. Think strategically about how to claim the most land, and don't get too greedy!

Tips and Tricks
Don’t be too greedy. The longer your tail is exposed, the more likely it is that you’ll be destroyed by an opponent.
Be careful and don't go over your tail, as it would lead to game over.
Attack other players boldly when their tail is exposed. Then claim all the white space they previously inhabited!
Paint cautiously and stay close to your territory until you’re sure it’s okay to claim a larger space.
Move around the edges of the map to minimize exposure while claiming more and more space for yourself!

Snow Rider 3D is a thrilling sled-driving casual game that delivers heart-pounding downhill action and endless winter fun. Dodge obstacles, collect gifts, and race your way through snowy slopes at high speed.

How to Play Snow Rider 3D

Ever wonder what it’s like to be a young Santa learning how to master the sleigh? Snow Rider 3D brings you close to that experience. You’ll find yourself speeding through snowy forests, dodging snowmen, rocky snowcaps, and other tricky obstacles: this is not exactly the easiest place to sled, but that's what makes a true pro.

The main goal is simple: don’t crash. Hitting any obstacle will shatter your sled and end your run. If you wipe out, you’ll have the option to watch an ad for a second chance, or you can start fresh, often facing a new set of challenges.

You’re scored based on your Score, Best, and Gifts collected along the way. Use smooth left and right movements to dodge obstacles, and be ready to jump over anything too large to slide past. Openings can be narrow, and timing your jumps is crucial, especially with sudden, steep drops that demand quick reflexes.

Gifts are scattered along your path, and collecting them will boost your score, but be warned, they're often placed dangerously close to obstacles. Only go for them if you’re confident you can grab them safely!

How to Win Snow Rider 3D

If you want to get a high score in Snow Rider 3D, focus on staying near the center of the slope to give yourself room to maneuver around obstacles. Try to make subtle moves, rather than sudden moves, as there are obstacles everywhere, and not that much space to avoid them. You should also aim to get as many gifts as possible, but the key is to know when to let them pass you by. Snow and steady wins the race in Snow Rider 3D.

A few key factors lead to success:

Score: Your score increases primarily with distance traveled, with some bonus points coming from gifts or performing jumps.
Gifts: The more gifts you collect, the more currency you have. This gives you the power to unlock new sleds.
Snow Rider 3D Gamescape

Snow Rider 3D is set in a winter landscape with bright white slopes and festive details, all from a first-person view with a view of the tip of a sled to guide you. The clean visuals and holiday accents give it a cozy holiday feel.

But perhaps one of the best parts of Snow Rider 3D is the sound design. You’ll hear festive sleigh bells at the start, but as you pick up speed, the sounds blur into the sound of your sled whooshing and snow crunching beneath you. In short, it's a winter wonderland.

Upgrades

Progression in Snow Rider 3D is limited to unlocking new sled designs with gifts. There are no power-ups or stat-based upgrades. With over 10 sleighs available, these unlocks provide benchmarks to strive towards.

Snow Rider Levels

There are no levels per se in Snow Rider 3D as it is an endless loop of slope, curves, bridges, and obstacles.

Tips & Tricks
Learn from your past crashes. You will only get better if you refine your reflexes and sled positioning.
Listen to audio cues like rolling snowballs, wind, or jingles. These are signals for what's to come and can help you plan your next move.
More Games Like This

Polytrack is a high-speed driving game that will have you jumping through hoops, literally. Mr Racer is a thrilling game where you get to explore busy streets all across the globe at a fast pace..

Drift Hunters is a free-to-play car 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks.

Choose from a wide selection of customizable rides, fine-tune your engine, and hit the gas as you glide around corners and perfect your drift technique in 10 unique and challenging locations. Get ready to leave your mark on the asphalt, literally!

How to Play Drift Hunters

You start Drift Hunters by selecting your car and the type of ride you want to take. You can upgrade the performance, including the brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine, with superior parts. You can also finish off your car in any color and enjoy a selection of rims on the house.

The key to this game is scoring points by drifting your car. The more you drift, the more points you get, which you can then spend in the garage to fine-tune your car.

Race Tracks: Drift through diverse circuits like Nishuri, Stadium, Tyshen, and more. Each track offers a unique layout with varied curves and turns, challenging your drifting skills to the max.

Cars: Rack up at least 8,500 points to start unlocking cars, with the top model costing over 134k points. Every drift and upgrade gets you closer to that dream ride! If you are a beginner, you might find that it is better to focus on optimizing the performance of entry-level cars before investing all your cash on a new ride.

Drift Hunters available cars:

BMW M3
Toyota Supra
Honda S2000
Ford Fiesta ST
Nissan 370Z coupe
Dodge Challenger Hellcat
Nissan GTR
Porsche 911 GT
And 18 more cars...

Parts & Upgrades: Customize your vehicle’s performance with upgrades to brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine.

Tuning: Adjust your car’s fine-tuning settings, including front and rear camber, offset, brake balance, height, and brake pressure, to perfect your drift style even without additional upgrades.

Visuals: Express your style by customizing the color of your car’s body and rims, and select from a range of rim designs to complete your look.

Every car you buy can be fully tuned: turbo, brakes, engine, gearbox and weight can range from "street" level, the lowest, to the "pro", which is also the most expensive. You can fully modify these values to find the best tuning for your drift performance.

Some tracks allow you to keep drifting much more easily than others. The best tracks for drifting in Drift Hunters are Emashi and Forest because of their long corners and lack of too many sharp turns. The Forest track features the longest corners, allowing for the most prolonged drifts.

The longer you drift, the more your points multiplier increases. You can use the points to buy exotic motors like the high-performance Porsche 911 GT. There are 26 fully customizable cars available to buy in total. 

Drift Hunters has a smooth arcade-racer feel but isn’t constrained to a racing format. Instead, you can blaze your own trail in several locations, racking up points to buy new cars and upgrades. The graphics are great for the web, but you can play the game on low-spec devices without a hiccup. It’s a must-play for drift enthusiasts!

Tips
Use acceleration cautiously when approaching corners mid-drift
Drift from side to side on straight roads to keep the drift alive
Tune up your vehicles to find the sweet spot for maximum drift
Drive on maps with plenty of space for long, uninterrupted drifting

Open House is a puzzle match-3 game where you're unexpectedly tasked with turning an abandoned residence into your dream home via one puzzle at a time. Each puzzle brings about new furnishings and upgrades to keep you hooked. You have options, so redesign rooms with your style choices, swap out furniture, and watch your estate transform from rags to riches.

How to Play Open House

You, Oscar, are fresh off a rough flight, and things couldn’t have started worse. Somewhere during the trip, all your belongings fell out of the plane. You beg Theo, the pilot who took you to this island, to turn back so you can find them, but he refuses, saying he has too many passengers. He takes off without you.

Trying to stay positive, you decide this might be the perfect chance to start over in your new beachside home. After all, it’s only a suitcase… and luckily, you were wearing your favorite shirt during the flight. Time to see your new place.

You greet your neighbor, who’s not exactly welcoming, then head toward your new home only to find it looks nothing like the pictures from the real estate listing. The porch is falling apart, the rooms are wrecked, and it’s clear today is not your day. You can’t help but wonder if you’re on some sort of prank show.

Your first quest is to remove all the covers from the furniture in hopes of finding a hidden camera. To do this, you’ll complete match-3 puzzles that appear on the screen. Each match earns points and helps you move forward.

As you work, you notice the place is so bad that it even has critters running around. It’s time to contact the real estate agency. You're sitting at your computer when the desk collapses. You’ll need to replace both the desk and the chair before you can write to Mr. Fraudley, the man who sold you this disaster of a house. You send him a message explaining the mess, and he blocks you immediately.

Just when you’re feeling hopeless, your neighbor Charles surprises you by finding your missing suitcases, but the purple flower, which means a lot to you, is still missing. He advises you to get a wardrobe to store your clothes. After that, you’ll need a good night’s rest, which means buying a new bed.

Between each home repair or furniture purchase, you’ll play match-3 puzzles to earn what you need. Every successful round brings you closer to fixing up the house.

You keep trying to leave the island, but something always stops you. In the meantime, you keep decorating, cleaning, and repairing. Over time, you might just discover that this wrecked beach house has the potential to become the dream home you never knew you wanted.

More Games Like This

If you like Open House, browse our match-3 games for more fun. There is also plenty of variation in our puzzle category, with games like Word Search and 2048.

You can clean up your dream home gone wrong in Open House by playing match-3 rounds to earn enough to get new home furnishings.

Open House is a mobile-friendly game, so you can decorate and play match-3 puzzles on the go.

Designville: Merge & Design is a casual game that takes you on a creative adventure to renovate and decorate various spaces. Tackle unique design challenges, craft stunning interiors, and turn your studio into the best in town. Unleash your creativity to bring your dream designs to life and grow your decorating empire!

How to Play Designville: Merge & Design

The objective of the game is to renovate the run-down home. Louise and Robin are renovating an abandoned house to transform it into a Design Studio, the best of Designville! After a brief intro of characters, you will be introduced to a board with multiple items. Most of which are cardboard boxes from the renovation. You'll open the boxes of stuff that Robin acquired for the renovation, and the items will be placed on the board.

Renovations are accomplished by merging items, designing, and decorating gardens. The grid is primarily filled with boxes, but other tiles are filled with random objects commonly found in a home, including coffee cups, pizza slices, rubber gloves, and more. Most of these items are covered in dust and cobwebs, and some can only be accessed on other levels.

Merging items and discovering new ones will earn you money that can be used to enable the renovation, clearing tasks from a to-do list which will eventually lead you to the renovated Design Studio. Once the Studio is up and running, Louise and Robin will start taking orders from clients, initially friends and acquaintances, and later referrals, and they will allow the Studio to expand its reputation and complete more complex tasks.

There is one object on the grid that is most important to begin merging: a yellow bag full of corkboard push pins. Left-click on the yellow bag to fill all empty board pieces with push pins. This is where you merge. Begin merging all push pins. It takes two push pins to create another object, an eraser. As you merge, you will get more free board space, so keep clicking and merging.

Potential merges and results:

2 corkboard push pins = 1 eraser
2 erasers = 1 Post-it note
2 post its = 1 ruler
2 rulers = 1 round ruler
2 protractors = 1 pencil
2 pencils = 1 highlighter
2 highlighters = 1 drawing compass
2 drawing compasses = 1 stapler
2 staplers = 1 color sample

Keep merging and find more and more new items.

Begin in a fog-covered land, using ancient keys to explore hidden realms and trace the path of your lost family through different eras. How to Play Castle Craft

Step into the wonderous world of Castle Craft, where you play as farmer Fiona, determined on her heartfelt mission to reunite with her husband after a mysterious separation. Your adventure begins in a simple garden, where you combine garden beds and plants to breathe new life into the land—this is the merge element of the game. As you cultivate your wheat fields, you will harvest crops to trade for mystical keys that dispel the fog, revealing hidden territories and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

As Fiona restores the land, her journey takes her toward new clues about her husband Michael’s whereabouts, such as his misplaced headphones, and she encounters friendly helpers along the way. Among them is Aiden, a kind woodsman who helps her clear obstacles like a stubborn tree stump. Together, Fiona and Aiden gather timber and merge logs to create essential tools and craft materials, unlocking treasure chests filled with valuable rewards to continue on her quest.

Every decision you make shapes Fiona’s path, allowing her to rebuild and expand her world. What begins as a small garden evolves into a thriving medieval kingdom, complete with bustling marketplaces and grand castles. As you progress, the adventure deepens, introducing new lands teeming with hidden treasures, mysterious puzzles, and historical figures who assist in unraveling the mysteries of time and family.

To embark on this journey, start by merging three wheat sprouts to cultivate a full wheat crop, then continue merging similar items to develop the garden further. Harvest the wheat to trade for keys that unlock new areas, dispelling the fog and revealing untapped potential. Treasure chests, once opened, offer unique items and heroes to aid Fiona in reclaiming and revitalizing the land. AOD - Art of Defence is a casual tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As Commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the charge against Mr. Ivil's ruthless thugs, determined to find the lost Inola project. With stunning isometric graphics, build your technological kingdoms and thwart the enemy's destructive ambitions. Will you save mankind or succumb to darkness?

How to Play AOD - Art of Defence

Your mission in AOD Art of Defense begins with an urgent message from Mr. Ivil—find the blueprints of the fabled Inola Project at all costs—even if it means reducing the city to rubble. Time is of the essence. Meanwhile, Ich Nevel warns of an imminent large-scale assault on your bases. The stakes couldn’t be higher, and it’s up to you to defend humanity’s last hope. You have one goal - to protect your base at all costs.

Dynamic battles ensure that every moment is filled with action. Combining elements of Tower Defense, RPG, and tactical strategy, the game features over 500 sectors for real-time warfare, offering a variety of environments—from small villages to massive abandoned megapolises. You’ll face challenges in exciting new Tower Defense modes like escape, fog, and survival.

The aim is strategically deploying siege houses, tanks, and armed trucks to stop enemy forces before they breach your defenses. With over 1,000 tower upgrades, including tanks, miniguns, and air defense systems, your arsenal is as vast as powerful. Along the way, you’ll unlock six unique heroes, each with their own abilities to level up and master. From nuclear bombs to ionic satellite strikes and ballistic barrages, a range of devastating boosters will turn the tide in your favor.

Every successful defense wave rewards you with crystals, essential for upgrading your arsenal. The longer you survive, the greater the rewards, but enemies will become stronger with each attack. Hundreds of card upgrades allow you to customize your towers for maximum efficiency, keeping your strategies fresh and adaptable.

Set in a near-future world devastated by nuclear wars, 70% of the population has been wiped out. The survivors face constant terror from Mr. Ivil, who has united gangs into a brutal army bent on finding the Inola Project blueprints. His forces leave no settlement untouched, robbing and killing indiscriminately. Your task is to stop them and save what remains of the planet.

In this endless survival mode, your tactics and preparation are key. Build your defenses wisely, place your siege houses strategically, and upgrade your resources to keep pace with the escalating challenge. Each location demands new strategies and better equipment, pushing your tactical skills to the limit.

Whether you’re battling through small villages or abandoned megapolises, the world's fate depends on you. With the power of innovative weapons, unique heroes, and an array of upgrades, you hold the key to humanity’s survival. Will you rise to the challenge?

More Games Like This

There are plenty of casual games where you can show off your game skills. Want to stick to defense games? Try our Bloons Tower Defense, a casual game where you defend the track from endless balloons using clever tower placement and upgrades. Another fun game is Doodle Jump, a thrilling game that has you jumping upwards to infinity, grabbing boosts, and avoiding beasts on your way up.

Park Town is a captivating match-3 puzzle game where you restore a neglected city park to its former beauty. Solve exciting puzzles, decorate to your heart’s content, and fill the park with adorable animals from across the globe. Team up with friends, tackle thrilling challenges, and bring life back to the park in your own unique way!

How to Play Park Town

The city is in trouble, and the mayor needs your help! A young red-haired man named Kevin is convinced that you’re the only one who can restore the park to its former glory. If you succeed, you’ll earn the deed to the city and even receive a real panda! But hurry, because others want to replace the park with a parking lot!

The once-beautiful city has been neglected for too long. Prove your skills by rebuilding and revitalizing the park through exciting match-3 challenges. Keep making combos to clear levels and earn rewards to bring the city back to life.

You’ll match three or more identical items to clear the board, from flowers to limes, bringing vibrant colors to the game. As you complete levels, you’ll plant ornamental shrubs, add flowers, and clean up the park. Later in the game, you’ll earn powerful explosive items, which allow you to clear entire rows in one move. If you ever get stuck, helpful hints will guide you toward your next match.

Keep progressing, and the mayor will track your efforts: don’t let him down! There’s plenty of work to do, but with the right strategy, you can transform Park Town into a thriving, green paradise once more!

More Games Like This

There are plenty more fun casual games where this one came from! It's worth exploring Match 3 games like Tile Guru, a relaxing puzzle game that challenges your mental sharpness through tile-matching, and Candy Riddles, a sweet puzzle adventure where matching three or more tasty treats clears the board and creates space for even more delightful combinations. Unwind and continue the fun with some of our top casual games, including Blob Opera, a music-themed title that lets you create incredible operatic music using a machine learning model trained on real voices.

Mirrorland is a turn-based strategy set in a fantastical realm teeming with heroes and monsters. Embark on an epic journey through this magical world, brimming with perilous encounters and thrilling adventures at every turn. Traverse through the looking glass into a realm of enigmatic puzzles and terrifying foes. Unravel the mysteries, aid mythical beings, vanquish villains, and safeguard the universe of Mirrorland. With stunning visuals, an immersive storyline, diverse hero selection, and engaging multiplayer features, prepare for an unforgettable quest where bravery and cunning are your greatest weapons.

How to Play Mirrorland

First things first. To play Mirrorland, you will need to create an online account and select your character (and sidekick). The adventure begins as you ride on horseback along a mysterious, winding path. Your first challenge awaits when the Cheshire Cat, a mischievous yet endearing creature, falls into a hole. Demonstrate your courage and compassion by rescuing him, and in return, he will pledge his unwavering loyalty, becoming your trusted companion and guide throughout the game (sidekick!).

As you ride further into Mirrorland, the landscape comes alive with the promise of riches. Treasure chests brimming with rewards, glittering gold, and radiant crystals are scattered across your path, waiting to be claimed. Cheshire often spots these hidden troves, so listen to him so you won't miss an opportunity to increase your bounty.

The road is far from quiet—and cries for help are common. You will need to respond to these pleas to form allies. Battle goblins to protect defenseless victims, shield the White Rabbit as he flees from ominous pursuers, and deliver urgent messages to reunite estranged brothers. Each act of bravery and kindness enriches your story, offering rewards that strengthen your resolve and resources.

The gameplay is a captivating mix of strategy and direction. Carefully follow the prompts to guide your decisions and immerse yourself in the unfolding narrative. When combat arises, engage in intuitive battles by dragging and dropping attacks to strike down foes. Victory requires precision and skill as you navigate these skirmishes. Beyond the thrill of battle, gather gold, hoard crystals, and complete quests to uncover the deeper layers of Mirrorland’s magic. With every step, your character evolves, and the enchanting world around you reveals its secrets.

Far Orion: New Worlds is an action game where you can command a team of brave heroes and lead your world to victory! The year is 2121, and technology has advanced far beyond the bounds of our wildest fantasies, but great progress also demands a great sacrifice. Use your strategy to set up your heroes and power card, beat all your opponents, and explore other worlds in search of treasure and limitless power!

How to Play Far Orion: New Worlds

In Far Orion: New Worlds, danger is everywhere, and Preston needs allies to survive. Skills are powered by energy, which refills over time, so you must time your moves wisely. The journey starts with Chapter 1: Woeful News, where you take your first steps into a world full of challenges.

To use a skill, tap on a hero to pick a target. Positive skills help your allies, while negative ones hit your enemies. You’ll also choose defense weapons from the options at the bottom of the screen. Asteroids deal 25 damage to a target and 60 damage to a random enemy. Lightning stuns enemies for 0.8 seconds and deals 30 damage. Golden Armor boosts a hero’s armor by 7 for 10 seconds. You’ll soon meet Ellena, a curious and skilled archer impressed by your strange armor. She’ll offer to join your squad.

Follow the hints to build a squad of heroes and a deck of battle cards. Complete missions to earn money for unlocking new heroes and upgrading your cards. Think about team strategy—pairing a healer with a tank can make a huge difference in battles. Pick power cards to supercharge your team, or go for basics to heal and deal damage. You’ll also earn gold from missions, daily quests, and fighting in the tower or arena.

With dozens of heroes, unique battle cards, missions across multiple worlds, a PvP arena, a tough tower mode, and clan battles, there’s always something exciting to tackle. Build your team, power up, and see how far you can go in Far Orion!

Features

Several dozen unique heroes and battle cards
Dozens of missions in every world
PvP arena
Tower mode
Clans and clan wars

Dive into Tropical Merge, the ultimate merge game where you can create your tropical paradise! Immerse yourself in a vibrant world as you match and combine resources in three groups to craft exciting new items. Whether completing quests or exploring the lush landscape, every match brings you closer to transforming your island into a perfect tropical haven. With hundreds of objects to discover and merge, the possibilities are endless—start building your dream island today!

How to Play Tropical Merge

Tropical Merge features various exotic objects that you can combine with other items in groups of 3 or more. Merging these three ingredients creates an entirely new object. That object, too, can be combined with two others to produce further upgrades. Each upgrade becomes more valuable as you continue to build your tropical paradise!

Merging more than three items at a time will deliver a bigger number of items. Plan your merging moves strategically by trying to merge multiple objects at the same time to speed up your progression.

Explore and expand to new areas

The game is based on a family story, where Lisa Whitlock comes back to the island of her childhood and is tasked with making it a tropical heaven again. Get rid of the weeds, earn amulets and level up to unlock more areas and expand your island. The more areas you open, the more freedom you have to merge and build until you’ve created the perfect utopian island society. As you progress, you'll unlock new characters that will help Lisa with her job. Keep an eye out for rarities and unlockable items scattered around the map.

Complete quests

Merging and discovering new items is a ton of fun, and many are part of quests that will reward you for building new items. There are so many quests to keep you hooked and daily quests to keep you coming back for a fresh challenge!
