Battle Arena is a thrilling RPG adventure battle game that seamlessly blends heart-pounding action with strategic gameplay. Create your team from over 50 unique heroes, each inspired by iconic characters you know and love. Dive into intense real-time PvP battles where your skills and tactics are put to the ultimate test. Join forces with fellow guild players to take on epic quests across breathtaking locations, from ancient ruins to mystical landscapes. As you progress, you can upgrade your heroes and gear, enhancing their abilities and unlocking new powers.

How to Play Battle Arena

In a world overrun by demons, you must choose a region at a time to combat your opponent. Battle Arena fights start off in Serenity Valley, where you can assess your enemy's squad in just a tap. You get to select your heroes for battle. You begin with only three heroes to play with, each with a different weapon and skill. But the amount of heroes you can eventually upgrade to is countless.

Early in the game, you will fight Dark Lord, who is less than happy to see you. To win the initial battle and every one afterward, you must use your hero's unique skills—some wield swords while others shoot arrows. Just tap on their avatars at the bottom of the screen to strengthen your attacks.

In Battle Arena, your objective is pretty much to build and upgrade your heroes and compete in various challenges, particularly in the arena. The gameplay revolves around gathering resources and gaining experience points to level up. Players can participate in raids to acquire new heroes and enhance their existing ones. The key to success in this game is to strategize by selecting the right battle heroes to maximize team effectiveness.

As you engage in battles, you must use different abilities and relics, which provide unique advantages during combat. Upgrading heroes is crucial to improve your performance in battles.

Always pay attention to your heroes' health and manage resources wisely, especially during expeditions and arena fights. Using a mix of heroes with complementary skills can lead to successful team combinations and help defeat stronger opponents.

Ultimately, the goal is to push through the ranks in the arena by strategizing hero placements and leveraging their abilities effectively. You can earn significant rewards as you progress, which can be reinvested into your hero roster.

Country Life Meadows is a farming adventure game where you turn a humble patch of land into a thriving estate. Cultivate crops, expand your business, and manage a skilled team. Explore untamed areas, unravel intriguing mysteries, and connect with the charming residents of Woodburn as you build your agricultural empire from the ground up.

How to Play Country Life Meadows

Welcome to your new farm! You’ve just acquired Roadside Farm, or whatever name you choose, and it’s time to embrace farm life. But first, here’s a letter from the previous owner that will give you an idea of your situation:

Hi,

Congrats on buying my farm! Sorry to hear you got stranded overnight - wish I could’ve helped fix your car. I don’t remember that rock being on the road… strange. Anyway, I asked around for help, and hopefully, you’ll find an oil pan soon.

You were right about the sunrises - they're stunning, much better than in the city! The soil here is top-notch too. Too bad I had to leave in such a rush. Life happens...

This land is the best spot on that flat hilltop, right near the road. It’s called Roadside Farm, but feel free to rename it. Oh, and please take care of Clarabella!

Best Wishes,

Jim Grey

Now that you’re settling in, it’s time to start farming. Each day brings new rewards, so be sure to check in and claim them. The key to a thriving farm is planting, harvesting, and managing your resources wisely. Sow your seeds, take care of your animals, and keep an eye on your barn and warehouse to track what you’ve gathered. As you grow your farm, you’ll have the chance to expand your land, unlocking even more opportunities to cultivate crops and raise livestock.

Clover is an essential crop for your animals. Cows, turkeys, and goats love it, and if you have bees, they’ll pollinate it, producing honey before harvest. Clover is also used in the production of milk, black feathers, and white feathers. Wheat is another staple: grind it at the Dutch Mill to make flour or use it to feed your sheep. It’s a key ingredient in making flour, vodka, wool, and black wool. If you need milk, make sure to feed your Holstein cows. A full cow is a happy cow, and happy cows keep your farm running smoothly.

Your farm has several important buildings to manage. The Dutch Mill turns wheat into flour, and keeping it filled will power the windmill. The barn stores essentials like wheat, clover, and flour, while the warehouse holds resources such as honey, sugar, oxygen, and propane. As you progress, you’ll gain access to even more supplies, including gear, decorations, chests, and medals. Keep an eye on your stockpile to prepare for the next task.

While ripe crops are beautiful to look at, don’t forget to harvest and replant to keep your farm productive. Wheat should always be replenished, and replanting clover on eight plots of soil will ensure a steady supply. Adding sacks of wheat to the Dutch Mill will keep your flour production running smoothly. The more you maintain your farm, the more opportunities you’ll unlock, allowing you to expand even further. Check the map to see just how vast your farm can become.

Beyond the daily farm routine, there are plenty of ways to engage with the world around you. If you enjoy a relaxed farming experience, you’ll love the peaceful rhythm of planting and harvesting, accompanied by soothing animations and calming sounds. For those who like a challenge, competitions, achievements, horse racing, and leaderboards offer ways to test your skills and earn permanent prizes. The farming co-op lets you collaborate with fellow players, whether by sending Wedding Doves to ceremonies or trading produce at the Market.

Neighbors are a valuable part of farm life. The more neighbors you have, the more gifts you’ll receive, helping you progress faster. You can also personalize your farm with beautiful artwork and decorations, customizing both your Farmhouse and Log Cabin. If you feel like exploring, venture into the surrounding landscapes to forage for mushrooms and edible roots, or head to the mines to uncover valuable ores and hidden riches.

With so much to do, you can play Country Life Meadows your way. Relax and unwind with hours of farming fun, compete to showcase your skills, or grow your farm into a flourishing empire. The possibilities are endless: so start planting and watch your farm come to life!

Features
Play to Relax: Unwind with hundreds of hours of farming fun. Revel in the soothing daily routine of planting and harvesting your crops, complete with beautiful animations and calming sounds.
Play to Compete: Test your skills in Competitions, Achievements, Horse Racing, and Leaderboards. Earn permanent prizes, and rewards, and showcase your public stats.
Farming Co-op: Collaborate with fellow players to achieve common goals. From sending Wedding Doves to weddings to participating in the all-new Market where you can exchange produce with others, teamwork is key.
Neighborly Gifts: Your Neighbors can send you valuable gifts, so the more neighbors, the faster you’ll progress.
Artwork: We focus on crafting beautiful in-game artwork rather than promotional materials, so what you see is what you get.
Interior Decoration: Personalize the interior of your Farmhouse and your Log Cabin in the woods.
Exploration: Venture into vast, picturesque landscapes to forage for mushrooms and edible roots.
Mining: Delve into the depths of The Mines to discover ores and riches.
Barn Management: Our Barn management offers unparalleled control with filtering options that help you maximize your results.
More Games Like This

Finished playing and looking for more? There are plenty more casual games to go around. Try Empire City, a management game, where you strategically govern a thriving empire, building it from nothing. You may also enjoy our merge games like Little Alchemy, a crafting game where players combine the elements of the world to create new items, or Designville Merge & Design, which takes you on an adventure to renovate and design various spaces.

Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP is an IO battle game where lightning-fast reflexes and precision will determine how far you make it through to the end of this real-time shooter action. This high-intensity game requires you to stay sharp, aim true, and master the art of drone attacks to outwit and overpower your opponents. Each 3v3 PvP match puts you against players in real-time in multiplayer battles. There’s no room for luck—it's all about skill, strategy, and timing.

How to Play Gridpunk - 3v3 Battle Royale

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping fighting adventure in Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP, where electrifying music sets the stage for high-stakes battles in a cyberpunk arena. This is not just a game—it's an intense, fast-paced showdown that will test your reflexes and strategy. One false move, and you’re out.

This multiplayer game splits six players into green and red teams so they can battle it out in real-time. You’ll automatically join the green team and control one of its members, with health indicators displayed above every player. Opponents on the red team are equally equipped, so don’t let your guard down because competition is fierce.

You will be in a multi-room scenario where you need to go through doors and passageways to confront your enemy. There is no hiding in this game. If you don’t go to them, they will come to you and in numbers! Move your fighter using the arrow keys, and aim with precision using your mouse to unleash a barrage of shots. Get to know the controls well before attempting to win your opponents. The gameplay can get complex if you don’t master the keys.

Explore the arena to collect glowing rewards that instantly boost your strength. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, pick up health packs to stay in the game, and enhance your arsenal with drones and super gadgets. Strategy and quick reflexes are your greatest allies as you navigate the vibrant map.

Before each match begins, the game ensures a full roster of six players for the ultimate test of skill. Every second counts as you race to dominate the battlefield. With a scoreboard tracking team progress, adapt your tactics and aim to outplay your opponents in this fast-paced fight for victory.

Gridpunk delivers an unmatched battle royale experience, blending quick rounds, real-time multiplayer gameplay, and a cyberpunk aesthetic. Engage in intense action, launch devastating attacks, and prove your worth in this skill-driven, free-to-play showdown.

Empire City is a casual management game where you strategically construct and govern a thriving empire from nothing. Build magnificent cities, develop resources, and create a unique culture while engaging in trade and diplomacy. Expand your influence, make historic discoveries, and craft wonders that will be remembered for centuries. Your choices shape the future of your empire: lead wisely!

How to Play Empire City

Empire City is a classic management game set in ancient times where you get to build an entire city, including roadways, residential homes, waterways, workshops, and more -- all from a blank slate with a bit of help from two close advisors: Julia and Flavius.

The game starts with a full intro from Julia and Flavius, which will walk you through step by step how to build your city. Once you have the hang of it, you're on your own. But not to worry, help from your advisors is just a click away.

Julia and Flavius guide you through the following directions:

Julia: "Welcome to the city, Prefect! I’m Julia. I run an inn here, and I know everything about everyone. This is Flavius, the architect."

Flavius: "My projects can do the talking for me! The first one is a residential building. Let’s get to work!"

Julia: "Remember, every building in the city must be connected to a road."

Action: You get to build a road.

Flavius: "Congratulations, Prefect! The building is ready. We can house people in it now."

Julia: "People?! There’s barely room for one citizen. The building needs to be upgraded."

Action: Build a house.

Flavius: "Prefect, we have a problem. We need clay to make the house more spacious, but it’s mined outside the city."

Julia: "If it’s even mined at all! The clay quarry is in bad shape, and the tool storage is totally dilapidated. But our Prefect can solve that, right?"

Action: Fix the clay quarry.

Julia: "Now we can hire a manager! But that can happen later. First, we need to build a road to deliver the clay to the city."

Action: Build a road.

Flavius: "The road is wonderful, Prefect! Collect the mined clay, and my people will deliver it to the construction site right away."

Action: Collect the clay.

Flavius: "Thank you for the help. I’ll get to work upgrading the house right now!"

Julia: "You and Flavius are doing wonderfully! Let’s upgrade another house. It could use a second floor, with a good view of the city."

Flavius: "Regular clay isn’t enough to build another floor. This requires a sturdier material, such as clay mixture."

Julia: "Alas, this material isn’t produced in our city. Although the Prefect could give orders to build a special workshop."

Julia: "If you don’t want to wait, use gems! Their shine speeds up any project. The first time is free, though."

Action: Use gems.

Flavius: "Very grand, Prefect. Now we won’t lack building materials. Give the order to produce clay mixture."

Julia: "Production can take a long time. When it ends, a clay mixture icon will appear above the workshop."

Action: Wait for production to finish.

Flavius: "It’s ready, Prefect! Tap the icon to move the mixture to the warehouse."

Action: Move the mixture to the warehouse.

Julia: "So, are we going to upgrade the house or just pretend that it’s intentionally unfinished?"

Flavius: "Please accept this scroll. I sketched out some improvements. Remember, Prefect, Julia and I are always here to support you!"

You're on your own after this training. Continue building your empire and make Julia and Flavius proud, Prefect!

More Games Like This

If you are in Empire City, you may like more games within our casual game category, so go ahead and have a look! You may also like some of our clicker classics like Mr Mine, where you get to mine precious stones for rewards; Planet Clicker is another fun idle clicker game where you generate resources to expand and upgrade their planet gradually; or Clicker Heroes, which is a classic clicker game that challenges players to kill as many monsters as possible to earn coins and summon heroes!

Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War is an action tower defense battle game where you fight your opponent throughout the ages, starting from the Stone Age, making your way all the way to modern marvels. Your main task is strategically dominating the battlefield to constantly upgrade your army and conquer enemies in an epic 1v1 battle. Lead your army to victory in this strategic game and show your earned skills to the modern world.

The old Flash game from 2007, Age of War, by Max Game Studios, has clearly been a source of inspiration for Age of Tanks Warriors.

How to Play Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War

Age of Tanks Warriors is a one-click battle game, so the actual combat portion of the game is fairly simple. The difficulty lies in devising a strategy for utilizing your army and weapons to eliminate your opponents before they can eliminate you and destroy your fortress. Once you do this, you get to upgrade your army and weapons for an even more effective strategy.

The game begins with your stone cave, which is directly opposite your opponent's cave. You can deploy your soldiers by clicking the small icon on the bottom right of your screen. The only hitch is that you may not have enough soldiers to send out in time to match your opponent's troops!

Your task on each level is to defeat the opposing army and destroy their shelter. As the levels advance, so do the fortresses, making it even more difficult throughout the ages. Fighting begins with sticks and stones, but eventually turns into tanks and artillery.

Tips

Collect as many coins and as much food as possible by watching some of the ads. This will help strengthen your troop. Otherwise, it's a bit difficult, as the opponent starts with an advantage.

Don't deploy too many troops straight away. It's best to deploy when the enemy is closer to home territory.

You can defeat multiple enemies with one of your soldiers, so be skillful in how many you send out simultaneously and which ones.

More Games Like This

If you're a fan of battle games, browse our vast selection of popular titles.

Additional titles that require strategic thinking include Bubble Shooter and 2048.

Firestone Idle RPG is an Idle battle fantasy MMO game set in the world of Alandria. Fight hordes of Undead and Orc enemies in a party of up to five heroes, join a guild, and reap the rewards from progressing your character. Firestone is an Idle RPG, which means the gameplay focuses on simple actions like left-clicking.

How to Play Firestone Idle RPG

As the Hero in this story, your goal is to eliminate the Undead and Orc forces who are wreaking havoc and disorder in Alandria. The King has entrusted you to stop these chaotic forces and acquire the Firestones to save the Kingdom. Battle these endless hoards around the Alandria map to claim the rewards and increase your talents.

Heroes

Heroes are separated into classes and specializations. Classes indicate your Hero's abilities, which are activated by using mana, rage, or energy. They consist of Warrior, Mage, Priest, Druid, and others. Specializations are effectively the role you take in battle, this could be DPS, tank, or healer. With a variety of combinations and skills to focus on, you can level up the ultimate Hero to dominate the game in your own style!

You can also use one Guardian to allow up to five Heroes to a party. The Guardians are divine creatures like angels and dragons, which can be unlocked in the Magic Quarter and used against your enemies.

Quests

There's a limitless range of missions, daily quests, and weekly quests in Firestone Idle RPG. Daily quests can be as simple as opening three chests or bigger challenges like completing nine map missions. Weekly quests require more of an investment and reward you with common, rare, epic, and legendary chests depending on the quest and your Hero level. Level up your in-game talents to clear your quests quickly and claim the rewards!

Gear

Progressing your Heroes to be incredibly powerful is what makes Firestone so much fun to play. You can do this by focusing on your most essential skills via the talent tree, but the gear you use is also vital. The rarest equipment is the best; find it, enchant it, and use it to decimate the hoards more quickly.

Expanded Gameplay

As you continue to level up, you'll unlock mind-blowing new capabilities through new buildings in the town. Earlier on, you'll have the Hall of Heroes and Magic Quarter for your Heroes and Guardians.

As you progress into the later game, you'll unlock the Alchemist, where you can run experiments for random upgrades and transmute chests to higher rarities. The game is frequently updated with new content, so there may be more buildings in the town in the future!

Features

Fight action-packed battles against hoards of enemies
Receive consistent rewards for your progression
Refine your abilities using the diverse talent tree
Fight in parties of five with your guild-mates
Free-to-play with regular updates for fresh gameplay!
More Games Like This

Global City is a city-building simulator casual game with intricate graphics and innovative designs. You're the town's mayor and have been mandated to manage resource production, complete quests for rewards, and interact with enthusiastic residents to make this town as thriving as possible.

How to Play Global City

Global City is a task management and building game, so most of your gameplay will involve following directions and adding to already completed tasks. You are the mayor of this town and are initially met with plenty of training and guidance on how to turn a rundown town into a thriving metropolis.

Start by constructing basic buildings and infrastructure, such as houses, roads, and factories. Gather resources, complete tasks, and upgrade your buildings to attract more residents and increase your city's prosperity. Expand your city by acquiring new land, unlocking new structures, and enhancing its overall efficiency. Engage with other players through trade, collaboration, and competition to achieve the highest ranking and build the ultimate global city.

You have a task sheet you can refer to to understand how to continue construction and expansion. Refer to it as it will be your lifeline. This one-button casual game has few strategic moves. Follow the arrows on the screen to know your next best move.

Some of the construction you will be building includes:

Join friendly communities, trade resources, and compete in tournaments. Strategically collect taxes to grow your population and expand your city into a bustling megapolis.

Hotel Rush: Merge Story is a casual merge game where you join Ted on a journey to uncover his grandfather’s hidden past. As you explore the hotel’s forgotten corners, you’ll merge humble tools into powerful tools, uncover hidden treasures, and piece together family secrets that have been buried for years. Each renovated floor unlocks new challenges, puzzles, and surprises, taking you deeper into a story filled with twists and heartfelt discoveries. With every merge and decoration, you’ll breathe new life into the hotel, transforming it into a masterpiece.

How to Play Hotel Rush: Merge Story

Hotel Rush: Merge Story is an addictive one-click puzzle game where you merge items to grow your collection, unlock surprises, and renovate a charming hotel. It all begins with a simple toolbox: merge two toolboxes of different sizes to create a larger one. The bigger the toolbox, the more tools it holds—and the more surprises it offers! Tap your toolbox to reveal new items like nails, which are the foundation of your merging journey.

Start small by merging two nails to get a hammer. Keep combining: two hammers create a screwdriver, perfect for Grandpa’s DIY projects. Two screwdrivers become a wrench, and two wrenches morph into pliers. The merging doesn’t stop there—keep going to uncover bigger tools and exciting upgrades. Every tap on the toolbox brings a new opportunity to build, upgrade, and discover.

But Hotel Rush: Merge Story isn’t just about tools—it’s about transformation. As you progress, you’ll unlock renovation tasks to restore the hotel to its former glory. Fix flickering lamps, repair broken furniture, and calm Ted, the hotel’s ever-anxious manager. Grandpa and Ted will provide clues, revealing that your ultimate goal is to prepare the hotel for sale to eager investors.

Each level introduces new merging possibilities. By level two, you’ll expand your repertoire with items like gloves, face masks, and safety vests. Merge them to create even stronger gear and uncover more surprises. You’ll also face challenges like fixing the hotel’s elevator to access additional floors, each with its own set of items to merge and problems to solve.

With its endless merging opportunities, quirky characters, and the satisfying progress of rebuilding a grand hotel, Hotel Rush: Merge Story offers hours of idle gameplay.

Food Truck Chef is a thrilling casual food game where you travel the globe, cooking iconic dishes from tacos to sushi. Manage your time, upgrade your kitchen, and serve customers to build your food truck empire. With hundreds of levels and vibrant locations, you’ll face exciting challenges that test your skills as a master chef!

How to Play Food Truck Chef

Food Truck Chef is a fast-paced, fun, and addictive cooking game in which you manage your food truck and serve delicious dishes to customers on the go.

There are plenty of places to choose from, all with similar gameplay styles. The pasta street food truck journey is a popular location to begin, and as you progress, you can unlock Pizza Street, Tex Mex Street, Sandwich Street, and more!

The first thing you need to do is complete your training with Chef Sarah. You’ll learn the basics of the game, starting with your first customer.

A customer orders pasta with red sauce. Plate the pasta, add the red sauce, place it on the counter, take the money, and voilà, your first order is complete!

Your next customer wants a caffeine fix, so make sure to serve the coffee immediately after it’s filled so it’s nice and hot.

After your training, you’re ready to run your pasta food truck! Keep cooking and serving to build up your experience and earn rewards.

You earn coins and XP for completing orders, serving customers, and upgrading your kitchen. Fill the XP bar to level up and unlock rewards like coins and gems. You can watch ads to double your coins, which is crucial for buying new kitchen equipment and supplies.

Use your coins to buy better kitchen equipment. New pans (600 coins), new plates (400 coins), and an espresso machine (600 coins) will help you serve customers faster.

Remember to collect tips after serving customers. If you don't, new customers won’t show up!

Get the hot plate as soon as possible to keep your sauces warm and serve dishes quickly.

As you advance, you’ll unlock more additions to your dishes, like adding olives, cheese, and more to your pasta. Keep earning points, buying new equipment, and watching your food truck flourish with happy customers! New recipes will also be introduced. The white sauce, for example, burns easily if you don’t keep an eye on it, adding an extra challenge to your cooking!

Game Tip

To keep up with demand, have warm dishes prepped and ready to serve incoming guests.
Always keep a close eye on your cooking times, especially for recipes that burn quickly.

Project Restoration is a cozy farm-adventure game set in a distinctive post-apocalyptic world. After 200 years of slumber, three charming robots awaken to find a humanless Earth filled with secrets and decay. With your help, they’ll revive nature, rebuild civilization, and uncover the truth behind humanity’s disappearance. Grow crops, gather resources, construct workshops, and bring warmth back to a forgotten world one vintage furnishing at a time.

Features
Farm and adventure blend classic growing and crafting with a deep exploration of ancient ruins
56 vibrant locations, including wastelands, bunkers, megacities, radioactive forests, icy mazes, and even a crashed starship
Over 1,000 quests filled with puzzles, pests, and story arcs that unravel the fate of humankind
Three robot heroes and 30 NPCs, each with unique personalities, skills, and humorous dialogue
Play with friends by trading gifts, visiting neighbors, and joining cooperative events
Flexible base customization with hundreds of décor options from steampunk gear to retro lamps
Controls
PC Controls
Left-click = select objects, harvest crops, start production, interact with characters, and move between points of interest.
Hold left-click on an object (e.g., building, decor, etc.) = enter edit mode to freely reposition buildings, decorations, and other objects within the location.
Drag the left-click = smoothly pan the camera across the map or scroll through interface lists.
Mobile Controls
Single tap = perform primary actions such as collecting, building, opening menus, or initiating dialogue.
Hold on to an object (e.g., building, decor, etc.) = activate Edit Mode for free placement and movement of objects.

Dead Land: Survival is a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world where you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay. Fortify your shelter against relentless undead attacks and scavenge through desolate territories in search of valuable resources. Craft weapons, armor, and essential gear to give yourself an edge in these hostile lands. With danger around every corner, your aim is to keep calm and survive the end of the zombie apocalypse.

How to Play Dead Land: Survival

Set out on a treacherous quest through the desolate lands of Dead Land: Survival, where the world has fallen to ruin, and the infected ones lurk around every corner. Once-beautiful landscapes are now wastelands filled with relentless threats, stretching from the eerie remnants of your hometown, Nightstone, to the harsh quarantine zones. Each step into these dangerous territories demands courage as you fight tooth and nail to survive in an unforgiving, apocalyptic world.

To stay alive, you must harvest resources from whatever nature has left behind. Gather essential materials from trees and other natural sources to upgrade your hero, repair broken vehicles, and restore key structures like your shelter and workshop. Loot is scattered throughout zombie-infested areas, and every scrap could be crucial to your survival. From metal to wood, each resource strengthens your chance of fighting back against the apocalypse.

Combat is fierce as you face off against infected enemies with a range of weapons at your disposal. Craft melee weapons and guns, each designed for the brutal, turn-based struggles you’ll encounter. But survival takes more than brute force; you’ll need health packs and food to sustain your strength in prolonged battles. Weapons wear down over time, so be vigilant and repair them as needed, ensuring you're always ready for the next deadly encounter.

Nightstone, your starting refuge in this bleak world, is home to fellow survivors who offer a glimmer of hope. Here, you’ll meet resilient characters who trade with you and assign quests that test your survival skills. You'll earn rewards as you complete these missions and unlock the chance to journey to other survivor outposts. Each quest brings you closer to understanding this dark world and forming alliances in a fight for humanity’s future.

Engage in turn-based battles with zombies, craft powerful weapons and equipment, earn ratings to compete with clans, and complete a variety of quests in Dead Land: Survival.

More Games Like This

Dead Land: Survival is a game that can have you hooked for days. However, if you're looking for something new, you can browse more adventure games. Two other games in this category that will keep your attention for just as long include Battle Arena, a game where you collect powerful heroes and dominate real-time battles in this dynamic RPG; Magic World, an exciting Magical World, where battles with mythical creatures and epic clan wars will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Steam City is a casual building game that transports you to a world where Victorian charm meets futuristic innovation. As the newly appointed mayor renowned for your achievements in steam technology research, you will design and develop a unique city filled with sprawling infrastructure, beautiful buildings, and industrious citizens. With the help of your assistant, Agatha, and a cast of brilliant engineers like the self-taught Ida, you’ll bring your creative vision of progress to life while balancing the city’s needs and resources.

How to Play Steam City

Your journey begins with a warm welcome from Agatha, who will guide you through the essentials of city planning. Start by meeting key figures like Ida, a resourceful engineer who quickly points out that the builders already need your support. As mayor, you will complete the exciting task of building the city’s housing. Head to the construction workshop, select your first house and drag it onto the map. Every building requires a road for access, so plan strategically. From modest homes to grand residences, you will be able to design spacious, comfortable houses that cater to a growing population.

Resources are the lifeblood of your city’s development. Start by extracting natural resources like sand to produce essential building materials in your factories. When the sand runs out, you must activate the nearby quarries with a steam excavator to keep construction moving. You’ll face key decisions about which resources to sell on the market or export to neighboring cities to maximize your city’s income and growth.

To ensure your city thrives, you’ll manage a journal of tasks that will help you address urgent issues and develop strategic improvements. Completing tasks not only rewards you but also elevates your status as mayor, unlocking new opportunities and growth for your city.

As your city grows, connecting with fellow mayors becomes essential. Create a union and invite others to join, fostering a community where you can exchange resources, tackle challenges together, and discuss city issues openly. This collaboration can help you overcome obstacles and bring prosperity to all members.

A bustling city is a profitable one. Collect taxes from commercial buildings to expand your city’s territory, build new infrastructure, and grow your population. As your reputation and resources grow, you’ll have the opportunity to construct more advanced buildings, meet the rising demands of your citizens, and create a city that’s uniquely yours in Steam City.

More Games Like This

There are plenty more fun, casual games to choose from. Try a similar title from our building collection, like Global City, a game where you are once again the mayor of a town, and you’re tasked with managing resources, completing quests for rewards, and engaging with residents to make the town thrive. Other casual games include Empire City, where you build and grow a powerful empire from scratch in this strategic city-building game.

Contact

If you encounter any issues in the game, please contact support: support.steamcity.en@redbrixwall.com

How do you play Steam City?

Steam City is a classic building game, and the best way to play it is to follow all the initial cues and prompts that will help you build your empire.

Immortal: Dark Slayer is a top-down action RPG that puts you in the armor of a Fallen Knight, battling to purge the realm of demons, the undead, and creeping chaos. Drawing inspiration from the punishing combat of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, it delivers the same gritty challenge, reimagined with a top-down perspective and streamlined controls. Whether you're a seasoned RPG veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this dark fantasy adventure offers a thrilling, accessible experience.

How to Play Immortal: Dark Slayer

It’s just you, your blade, and your courage—facing off against waves of enemies, including some terrifying monsters from the depths.

You begin armed with a longsword, but as you collect coins and gain power, you’ll unlock stronger weapons to aid your quest. Combat is intuitive: stand near an enemy and your sword will automatically strike. Some foes fall with one hit; others demand persistence and precise timing.

Avoid taking damage. If enemies land too many hits, your health will drain, and you’ll fall. Dodge, retreat, and strike smartly to stay alive.

Each defeated enemy drops coins—grab them to upgrade your stats, including:

Damage – Hit harder, destroy faster
Health – Increase your resilience
Speed – Move and dodge more quickly

Worship one of three gods to gain powerful passive abilities:

Dora, Goddess of Light – Heals a small percentage of your health every 0.5 seconds
Vlac, God of Death – Regain 7% health each time you kill an enemy
Egoism, All for You – Boost all attributes by 10%

There are several doors to unlock, but this can only be done when you have successfully destroyed your enemies. No level is complete until the last enemy falls.

More Games Like This

Keep the action alive with some of our more popular titles like Tanks Arena io: Craft & Combat, where you are in the heart of a tank war; Iron Towers Alliance, a multiplayer tower defense game; or Autogun Heroes, an arcade game where it's you against aliens.

MMA Manager 2 is a dynamic sports management simulation where you take charge of building an MMA empire. Hire top-tier trainers, equip your gyms with cutting-edge gear, and plan strategic fight plans. Scout talented fighters, recruit rising stars and guide them to championship glory. Every decision shapes your path to becoming the ultimate MMA manager.

How to Play MMA Manager 2

To become a champion in MMA Manager 2, you’ll need to start small, build your skills, and work your way up to owning a top-tier gym. Begin by recruiting your first fighter through the roster, where you can either hire a premade fighter or create your own from scratch. When making a fighter, you’ll first choose a weight class and skin type: these don’t affect performance. Then, customize your fighter’s identity with their name, hometown, and country of origin. Next, select a fight-style background, which determines their initial skill set.

Fighting Styles and Primary Skills:

Wrestling: Punches, takedowns, ground grappling. Wrestlers dominate ground positions, delivering powerful blows while keeping opponents pinned.

Taekwondo: High kicks. A risky style relies on complex, high-impact kicks that can be devastating when executed effectively.

Muay Thai (Elbows): Elbows, clinch work. Close-combat specialists use clinches and swift elbow combos to wear opponents down.

Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ): Takedowns, ground grappling, submissions. BJJ fighters control ground situations and force opponents to submit with painful holds.

Kickboxing: Punches, low kicks. A striking style blending fast punches and relentless low kicks to overwhelm opponents.

Muay Thai (Knees): Knees, clinch work. Knee-focused Muay Thai fighters deal significant damage with precision strikes during close combat.

After recruiting, your fighters will begin competing in matches, but their actual growth happens in the gym. Train them to enhance their strengths or develop new skills. Training uses stamina, which gradually replenishes over time but cannot exceed a fighter’s maximum capacity. Check stamina levels in the gym view using the stamina ring, and ensure you’re training fighters as soon as they’re ready.

Each match becomes progressively more complex, requiring strategic planning and practical training. Winning fights brings you closer to becoming a professional and achieving your dream of owning the best gym in the business!

More Games Like This

Explore some of our most exciting sports titles, starting with Basketbros, a fast-paced basketball game offering both online and offline gameplay. Next, try A Small World Cup, a mini-soccer game where you control a ragdoll and launch it across the arena to score goals. For a unique twist on soccer, check out Soccer Random, a two-player pixel-art soccer game with limited controls but endless randomness.

Controls

Use the left mouse button to play.

FAQ
How to recruit more fighters in MMA Manager 2?

To recruit more fighters in MMA Manager 2, you will need to go to your roster and choose one of the fighters by selecting recruit.

What does agility do in MMA Manager 2?

Agility gives you more leeway in MMA Manager 2, increasing your chances of match wins.

Is agility important in MMA Manager 2?

Each characteristic offers a different set of skills to defeat your opponent in MMA Manager 2. Agility is important as is endurance and other characteristics.

AFK Dungeon: Idle Action RPG is an idle RPG that challenges you to craft the ultimate hero through smart combinations of items, skills, and traits. Dive into dungeons, grow stronger while you're away, and return to unleash powerful upgrades. Your strategy shapes the journey—mix, match, and conquer every challenge that stands in your path.

Features

■ Vast 3D RPG Adventure

Experience a strategy game in 3D! Enjoy dynamic action with everything from characters to backgrounds fully in 3D!

■ Active and Mastery Skills

Enough with the same old, boring skills! With active skills as well as mastery skills, you can form your own play strategy.

■ Arena PVP Ranking Matches!

Test the abilities of the characters you've worked hard to level up. Compete for the championship in the arena against users from around the world!

■ Unlimited Dungeon Game

Gold Dungeon, Experience Dungeon, Tower of Trials, Mines, Ancient Altar, Labyrinth, Raid Dungeons, and more! Conquer numerous dungeons in your own style! You can play as much as you want, whenever you want.

■ Gather Companions!

It can be hard to handle all those enemies alone. Recruit heroes as your companions! Various heroes with unique traits will assist you.

■ An Idle Game You Control with One Finger

A must-have game for busy modern people! An idle system that makes you stronger automatically! Become the top protagonist in the fantasy world easier and faster than others.

How to Play
In AFK Dungeon, your character moves and fights all by itself. You don’t have to press anything to walk or attack. Just watch your hero go forward and fight the enemies!
If you want to use a special skill, just tap the skill button on the screen. These skills are strong and can help you beat big monsters. After you use one, you need to wait a little before you can use it again.
You’ll get gold and items even when you're not playing. When you come back, just tap the treasure or pop-up to get your rewards. Don’t forget to check your gear and make your hero stronger by leveling up.
There are also heroes who will help you in battles. You can unlock and hire them as you play more.
You don’t need to aim or dodge — the game takes care of that for you. Just tap, upgrade, and enjoy your adventure!

Merge Bistro is a delightful casual puzzle merge game where you can transform humble ingredients into culinary masterpieces. Start by harvesting crops like potatoes, sugarcane, and more, then use your fresh produce to cook mouthwatering meals that will leave your customers craving for more. As you progress, expand your farmland and kitchen, uncover new territories teeming with resources, and unlock unique chef characters to join your team. Every merge brings you closer to crafting the ultimate dining experience. With creativity and strategy, you’ll grow from a small-time farmer into the mastermind behind the town's largest culinary empire.

How to Play Merge Bistro

Merge Bistro is a fun merge empire game where you transform simple crops into delicious meals and build your dream restaurant, serving them food straight from the farm on which you began your journey!

You’ve discovered a magical place full of life and shiny objects. Start by merging ladles to reveal surprises. From there, merge leaves to unlock potato plants. Combine three potato plants to create larger ones and grow your harvest. Collect your potatoes and send them off to be transformed into mouthwatering baked potatoes.

As you progress, you’ll transition from farmer to chef, symbolized by a chef’s hat appearing on your board. The focus shifts to creating your restaurant. Build it from the ground up by merging resources like wood logs to construct the frame of the restaurant building and furniture. Along the way, you’ll discover treasure chests containing useful items like knives, logs, plants, or rare resources. These treasures will help you merge and expand faster.

Don’t forget to claim daily free items from the marketplace to keep your progress steady—complete quests such as constructing new buildings to unlock exciting rewards and further grow your restaurant.

With each step, you’ll grow closer to building a thriving culinary empire, starting from a handful of crops and expanding into a bustling bistro. Merge, cook, and watch your vision come to life!

More Games Like This

There are plenty more puzzle games to explore. Try a few of our favorites, including Fairyland Merge & Magic, a puzzle casual merge game where you are sure to feel creative; Tropical Merge, the ultimate tropical paradise gameplay; or Zoo Boom, a puzzle mission-based game with challenges sometimes easy, sometimes not so easy.

How to Play Merge Restaurant

Your name is Mina, and you've got a new job. You’re in charge of a restaurant that is in a fantastic location, so it has a ton of potential, but it is in disarray as it was once shut down by a "strange man" and abandoned for some time. The only hitch is that this new restaurant is in worse shape than you thought, so you need to put in significant effort to clean it up.

How do you clean up the restaurant?

Merge Restaurant is an interactive merge game in which you combine objects to create new ones or to restore or clean them up. It’ll take some time to get this place back in shape and ready for customers, but that is your challenge. All the restaurant needs is your loving touch to breathe life back into it.

You will need to wash tables, dust, replace furniture, and revamp the menu, all by merging items within the restaurant using your left mouse to click and drag. You merge to get what you need. Since the restaurant requires a lot of clean-up, you will get quite a few sponges to merge. Keep combining so you get even more useful items. The more you combine, the more unique and practical items will appear.

Once you get your first restaurant in shape, you can move on to bigger and better restaurants and use your pro skills while you follow roller coaster love stories of the "strange man" who seemingly wants to shut your restaurant down.

Sugar Heroes is a puzzle match-3 adventure that plays as sweet as it sounds. Join a quirky crew of lovable characters, each with their own charm, as you dive into a world bursting with vibrant colors, tricky obstacles, and endless fun. Plan your moves carefully to outsmart puzzles and rack up those sweet victories. Whether you're competing in multiplayer tournaments, completing daily challenges for epic rewards, or exploring an ever-expanding map of fun-filled levels, there’s never a dull moment. With every match, you’ll uncover new mechanics, surprises, and sugary delights that keep you hooked.

How to Play Sugar Heroes

In Sugar Heroes, your goal is to collect cakes, jellies, and other sweet treats by matching elements on the grid. The more strategic you are, the more goodies you can collect. By matching pieces next to your goal items, you’ll boost the count and get even more of them in each move. It’s a classic match-3 game with a twist. Plan ahead and think fast because sometimes it’s about acting first and thinking later!

The game features a variety of fun pieces like watermelon, cupcakes, popsicles, donuts, and more. Each match you make is part of a larger story where you must rescue your adorable friends from tricky situations. These challenges are woven into the puzzles, making each level feel fresh and exciting. And it’s not always about matching just three – sometimes, the rules change as you progress, and the grids get more complex.

You’ll need to clear levels by accumulating points from your matches to win. After each round, you’ll earn rewards like coins or soda bottles, which will help you progress. Plus, as you advance, the grids and rules evolve, adding new layers of strategy to the game.

One of the game’s magic tricks is the lollipop – swap it with any piece on the grid to remove all the same-colored elements, clearing the board in a flash! Get ready to match, strategize, and enjoy the sweet adventure of Sugar Heroes.

Autogun Heroes is an action arcade platformer game that throws you into the heart of an alien-infested battleground alongside a team of fearless heroes. Armed with overloaded weapons and the ability to stack endless upgrades, you’ll blast through relentless waves of enemies in a vivid, fast-paced world teeming with chaos. Every step forward demands sharp strategy, quick reflexes, and the right gear to overpower the alien onslaught. Whether you’re unleashing devastating firepower, unlocking new abilities, or leading your squad into battle, the fight to reclaim your home is as intense as it is exhilarating.

How to Play Autogun Heroes

Autogun Heroes is a vibrant, action-packed shooter where the chaos never stops, and your eye-patched, muscle-bound hero, Gus, is on a mission of vengeance. The game features automatic shooting, so your focus is all about movement and aim—use the WASD keys to navigate, the space bar to jump, and press down to drop. As you blast through enemies, you’ll travel across dynamic levels filled with surprises, enemies attacking from all directions, and plenty of opportunities to prove your skills. At the edge of each area, you’ll be transported to new sections of the battlefield, keeping the action fresh and intense.

Along the way, you’ll unlock a cast of epic characters, each with their own unique flair and abilities, like Odessa, the masked undercover spy, Doc Justice, the gunslinging cowboy, and Spark, a plasma-wielding inventor. To access these heroes, you’ll need game credits, which you can earn as you progress. Power up your gameplay with easy-to-earn upgrades like bullet power, increased hit points, or veteran status. Advanced skills are also available through Alien DNA upgrades, giving you access to a robust skill tree to enhance your strategy.

Throughout the game, you’ll encounter thrilling perks like poison attacks, bullet wall bounces, and even the rare chance of a headshot for instant kills. Watch ads to unlock certain stages or cool off between battles. Equip items at basecamp, upgrade your gear between levels, and take the fight to the Galactic Alliance worlds to free them from the clutches of the Vortex Invaders. With enemies swarming from above, below, and all around, quick reflexes and sharp aim are your keys to survival in this non-stop, adrenaline-filled adventure.

Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks is a casual puzzle solitaire game whose objective is to stack all cards on the game table in sequence. This game is ideal for card players, especially solitaire fans, as it is intuitive to pick up quickly with similar solitaire gameplay but with a slight twist—cards are not in laid out the same way, suits don't matter and rank order can go from high to low to high again!

How to Play Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks

The aim of the game is to match cards by rank. Tap a card that is either one rank higher or lower than the card you are working from. For example, if you have a 5, you can play a 6 or a 4. This sequence can continue in either direction (e.g., 4 → 5 → 6 or 6 → 5 → 4).

The Table Setup

The game begins with a dynamic layout of cards on the table, blending uncovered cards. You can play with covered cards waiting to be revealed. Your objective is to build sequences using only the uncovered cards, so strategize carefully to unlock new possibilities.

At the bottom of the game board, you’ll find your home base card, the foundation of your sequences. Every move you make starts here, guiding your progress through the game. Next to your home base is the deck of cards, your lifeline when you run out of moves on the table. Draw from this deck to refresh your strategy and keep the game moving forward.

Pay close attention to how the cards are arranged, and start planning your moves to reveal hidden opportunities and outsmart the deck!

Suits don’t matter, so you can match cards regardless of their suit, focusing solely on their numerical value.

The key to winning is to strategize your moves. It’s often best to start with a lower-numbered card so you have more flexibility to build sequences. Aim to clear as many cards as possible with each move by carefully planning increases and decreases (e.g., a sequence like 4 → 5 → 4 → 6 removes multiple cards).

If no moves are available, you will be prompted to draw a card from the deck. The card you draw becomes the new card you must build from. If no uncovered cards are playable, you’ll also need to draw from the deck.

The game becomes more challenging as you go. Occasionally, you may receive prompts to add five more cards to the table, increasing the difficulty. If you make a move you regret, use the Undo button to revise your strategy.

Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks Tip

If you have several sequence options, prioritize moves that remove the most cards from the table or deck. For example, a sequence like 4 → 5 → 4 → 6 can clear more cards than a straight increase like 4 → 5 → 6.

There are plenty of games worth a try, which include Backgammon Online, a timeless board game brought online with all the original rules; Bubble Shooter, a match-3 colored pop bubble game; or Tile Guru, a tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation.

Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.

How to Play Tile Guru

Tile Guru is one of those addictive games that you find yourself playing for hours, day after day. The aim of the game is fairly simple - you need to match sets of three tiles of the same suit.

You'll start with a colorful array of fruit-themed tiles—grapes, watermelon, apples, cherries, and more. Click on each tile, and it will fall into the tile holder section. Once you get three matching tiles in the tile holder, they will disappear to make room for more. Early levels keep things simple, as all tiles are the same, making it easy to match a set of three. As the levels continue, the challenges get harder.

Your tile holder is where the magic happens, and it is the part that requires the most strategy. The tile holder holds up to 7 tiles—if the holder fills up with unmatched tiles, the game is over! You will need to make sure you get as many similar tiles as possible, so be careful what you click on.

As you progress, the challenge ramps up. Tiles become layered, so you’ll need to think strategically about which ones to free up first. If you grab too many unmatched tiles, you might run out of space before completing your sets. Plan ahead, keep an eye on your available space, and aim for those perfect matches to clear the board!

More Games Like This

Some of our more popular titles include Little Alchemy, where you merge basic elements to create new and much more powerful ones; and Happy Wheels, a wild ragdoll physics game where your goal is to survive each level without losing your limbs. Slice Master is a one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything.

How many tiles do you have to match in Tile Guru?

You need to match three tiles in Tile Guru for them to disappear off the board.

If you hold more than six tiles in your holder in Tile Guru, you will not pass the round. Seven is the max.

Bro Royale is an action battle game that takes shooting to the next level, blending heart-pounding survivor action with fierce PvP showdowns. Get ready for electrifying arena battles where every move matters, and the chaos keeps you on your toes. Whether you’re going solo in the adrenaline-pumping "1 vs All" mode or teaming up for high-stakes "2 vs 2" brawls, this game delivers non-stop action. Unleash your bro force, master tactical gameplay, and lead your clan to glory in multiplayer shootouts and epic team fights. It's your mission to reclaim the arena from the grip of mayhem—courage is everything.

How to Play Bro Royale

Bro Royale's adventure begins with action-packed missions designed to test your reactivity and strategy. The first mission tasks you with neutralizing enemies and looting 30 coins to prove you're an outstanding soldier. Next, it’s you versus three rival bros in a race to collect the most coins—using your skills and smarts to outmaneuver and outscore the competition.

To stay sharp, activate auto shooting with the F key, allowing you to focus on movement and precision aiming—lay traps to outwit your foes and keep an edge in every skirmish. But beware—the deeper you venture into challenges, the tougher your opponents become. Rival bros aren’t your only threat; lurking enemies want your coins and your downfall. Protect your stash and watch your back for surprise attacks.

Every match rings with the chaos of gunfire and the thrill of victory, a battlefield where strategy and quick reflexes decide the outcome. Bro Royale isn’t just a shooter—it’s a battleground of cunning, skill, and camaraderie. Assemble your squad, master your tactics, and rise through survival and battle royale modes. Whether fighting solo or teaming up, every encounter is an opportunity to outplay, outlast, and dominate.

Bro Royale is where glory is won, chaos is conquered, and the bro force reigns supreme. Victory can be yours if you want it.

Why play?

💥 Dynamic Shooter Battles: Dive into adrenaline-pumping shootouts, where PvP & PvE clashes promise relentless action.

💪 Diverse Characters and Arsenal: Arm yourself with an extensive array of weapons, choosing characters with unique skills to dominate the battlefield with the power of bro force.

➡️ Strategic Combat: Employ cunning strategies and weapon mastery to outwit opponents in battle royale and survivor games, crafting a path to liberation.🔝 Victory and Domination: Stand alone or ally with clans in your quest to conquer the multiplayer arena and liberate it from adversaries.

🤝 Co-op and Competitive Modes: Experience the thrill of teamwork in cooperative modes or the rush of solo competition, showcasing the strength of bro force.

🎩 Non-stop Action: Earn rewards, upgrade your arsenal, and climb the ranks in a world of continuous PvP challenges, fighting for liberation.

🤘 Hardcore Challenges: Test your mettle against the toughest adversaries in strategic battles and bullet confrontations, leading the bro force to victory.

Deadly Descent is an exciting driving simulator game where you will need to speed your way through impossible-looking obstacles! They are difficult, but not impossible. Your goal is to reach the finish line, whether you can get through dangerous obstacles or not-so-dangerous ones. Any collision will likely destroy your car. Precision is key to survival, making this game ideal for anyone seeking a thrill.

How to Play Deadly Descent

Prepare for the most intense, destructive races of your life in Deadly Descent.

You will be on a dirt road track or similar landscapes with nothing but speed in your control.

Most of the races will leave your car completely destroyed, smashed, flipped, torn apart, catapulted off the edge, or worse. But the key is to get there first. Yes, it may sound odd, but your goal is to be the fastest in the race and survive as best you can with a banged-up car rather than suffer a fatal off-road accident.

Keep your speed steady. Going fast will help you reach the finish line quickly, but it can also generate the force to destroy your car if you lose control.

Give yourself enough time to brake and navigate obstacles such as smashing levers, spiked rolling crushers, sporadic crates, and more. If your car flips, you can survive if it gets banged up, no problem. But if it hits any of these objects at full force, you are likely not going to make it out of the round in one piece.

Each round offers new obstacles to overcome, challenging your reflexes and strategy as you push your car to the limit.

Features
Destructible vehicles
Refined physics and detailed graphics
Unique tracks and endless challenges
The experience is highly realistic while remaining optimized to run smoothly on both phones and computers.

How to Play Night City Racing

Race against the competition

Super Star Car is a driving Formula 1 racing game that puts you in the driver’s seat of high-speed action with a vast selection of cars and iconic circuits. Start your career as a professional racer and climb the ranks through thrilling campaign races, upgrading your car to enhance performance along the way. With simple controls that let you navigate sharp corners effortlessly, stunning 3D graphics, realistic engine sounds, and customizable camera views, the game offers an immersive and adrenaline-packed experience.

How to Play Super Star Car

Super Star Car is all about speed, precision, and strategy as you race through an exciting career mode. Every time you finish a race in this mode, you’ll earn stars and money, helping you climb the leaderboard and unlock new opportunities. Use your winnings to upgrade your car strategically, boosting its performance and ensuring that every race feels fresh and thrilling.

The game features several tracks, each with its own unique challenges. You can select from iconic maps such as Arcport Circuit, Yafield Park, Riverside Circuit, and many more. Each track will test your skills, particularly when it comes to navigating those sharp curves. As expected, corners are the most challenging part of the game: you’ll need to hold your steering steady to maintain control. If you find yourself off the track, simply press the space bar to reset and get back into the action.

To aid your racing strategy, there’s a mini-map in the bottom-left corner of your screen, giving you a sneak peek at upcoming turns and obstacles so you can prepare ahead. Keep an eye on your speedometer, located at the bottom-right corner, to adjust your pace and avoid spinning out on tight bends.

One of the standout features of Super Star Car is its multiple view modes. You can race from a bird' s-eye view, chase your car from behind, or fully immerse yourself in the action by switching to the driver’s seat view. This versatility lets you experience the game from different perspectives, adding to its excitement and variety.

The heart of the game lies in its career mode, where every win brings you closer to the coveted championship trophy. It’s not just about crossing the finish line first; it’s also about improving your car with carefully chosen upgrades. A better-performing car will help you dominate tougher races as you progress through the campaign.

Get ready to tackle adrenaline-pumping tracks and outmaneuver your rivals.

MX Offroad Master is a driving bike game where you cycle down steep mountain slopes. Hop on any of the four mountain bikes and get ready for high-octane stunts. You can play either free ride or mountain ride game modes, and there is the option to play locally with a friend or solo.

How to Play MX Offroad Master

Tackle the mountains

Ready, set, go! This fantastic downhill bike adventure features daring tracks high up in the hills and features retro PS1-era vibes. Tackle various terrains skilfully without crashing your bike. It's important to balance speed and control, so do use your brakes: any minor hit will result in having to restart from a checkpoint and, after three hits, you are out and must start from scratch.

Kit out your character

What is all this in-game currency for? Well, head over to the shop to find out. You can use the gold coins and the rarer rubies to buy all your biker gear. Buy new bikes, helmets, costumes, and chains to outfit your character fully.

Invite a friend to play

MX Offroad Master features a local two-player mode in both of the available game modes. That means you can challenge your friend to downhill races on choppy mountains or have fun in the stunt arena doing crazy moves on your bikes.

MX Offroad Master game modes
Mountain ride: the mountain ride mode times you as you progress down the track. Once you reach the end, you earn in-game currency and can move to the next mountain course. There are 14 different levels in this mode.
Free ride: what if you want to practice your stunts and movement skills? That’s where free rides can help. In free ride mode, you can tackle obstacles at your leisure while earning in-game currency for doing various stunts.

If you’re up for a high-speed chase throughout a cityscape, then Escape Road, a getaway driving game, is right up your alley. This high-speed car chase game will get your adrenaline pumping as soon as you put your foot on the gas. Police cars will start tailing you from the moment you get on the road, and stay alert because they will show no mercy.

How to Play Escape Road

You’ve just pulled off a heist, and now the streets are your battleground. Police cars are everywhere, armored trucks are lurking, patrol choppers circling the sky, and they have one objective: to chase you down! If you want to retain your freedom, you will need to keep your eye on the road, steer the wheel flawlessly, and maintain quick reflexes. One wrong move and they will surround you. The goal is simple: don’t stop, don’t get caught, and see how far you can go before the city swallows you whole.

From the moment you hit the gas, the pressure never lets up. You are behind the wheel of a getaway car in a city full of obstacles, including buildings, other cars, and, most of all, a large number of police vehicles on your tail.

Police close in fast, roadblocks appear without warning, and every corner could mean disaster. If the cops pin you in or you crash into water, your escape ends instantly. The more rounds you can hold your own, the harder it gets, but luckily, victory also comes with upgrades. Look for cash throughout the city, and collect it during your escape to earn even more

Upgrades include faster cars, which help you escape with even more speed. But speed isn't everything. Lose control of your car, and you will quickly get cornered by the cops, which means it’s straight to jail for you.

Drift Hunters is a free-to-play car 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks.

Choose from a wide selection of customizable rides, fine-tune your engine, and hit the gas as you glide around corners and perfect your drift technique in 10 unique and challenging locations. Get ready to leave your mark on the asphalt, literally!

How to Play Drift Hunters

You start Drift Hunters by selecting your car and the type of ride you want to take. You can upgrade the performance, including the brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine, with superior parts. You can also finish off your car in any color and enjoy a selection of rims on the house.

The key to this game is scoring points by drifting your car. The more you drift, the more points you get, which you can then spend in the garage to fine-tune your car.

Race Tracks: Drift through diverse circuits like Nishuri, Stadium, Tyshen, and more. Each track offers a unique layout with varied curves and turns, challenging your drifting skills to the max.

Cars: Rack up at least 8,500 points to start unlocking cars, with the top model costing over 134k points. Every drift and upgrade gets you closer to that dream ride! If you are a beginner, you might find that it is better to focus on optimizing the performance of entry-level cars before investing all your cash on a new ride.

Drift Hunters available cars:

BMW M3
Toyota Supra
Honda S2000
Ford Fiesta ST
Nissan 370Z coupe
Dodge Challenger Hellcat
Nissan GTR
Porsche 911 GT
And 18 more cars...

Parts & Upgrades: Customize your vehicle’s performance with upgrades to brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine.

Tuning: Adjust your car’s fine-tuning settings, including front and rear camber, offset, brake balance, height, and brake pressure, to perfect your drift style even without additional upgrades.

Visuals: Express your style by customizing the color of your car’s body and rims, and select from a range of rim designs to complete your look.

Every car you buy can be fully tuned: turbo, brakes, engine, gearbox and weight can range from "street" level, the lowest, to the "pro", which is also the most expensive. You can fully modify these values to find the best tuning for your drift performance.

Some tracks allow you to keep drifting much more easily than others. The best tracks for drifting in Drift Hunters are Emashi and Forest because of their long corners and lack of too many sharp turns. The Forest track features the longest corners, allowing for the most prolonged drifts.

The longer you drift, the more your points multiplier increases. You can use the points to buy exotic motors like the high-performance Porsche 911 GT. There are 26 fully customizable cars available to buy in total. 

Drift Hunters has a smooth arcade-racer feel but isn’t constrained to a racing format. Instead, you can blaze your own trail in several locations, racking up points to buy new cars and upgrades. The graphics are great for the web, but you can play the game on low-spec devices without a hiccup. It’s a must-play for drift enthusiasts!

Tips
Use acceleration cautiously when approaching corners mid-drift
Drift from side to side on straight roads to keep the drift alive
Tune up your vehicles to find the sweet spot for maximum drift
Drive on maps with plenty of space for long, uninterrupted drifting

Browse our drifting games and car games for more!

Fighter Aircraft Pilot is a super realistic flight simulator game, part of our driving airplane collection. Sit in the cockpit of some of the most iconic aircraft in aviation history. Begin your mission by choosing your plane and mastering the intricate controls as you gather speed for a flawless takeoff. Feel the thrill of precision flying as you soar through the skies, honing your skills in an immersive simulation that captures the excitement and challenge of piloting a legendary fighter jet.

How to Play Fighter Aircraft Pilot

Fighter Aircraft Pilot is an exciting flying simulator game where you take the pilot seat, mastering multiple controls for a safe take-off and flight. The graphics are pretty realistic and easily become addictive.

There are two dynamic game modes to choose from: Free Fly and Missions. In Free Fly mode, you can select from an impressive array of fighter planes, including iconic models such as the A29, A10, F35, and KC-10, as well as legendary WWII planes and cutting-edge jets, for an immersive flight experience that lets you explore 3D simulation at your own pace. Soar through the skies, experience the thrill of piloting an aircraft, and enjoy the landscapes below. Well, that is if you don't crash.

By the way. You will crash. Gameplay is addictive, but it is not simple, and the challenge of finding the right balance is what keeps you coming back.

The controls are designed for both ease of use and realism, with E to start the engine, 1 or 2 for throttle adjustments, X to remove the brake, and the down arrow to initiate flight after achieving the right speed. Timing and slight movements to control your plane are everything.

Use the left mouse button to fire at your target, switch weapons with the mouse scroll, and drop bombs by pressing L. Additional controls include V to toggle lights, 5 to dump fuel for added maneuverability, and 6 to refill your fuel reserves. For high-speed action, activate the afterburner with I and use P for reverse thrust, while the space bar serves as your brake for smooth landings.

It's not easy, so do as much free flying as you can to get a feel for flight.

For those craving a bit more of a challenge, the Mission mode presents ten missions where you'll need to target and bomb specific objectives. Precision and skill are paramount as each flight tests your tactical prowess and flying capabilities.

Get ready to take to the skies, embrace the adrenaline of aerial combat, and master the art of flying.

Bon voyage!

More Games Like This

Continue to soar in one of our popular airplane game titles Cuphead, where you control a warplane carrying Cuphead in one of the biggest boss battles. If you want to stay closer to the ground, a few more popular driving games include Mr Racer, Drift Hunters, or Moto X3M.

Polytrack is a classic car racing game with a slight twist. You race a car you've customized, on a track you might have designed yourself. This is a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts.

Inspired by TrackMania, it challenges you to race against the clock, constantly striving to improve your time on various tracks built by you and the Polytrack community! It doesn't get any more hands-on than that.

How to Play Polytrack

You can race on the racecourses you've designed, but it's probably easier to start with the existing ones. You not only have to think about beating your own record when it comes to time, but you also need to master the craft of building for speed and precision.

Start by creating your track using the game’s design tools or choosing from pre-made tracks. Customize the track with various obstacles, ramps, and curves to suit your preferences. Don't know exactly what track to build? Get help from the Polytrack community. There are plenty of forums that share design codes and customization tips.

With a built-in level editor, you can unleash your creativity by designing custom tracks. You can also export and share these tracks with others for endless racing (and design) fun.

The game will require time and patience, as you don't just go into it like other driving games, with your foot on the pedal and ready to rev and drift. Initially, the easiest tracks to build are straight lines, but as soon as you get the hang of it, you will have a track jumping over mountains, sending your car and score soaring.

You can also customize your vehicle by choosing a primary and secondary color, as well as the color of the car frame and rims.

A series of premade tracks is available for those who want to begin practicing and getting a feel for other designs.

PolyTrack Unique Features

When selecting a track, you can see the best lap times recorded by verified players on it and measure yourself against them.

One cool feature that differentiates PolyTrack from other driving games is the opportunity to challenge opponents asynchronously, by selecting them from the leaderboard before starting the game, and seeing them as “ghosts” as you race the track. You can also challenge yourself by shaving off some decimals from your best time and then have your car “ghosted” on the track.

Available Tracks

There are currently 15 Official tracks and 22 Community-made tracks:

Official tracks:

7 summer tracks
4 winter tracks
4 desert tracks

Community tracks:

9 summer tracks
4 winter tracks
9 desert tracks

The driving experience remains unaltered, independent of the track season: what changes is the scenery surrounding the track.

More Games Like This

Once you've mastered building your tracks, you can enjoy these other thrilling driving games: Moto X3M, where you experience high-octane motocross action with challenging courses, stunts, and exciting levels, or Drift Hunters, where you test your drifting skills in this game that features a variety of cars and tracks designed for perfecting those thrilling drifts.

Moscow Metro Driver 3D is a driving simulator that lets you experience what it's like to be a metro driver in the tunnels of Russian underground transport.

Your job is to transport riders safely to and from their destinations, handling announcements, doors, and of course, speed.

How to Play Moscow Metro Driver 3D

Congratulations, you are the train driver of one of the longest metros in the world! In Moscow Metro Driver 3D, you’re responsible for getting passengers safely through the underground tunnels of the Russian capital. Don’t worry, you’ll get a full tutorial and training.

You have quite a sophisticated dashboard to work with, with features like switching camera views to see the train in motion from the side, peeking inside the passenger cars, or looking straight ahead through the windshield. Feel free to explore each perspective as you make your run.

Before departing a station, use the door switch to open and close the doors. When the doors open, grab the megaphone and make an announcement to your passengers. After all, communication is key on a busy metro line.

Use the X scale to get the train moving. Keep an eye on your speed and don’t go above the limit, but don’t crawl along either, or you’ll never make it to the next stop on time.

When it’s time to stop, approach the platform carefully. The front of your train should be no more than 3 meters from the rail. Miss your mark, and you’ll find yourself with half the train in the tunnel and half out, not exactly a great look for a new driver.

Speed controls:

X1 – X4 are your forward speeds, with X4 being the fastest.
0 is neutral.
T1 – T3 control your braking, with T3 bringing you to a complete stop.

Once you’ve reached your desired speed, set it to 0 to maintain your pace.

Your current speed limit appears in red, while the following one shows in yellow. Keep an eye on both so you can start slowing down in time. You’ll also see how many meters remain in your route, giving you an idea of how much longer you’ll be driving.

If you stop too far from the platform railing, passengers won’t be able to board, and you won’t get the door signal. If that happens, ease the train forward a little until everything lines up.

And if you miss your stop altogether? Just keep going to the next station and be sure to make an announcement to your passengers.

More Games Like This

Explore our driving games to stay behind the wheel. Some of our more popular games include Moto X3M, a dirt bike challenge with plenty of obstacles; Drift Hunters, where speed is not optional; and Polytrack, a classic car racing game.

Last Updated

Sep 22, 2025

Controls

Train control:

Speed dial = move the controller on the left to the position "X1", "X2", "X3" or "X4"
Speed reduction = move the controller on the left to the position "T1", "T2" or "T3"
Start recording the informant = a button with a speaker on the bottom right
Doors = a button with doors on the bottom right (to open the doors, you need to be at the station, no more than 3 meters from the rail)
Camera = use camera button in the upper left corner
Switch headlights = a button with a light indication on the bottom right
Beep = hold down the button with the pipe from the bottom right

Walking through the stations:
