Mr Racer - Car Racing is a fast-paced driving game where you speed through traffic-packed streets in sleek supercars, taking on challenges to prove you're the ultimate racer.

How to Play Mr Racer

Start your racing journey with speed into the action! In Mr. Racer, there are various game modes that offer an exciting driving experience in a range of flashy automobiles. Speed your way through 5 unique locations, progressing your career as a racing driver and earning EXP to level up.

Game Modes
Challenge Mode: it contains 100 different missions, keeping the game fresh and offering new and tricky tasks. Most of the challenges are time-based. You earn back some time by overtaking other vehicles quickly.
Career Race Mode: you’ll compete against an AI racer to place first. There are no bonuses for fast overtakes, so focus on beating your opponent to complete the mission successfully. The ultimate reward in this mode is to “Become a Legend”.
Endless Mode: no limits here, drive as much as you can to obtain the highest score.
Free Ride: it can be used for practice and to improve your driving skills.
Chase Mode: chase the opposition down and show them who the master racer is! This mode features unlimited racing and focuses on your pursuit of opposing cars. It is locked at first, and it’s unlocked by 99.000 cash.
Time Trial: no opponents here, challenge yourself to score the best time. This game mode is also locked when you first start playing, and you can play it by unlocking it with 49.000 cash.

Buy and upgrade new vehicles

As you progress through the game and explore the various game modes on offer, you’ll earn money to buy new vehicles. There are various cars, some of which are incredibly fast. These newer vehicles will help you beat your opponents in races more easily.

You can also upgrade your vehicles with new paint jobs, wheels, lights, and wheel stances.

Tips

Close overtakes within a two-second window give score bonuses and, in some game modes, a time advantage. Be careful not to get too close to the other cars because, unlike other driving games, in this one, it’s game over as soon as you touch another vehicle.

Crazy Motorcycle is a driving game where you guide a noob rider on a high-speed motorcycle to the finish line. Navigate through thrilling levels, jumping over gaps and dodging obstacles. Get ready for an adrenaline rush as you tackle exciting challenges on your way to victory!

How to Play Crazy Motorcycle

Crazy Motorcycle combines Minecraft graphics with classic 80s arcade gameplay. Your movements are limited to left, right, up, down, and jumping. Simple but all crucial to your survival on this obstacle-ridden bike course. You also have control over the sound being on or off. Ah, the good old days were when choice was more tangible. The lack of frills is no measure of fun in this thrilling bike race in the sky.

There are four available worlds to play in, with different terrains and obstacles in each of them. In every world, there are 16 stages to complete before getting to the end.

The object of the game is to reach the finish line while avoiding obstacles and collecting rewards to fatten your final score. You will mainly be going straight with the occasional moves to the right and left to avoid hitting obstacles or, worse, meeting your fate with the abyss below you by falling off the race track.

You can't get away with a straight run, and even on level one, you must maneuver to avoid falling to your demise.

The race course is also not entirely linear, and there are breaks in the course with nothing below you but chance. This is where your jumps will come into play. The wider the gap, the more speed and jump you will need to cross the divide.

If you see a series of swerving roads ahead with moving obstacles, slow down to retain your balance and avoid getting knocked off the road. The key to moving items is to move with them, even if you get close to the edge. Not all items can be jumped over.

Grab the red flags along the road; they represent checkpoints and allow you to restart from there should you fall, while yellow flags let you collect coins, which you can use to buy new voxelated skins in the menu.

Lastly, you can compete against other players by checking your score against theirs in the leaderboard, also available in the main menu.

More Games Like This

Buckle up or wear your helmet and check out more of our driving games! Moto X3M takes you on a wild ride with daring motorcycle stunts and challenging tracks.

An additional option to drive a car is represented by Eggy Car, while if you are looking for a totally different alternative, you can try Little Alchemy.

Bus Driving Simulator is a fun driving bus simulation that puts you in the driver’s seat of a very large vehicle for exciting long routes and passenger transport missions. The landscapes and sounds are quite real, adding to the pressure of your time-sensitive pick-ups and drop-offs. Test your driving skills and aim to become the top bus driver in town.

How to Play Bus Driving Simulator

In Bus Driving Simulator, you’ll step into the role of a skilled (or maybe not so skilled) bus driver with twelve routes in two very different environments—mountain and city—choose one to begin with.

You start with a basic bus, but when you earn, you'll get to choose from an exciting lineup of buses and jeeps, including a turbo-boosted school bus for 15,000 coins, a double-decker DJ party bus for 25,000 coins, sleek two-floor buses that can fit more passengers, and even wild rides like the monster bus and a futuristic levitating bus. Some of these high-octane vehicles can also be unlocked simply by watching ads.

Mountain mode

In the rugged mountain mode, take on everyday tasks such as picking up workers from factories and guiding tourists through breathtaking landscapes, like a scenic water dam nestled among the hills. The winding roads and picturesque vistas will challenge your driving skills, making every trip an unforgettable adventure. Be careful not to get stuck because if you do, you'll have to start over.

City mode

Meanwhile, city mode thrusts you into the hustle and bustle of urban life. Navigate narrow streets, pick up commuters, and drop them off at their destinations, whether it’s a restaurant for breakfast or the office for a busy day ahead. You’ll have to master city traffic, pedestrians, and tight turns while keeping your passengers safe and satisfied.

With pretty realistic graphics, sounds, and dynamic gameplay, the Bus Driving Simulator brings the thrill of real-world bus driving to your mousepad. Conquer treacherous terrain, race through busy streets, and take on heart-pounding missions in a variety of weather conditions. With realistic physics and controls, every drive feels authentic—whether you’re cruising the city or tackling steep mountain roads.

Moto X3M is a driving bike game that takes dirt bike racing to the next level. It combines high-speed thrills with a test of precision and timing across 22 adrenaline-filled levels. Each course introduces fresh, intense obstacles from gravity-defying loops to dangerous ramps and explosive traps that keep you on the edge of your seat. Gear up, strap on your helmet, and prepare to perform stunts of a lifetime as you race against the clock.

How to Play Moto X3M

Sit back, hold on tight, and get ready for a thrilling bike ride (with pretty exciting music). Each level of Moto X3M ramps up the thrill with increasingly complex obstacles that require precision, skill, and, above all, patience. Don't get too distracted by the fun; every mistake comes at a price, and that price is time. And time is the key to nailing the coveted 3-star rating, where only the fastest, cleanest runs bring you victory.

Mastering each level means finding that sweet spot between speed, braking, and stunt work, all while dodging obstacles designed to slow you down.

Moto X3M offers 22 distinct tracks, each progressively challenging. While the early levels ease you, later tracks become obstacle-filled gauntlets of ramps, loops, and hazards. With each track’s unique layout, there’s plenty of replay value as you strive to beat your best time. The game can get pretty addictive.

As you conquer each course, you will earn stars and can use them to unlock two new bikes! It’s more than just a visual upgrade; new bikes give you added motivation to return to tracks and push for faster times and higher scores.

Moto X3M features vibrant 2D graphics, fluid physics-based animation, and a playful, slapstick tone. Crashes are humorous, with ragdoll physics and cartoon-style explosions keeping the action lighthearted. Each track has its own theme, from sunny beaches to underground caves, while energetic music and sound effects heighten the thrill of racing and performing stunts.

Push your speed to the max, but don't rush into unknown obstacles without caution. Every fall adds seconds, impacting your star rating. Aim to squeeze in as many air stunts as you can over big jumps to shave precious seconds off your final time!

Advanced Moves
Flips & Combos: Chain flips on long jumps to reduce your final time.
Back Wheel Boost: Landing on your rear wheel at the right angle gives a speed boost.
Timer Delay Trick: Wait for the perfect moment to start moving and effectively pause the timer.
Hidden Shortcuts: Some levels allow creative routes to bypass obstacles or save time.
Game Levels

Levels unlock sequentially, growing in difficulty from beginner-friendly ramps to extreme obstacles. Stars earned on each level unlock new bikes, adding visual variety and motivation to replay tracks. Checkpoints prevent frustration, letting you retry tricky sections without restarting the entire level.

Tips & Tricks

Keep your wheels on the ground for maximum speed when needed, but don’t hesitate to brake approaching tricky obstacles.

More Games Like This

There are many games in the Moto X3M series, like Basketball Legends and Basketball Stars. You can also browse our driving category and try popular titles where you drive fast in Snow Rider 3D. How fast can you go on ice? You can also test your driving precision in Eggy Car, where you are responsible for keeping an egg from falling out of your car, on the steepest of hills.

Features
22 levels with superb replay value
Various obstacles and challenges
Earn more stars for taking less time
Spend stars on new motorbikes
Developer

Developed by Ukraine-based MadPuffers (formerly FlashRush Games) in 2015, Moto X3M began as a Flash browser game and transitioned to HTML5 and mobile platforms. The “X3M” in the title is leetspeak for “Extreme,” reflecting the game’s daring stunts. Some levels hide Easter eggs, like secret vehicles or collectibles, rewarding curious players and adding replay value.

In addition to all the Moto X3M games, they have created smash hit basketball games like Basketball Legends and Basketball Stars.

There are six games in the Moto X3M series:

Complete each track as fast as you can: the time needed to get 3 stars is different on each level. Backflips reduce the total time by 0.5 seconds, so do as many as you can

How many Moto X3M games are there?

The Moto X3M series includes six official games: Moto X3M (2015), Moto X3M 2 (2015), Moto X3M 3 (2016), Moto X3M Winter (2017), Moto X3M Pool Party (2019), and Moto X3M Spooky Land (2019) though Moto X3M 2 and 3 are no longer available online, while the other titles can still be played on various gaming platforms.

With stylized cars and thrilling gameplay, you’ll race to conquer the ultimate title of driver extraordinaire.

How to Play GT Cars Mega Ramps

GT Cars Mega Ramps offers three exhilarating game modes: Face to Face, Mega Ramps, and Color Lands. Choose between single-player and two-player options, allowing for competitive racing fun with customizable exotic super-sport cars that you can tweak to your liking. Adjust the color panel, window tint, wheel designs, and light colors to make your vehicle truly unique.

In Face to Face mode, you and your opponent race side by side, but don’t let the simplicity fool you. This isn’t just a regular race; if one car crashes, the debris can take you down at full speed, resulting in an instant game over. Stay alert and swerve wisely, or you risk tumbling off the cliff's edge!

Color Lands presents a vibrant challenge as you navigate through roads resembling colorful Lego blocks. Obstacles lurk at every turn, and if you’re not careful, slowing down could send you spiraling into an abyss.

Mega Ramps is the ultimate test of your driving skills, packed with high-speed thrills and perilous obstacles. Dodge enormous rolling balls threatening to crush you and navigate walls made of crates and geometric shapes flying at you from all directions. It’s a wild ride that requires quick reflexes and sharp focus—so buckle up and prepare for an unforgettable experience!

Madness Cars Destroy is a high-octane car driving game packed with six thrilling modes. Push rivals off narrowing paths in Funnel, survive the spinning Rotating Cube, or dodge bombs in Deadly Arena. Outsmart opponents in Right Color, evade traps in Deadly Bouncers, and pass the explosive Hot Potato. Choose your ride and jump into intense, fast-paced action!

How to Play Madness Cars Destroy

Strap in for a wild ride in Madness Cars Destroy, where every race is a test of skill, strategy, and survival! Your car is placed on a Rubik’s Cube-like platform, suspended over an abyss: one wrong move, and you’re sent plummeting into the void.

Your challenges range from navigating checkpoints to knocking rival cars off the edge. As you progress, new landscapes unlock, including a spinning top, a full Rubik’s Cube, a collapsing floor, and more. Customize your car with spoilers, wheels, paint, tint, and suspension upgrades, but you’ll need to earn points before you can trick out your ride.

Some rounds challenge you to touch as many cars as possible by ramming into them before massive spiked balls knock you off the arena. If you get thrown off, you’ll face a brutal penalty: no car collisions for a full five minutes! In another high-stakes mode, you’ll choose between fleeing or attacking. Opt to shoot, and you’ll rain bombs from above, sabotaging the arena floor to send enemy cars tumbling into oblivion. Choose to flee, and you’ll be the one racing for your life!

Other challenges include chaotic bomb-passing rounds, where you must avoid detonation on a board packed with frantic cars. With relentless action and ever-changing obstacles, Madness Cars Destroy keeps you constantly on edge, testing your reflexes and strategy in every round

More Games Like This

Don't want to finish your ride? We have plenty of driving games for you to continue on your journey. Try popular games like Mr Racing where you make your way through busy streets at wild speeds. PolyTrack is another thrilling game with plenty of loops and jumps to challenge you. Crazy Plane Landing is not your typical driving airplane game—here, you take the pilot’s seat in a gravity-defying airplane and launch into the skies. There is a serene exhilaration of soaring when you get the hang of the controls, but it doesn't last long. You need to land! Every flight pushes your skills to the limit as you navigate unpredictable terrains and intense weather conditions. Will you make a smooth touchdown or end in a spectacular, fiery crash?

How to Play Crazy Plane Landing

Your main objective in Crazy Plane Landing is to take flight, avoid obstacles, and land your plane safely. This sounds easy enough, but there is a reason some airline pilots need over a thousand hours of flight time for certification. It isn't easy!

You’ll need to master both acceleration and steering with simple game gears—hold the left mouse button, space bar, W key, or up arrow to accelerate and gain altitude, giving your plane just enough speed to soar through the skies. As you navigate, use the left mouse button or the left and right arrow keys to steer your plane on course. There are arrows pointing to the destination landing strip. Take your hand off the acceleration and steer towards the landing pad.

Precision is key—smoothly adjust your trajectory to avoid obstacles and line up your approach for a perfect landing. The right balance between speed and direction will ensure a safe landing. Don't expect too many smooth landings to begin with. This game is called "crazy" for a reason.

You have a few airplanes to choose from but can only upgrade once you've accumulated a significant amount of points. Upgrades are well worth all the crashes that get you accumulated points. You not only get to choose your plane, but you can upgrade engines, boosts, and bonuses.

The better the plane, the more control you have over your speed and steering.

More Games Like This

There are plenty more driving games to continue the fun. Try Moto X3M, a bike racing game with 22 levels, each of which poses a new challenge and provides the opportunity to perform wild stunts on your dirt bike, or Drift Hunters, a 3D drifting game with an excellent selection of tracks and plenty of tuned-up cars.

Truck Simulator Russia is a 3D truck-driving simulation game where you can explore beautiful open-world environments while driving various trucks! Take delivery jobs and be a real Russian truck driver.

How to Play Truck Simulator Russia

Your objective is to transport cargo to and from different cities safely. Each job pays a certain amount, and collecting monetary rewards will help you upgrade your equipment for better driving. The more you earn, the more you can afford engine, brake, and steering upgrades.

Choose a city to start from and go to, and get ready for the ultimate road trip. You can select one of many cities on the Russian map, from Saint Petersburg to Krasnoyarsk, which is more than 4.800 kms away from it and close to the border with Mongolia. This is not a suitable game for a quick play: the minimum time commitment to complete one of the first missions is 15 minutes. As a reward for investing this large amount of time in Truck Simulator: Russia, you get highly detailed graphics, especially if you can tweak the settings and bring the detail to the maximum level, and a lively, entertaining game which will make you feel like you are really crossing the border between Europe and Asia at the wheel of a big cargo truck.

You can check your progress by clicking on stats, which will show you how much cargo you've delivered, how many trucks and trailers you've bought, how many car accidents you've had, and how much money you've earned.

Once you have earned money, head to the garage for a smoother ride and take in the landscapes.

Features
Start from a variety of locations throughout Russia
Take delivery jobs to earn a living and upgrade your skills
Purchase new trucks and trailers for a new look

Offroad Island is the ultimate driving truck simulation game that puts you behind the wheel of powerful trucks, rugged trailers, agile quads, high-speed bikes, and much more. Get ready to explore three vast, open-world environments, each filled with challenging terrains, hidden paths, and stunning landscapes. Perform daring stunts, collect valuable coins, and tackle tough trials to earn major rewards as you push your skills to the limit. With every twist, turn, and jump, the adventure gets more intense. Buckle up!

How to Play Offroad Island

Your goal in Offroad Island is to explore the map, gather gold, and complete races. There are three expansive, open-world maps, each offering its own set of challenges and terrains. From the stunt-filled Woodlands to the muddy, dense forests of MuddyHill, every map is uniquely designed to push your off-road skills to the limit. Whether navigating rugged trails, conquering steep hills, or mastering tight corners, these environments will keep you on your toes.

The game boasts a stunning collection of vehicles, ranging from iconic Cherokees and rugged Hummers to classic hotrods. But that’s just the beginning! You can also purchase quads, SxS vehicles, crawlers, bikes, and even hook-up trailers for your ride. Explore the premium vehicle collection for a selection of custom motors to make your off-road adventure even more thrilling.

Once you’ve chosen your vehicle, the true fun begins with a wide range of customization options. Personalize every detail—from the body and paint job to rims and tires. To enhance performance, tweak everything from engine power to weight distribution, suspension, and gearbox settings. The in-depth tuning menu lets you fine-tune each component to create the perfect off-road machine suited to your driving style.

The graphics in Offroad Island are quite realistic, where every terrain comes to life. As you drive, your vehicle’s wheels tear into the dirt, splashing mud and leaving behind a trail of debris that coats your ride. The suspension reacts dynamically to the ever-changing ground beneath you, providing a truly immersive experience. Whether you're conquering rocky hills or drifting through muddy swamps, the varied terrain ensures every ride feels authentic and challenging.

More Games Like This

Once your Offroad Island journey comes to an end, you can check out some more of our free roaming driving games or car games. Two other popular choices are Drift Hunters, a 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks, and Smash Karts, where you race, collect weapons, and blast rivals to unlock characters and rewards!

Demolition Derby 2 is an adrenaline-fueled driving game that puts you behind the wheel in a high-stakes battle for survival. Inspired by the chaotic excitement of demolition derbies across the globe, this game challenges you to smash, crash, and obliterate your rivals’ cars in a brutal quest for victory. Each match is a no-holds-barred competition where strategy meets sheer mayhem. Whether you’re slamming into opponents at full speed or maneuvering through wreckage to deliver the final blow, the intense action and bone-crushing collisions keep you on the edge of your seat. The goal is to outlast your competitors and reign supreme.

How to Play Demolition Derby 2

In Demolition Derby 2, your main objective is to survive the carnage by obliterating your opponents’ cars before they destroy yours. Jump into the driver's seat and start with a test drive to get yourself into the car of your choice. Practice both your offensive and defensive tactics so you can cause the maximum damage with minimal damage to your own vehicle.

You will start with the Tiny Classic car. Doesn't sound too intimidating, but you will need to work your way up to upgrades through various rides and crashes. The more damage you deal, the longer your gameplay and the better the rewards.

There are six classes of cars to choose from. You will begin in class 0, but with a bit of practice and a lot of teeth-gritting, you can slowly work your way to unlocking upgrades to truly feel the power of vehicular destruction.

Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer is an online multiplayer car driving game where you put your pedal to the metal and speed to unleash your inner daredevils. Hit the gas and tear across massive open maps filled with ramps, loops, and obstacles designed for challenging stunts. Whether racing at breakneck speeds or launching into mid-air tricks, the world is your playground—so buckle up and prepare for high-octane, multiplayer stunt action.

How to Play Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer

In Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer, you can either race solo or challenge others in an action-packed multiplayer mode. The game lets you fully customize your car to match your style, starting with fine-tuning the wheels and suspension. Adjust the front or rear chamber, tweak the spring force, and dial in the suspension settings to optimize your car’s performance.

For better handling, you can control steering assist features like TCS, ABS, ESP, or use the steering helper. You’ll also have fun customizing the appearance, choosing headlight colors and wheel smoke in striking red, green, or blue. Preview your car's smoke and flames for that extra flash as you pull off crazy stunts.

You have a large selection of cars to choose from, each car has a different unique ability to select your favorite and hit the roads. Show your friends that you are the ultimate driver with the best stunts in their arsenal.

When it comes to power, you’re in control of your car’s speed, torque, and brake settings. You can fine-tune the gear-shifting and clutch thresholds to ensure your car performs at its peak in every race.

Choose between three exciting modes—drift, racing, or arcade—to suit your playstyle. As you race across the map and perform outrageous stunts, you can change your car’s camera angle with the C key, offering multiple views, including aerial, side, front, or rear shots. These angles give you an edge in perfecting your stunts or lining up your next move.

With nine customizable cars, you can challenge your friends to out-drift and out-stunt your opponents. Or, kick things up a notch with wild stunts where the adrenaline reaches new heights!

There are certain moves that will get you stuck—it happens to the best of us. Just click the next or previous car to get out of that jam.

Wrong Way is a thrilling driving game where you can create your own race track! Customize vehicles and build your own routes using an inventory with various objects. A great innovation is the ability to save the created routes and be able to reuse or share them with other users via forums or other download channels.

How to Play Wrong Way

The gameplay and driving mechanisms of this wrong-way driver game remain the same, and the graphics and game engine used are also unchanged. Try out the other games first to understand how the cars handle and how to detect a wrong turn that could potentially derail your track design.

Available objects

Players start with a completely blank map. The only object is the parking garages and repair center. The parking lots and repair center can be moved anywhere on the map but this is the starting point of the race. Other objects available to place include:

Ramps
Warehouse units
Straight road sections
Corner road sections
Crossroad sections
T-Junction sections
Barrels
Crash barriers
Trees

As you can see there is a fantastic range of objects to place - the only thing missing is a police officer to chase you whilst racing! Players can design their track safely, to create fun racing circuits. Alternatively, they can develop a course designed for mayhem and creating a range of head on collisions using the ramps.

The landscapes used are reminiscent of Southern California and driving through your creation feels like you have spent years in the United States. Next, we look at the game controls.

Using the in-game controls

At first, the game controls may feel difficult to use. The WASD keys are used to move the camera view. Moreover, use the right-click mouse button to rotate the camera.

To select an object simply click it from the toolbar menu and click it again to place it on the map. To rotate an object, first click on it - the object will turn red and a rotate and remove icon will appear.

Each item can be placed and rotated individually. Road sections automatically join together which can help prevent wrong tracks being created. Ensure the road sections create a logical circuit to prevent vehicles headed in the wrong direction from crashing.

Available vehicles

Once a player has created their map, they can test it out or share it with others. Pulling off some awesome wrong way crashes or close race finishes is a great thrill, especially on your own map. The following vehicles are available for players to drive in:

Mercedes AMG
Porsche 911
Aston Martin
Nissan GT
Pick-up truck

The cars all have fantastic detail and look superb. Furthermore, they handle realistically and attain some scary top speeds. If the national highway traffic safety administration saw how you can drive with these cars, they would be outraged!

Give Wrong Way driving game a try today. See what amazing creations you can make and what daring and challenging track designs your mind can produce. Become a driving legend today and make your own dream course!

Release Date

October 2019

Developer

Wrong Way is made by Roberto Mulas (Ciorbyn). He has also made another cool car game, Derby Crash 2.

Steal Brainrot Online is a fast-paced, casual heist game where you collect rare Brainrot memes like Tralalero Tralala and Cappuccino Assassino, straight from the popular Italian Brainrot Clicker Game. You can buy Braintorts from the red carpet, sneak into other players’ bases to steal theirs, and protect your own with traps and locks. Use boosters, outbid opponents during deliveries, and rebirth for bigger rewards as you climb the leaderboard.

How to Play Steal Brainrot Online

At its core, Steal Brainrot Online is a game about building wealth and stealing it right back from other players from around the world, all of whom have the very same objective: to accumulate as many Brainrots as possible.

The way to collect Brainrots is to, well, steal them. If you want to keep it honest, you do have the option of buying Brainrots, but you will need money.

You start off with a little bit of money, and from there you can either purchase a Brainrot from the endless conveyor of marching meme prisoners, or skip straight to the chaos by raiding someone else’s base and snatching one for “free".

Once you steal a Brainrot, take it back to your base and place it proudly on a pillar, so that it slowly generates income as you will for more Brainrots. The more you collect, the faster your fortune grows. But if you do increase your collection, know that with wealth comes a large target on your back.

Just like you can steal from other people’s bases, other players can peek inside your base and see exactly what you’ve got, which makes your defenses, like locks and temporary shields, your only real line of survival. Shields only last sixty seconds before burning out, so every moment of safety feels fleeting.

Stealing is both tempting and dangerous. To take someone else’s Brainrot, you need to slip into their unlocked base, carry the prize on your back, and haul it to your own collection. But the act of stealing slows you down, strips away your item use, and instantly alerts the owner. You can be sure the owner of the Brainrot you’ve snatched will come after you, knock you on the head with a hammer, and you will fall to the ground, and lose the Brainrot.

If you get the alert, be sure to chase down the thief and use your own hammer.

Your progress only comes from balancing greed and caution. With enough Brainrots, money flows faster, letting you reinvest in more purchases, stronger defenses, and eventually rebirths that carry long-term rewards. But no matter how high you climb, the tension never fades because the server is full of players waiting for their chance to rob you blind.

This isn’t a cozy tycoon. It’s a social standoff disguised as a collection game, where half the fun is in the uneasy silence of players standing outside your cage, watching, and deciding whether to make their move.

Tip

If you get caught stealing in someone else’s base, use your home button (G on the keyboard) to transport you back home. And no, you can’t take the Brainrot with you this way.

This is an alternative version of the game by the name "Steal a Brainrot," which is on Roblox.

Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!

How to Play
Line up your shots carefully, and fire!

Starting with the basic arrows and baseline stats, you will be faced with various enemies. Some of these enemies are trickier than others to beat due to armor, position, and other factors. Occasionally, you will encounter a giant enemy. This is like a mini-boss level, and you will earn lots of skulls for defeating them.

Survive for as long as possible

Your goal is to survive for as long as possible and earn as many skulls as you can. The best way to survive for a long time is to keep hitting the apples. Throughout the game you will notice flying apples. Shoot your arrow through the apples to replenish your health, stamina, or both. Here’s how the apples work:

Red apple = health
Green apple = stamina
Golden apple = health and stamina
Customize your ammunition

There is an ever-increasing range of arrows to unlock the more you play the game. It’s best to keep playing and switching the arrow types to learn which ones are more powerful and suit your playing style. There is everything from electric and poison to balloon and axe and you can increase your arrow slots to hold more of them at once.

Use your skulls to upgrade your abilities

You earn skulls by killing enemies, which rewards a specific amount based on the power of the foe you defeated. You can upgrade your health, stamina, damage, and more using this currency.

Designville: Merge & Design is a casual game that takes you on a creative adventure to renovate and decorate various spaces. Tackle unique design challenges, craft stunning interiors, and turn your studio into the best in town. Unleash your creativity to bring your dream designs to life and grow your decorating empire!

How to Play Designville: Merge & Design

The objective of the game is to renovate the run-down home. Louise and Robin are renovating an abandoned house to transform it into a Design Studio, the best of Designville! After a brief intro of characters, you will be introduced to a board with multiple items. Most of which are cardboard boxes from the renovation. You'll open the boxes of stuff that Robin acquired for the renovation, and the items will be placed on the board.

Renovations are accomplished by merging items, designing, and decorating gardens. The grid is primarily filled with boxes, but other tiles are filled with random objects commonly found in a home, including coffee cups, pizza slices, rubber gloves, and more. Most of these items are covered in dust and cobwebs, and some can only be accessed on other levels.

Merging items and discovering new ones will earn you money that can be used to enable the renovation, clearing tasks from a to-do list which will eventually lead you to the renovated Design Studio. Once the Studio is up and running, Louise and Robin will start taking orders from clients, initially friends and acquaintances, and later referrals, and they will allow the Studio to expand its reputation and complete more complex tasks.

There is one object on the grid that is most important to begin merging: a yellow bag full of corkboard push pins. Left-click on the yellow bag to fill all empty board pieces with push pins. This is where you merge. Begin merging all push pins. It takes two push pins to create another object, an eraser. As you merge, you will get more free board space, so keep clicking and merging.

Potential merges and results:

2 corkboard push pins = 1 eraser
2 erasers = 1 Post-it note
2 post its = 1 ruler
2 rulers = 1 round ruler
2 protractors = 1 pencil
2 pencils = 1 highlighter
2 highlighters = 1 drawing compass
2 drawing compasses = 1 stapler
2 staplers = 1 color sample

Keep merging and find more and more new items.

Worldguessr is a casual quiz game, a free alternative to Geoguessr, perfect for testing and expanding your geography skills through immersive Street View exploration. Each round, you will find yourself dropped into random locations around the globe, with only environmental clues to guide you in pinpointing your exact whereabouts. From cityscapes to rural roads, your surroundings become the puzzle pieces you need to analyze, turning each game into a thrilling geographical investigation.

How to Play Worldguessr

In Worldguessr, each game starts by placing you somewhere on Google Maps, and if you can’t immediately guess where you are, which is likely the majority of the time as you often start on obscure, long, and winding roads, you can move around to gather valuable clues. Search for nearby landmarks, coastlines, street signs, architectural styles, and other geographical features that might give away your location. Anything with a bit of language, like signs or billboards, can be especially useful, helping you narrow down your guess to a specific country or region.

Worldguessr exploration goes beyond simple gameplay, offering an engaging way to enrich your geographic knowledge. Choose from hundreds of community-created maps tailored to different regions and themes, allowing you to travel from bustling metropolises to remote wildernesses. With unlimited rounds and a variety of challenges, you can play at your own pace or jump into multiplayer modes, where you’ll compete with friends or players worldwide.

For those moments when you feel completely stumped, Worldguessr offers a helpful hint feature. This hint won’t give away your exact location, but it will nudge you in the right direction by identifying the general part of the world—such as the continent—where you are. From there, the challenge is yours to explore, observe, and deduce the country, city, and even the town where you’ve been dropped, relying on your own skills to make the final call.

Once you make your guess, Worldguessr reveals just how close—or far—you were from the actual location, helping you refine your skills over time. This unique blend of learning and adventure makes Worldguessr perfect for geography enthusiasts, travelers at heart, or anyone who loves a good challenge.

Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!

How to Play Doodle Road

You start in Doodle Road by practicing drawing a straight line from the car to the target. Sounds simple, right? Wait until you see how straight your line really is! The true challenge is how easy it is for your car actually to drive across that path.

Next challenge – draw a line to the target, but now there's a wall in your way. Remember, your car can’t fly! So, think about how to draw your path – you don’t have to go over the wall; you can go under it! As you go, you'll see that drawing a straight line is harder than it looks. If you don’t start the line from behind your car, it’ll just dangle off into oblivion.

How do you get over an L-shape? Or a huge gap in the ground? And the challenges keep coming. By level 5, your engine shuts off, so you’ll need your physics brain to figure out how to use hills and momentum to get across.

Some levels have trampoline-like springs that’ll launch you toward your target. The challenges change each time, keeping you on your toes. Buckle up because it's going to be a bumpy ride, depending on how well you draw!

AOD - Art of Defence is a casual tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As Commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the charge against Mr. Ivil's ruthless thugs, determined to find the lost Inola project. With stunning isometric graphics, build your technological kingdoms and thwart the enemy's destructive ambitions. Will you save mankind or succumb to darkness?

How to Play AOD - Art of Defence

Your mission in AOD Art of Defense begins with an urgent message from Mr. Ivil—find the blueprints of the fabled Inola Project at all costs—even if it means reducing the city to rubble. Time is of the essence. Meanwhile, Ich Nevel warns of an imminent large-scale assault on your bases. The stakes couldn’t be higher, and it’s up to you to defend humanity’s last hope. You have one goal - to protect your base at all costs.

Dynamic battles ensure that every moment is filled with action. Combining elements of Tower Defense, RPG, and tactical strategy, the game features over 500 sectors for real-time warfare, offering a variety of environments—from small villages to massive abandoned megapolises. You’ll face challenges in exciting new Tower Defense modes like escape, fog, and survival.

The aim is strategically deploying siege houses, tanks, and armed trucks to stop enemy forces before they breach your defenses. With over 1,000 tower upgrades, including tanks, miniguns, and air defense systems, your arsenal is as vast as powerful. Along the way, you’ll unlock six unique heroes, each with their own abilities to level up and master. From nuclear bombs to ionic satellite strikes and ballistic barrages, a range of devastating boosters will turn the tide in your favor.

Every successful defense wave rewards you with crystals, essential for upgrading your arsenal. The longer you survive, the greater the rewards, but enemies will become stronger with each attack. Hundreds of card upgrades allow you to customize your towers for maximum efficiency, keeping your strategies fresh and adaptable.

Set in a near-future world devastated by nuclear wars, 70% of the population has been wiped out. The survivors face constant terror from Mr. Ivil, who has united gangs into a brutal army bent on finding the Inola Project blueprints. His forces leave no settlement untouched, robbing and killing indiscriminately. Your task is to stop them and save what remains of the planet.

In this endless survival mode, your tactics and preparation are key. Build your defenses wisely, place your siege houses strategically, and upgrade your resources to keep pace with the escalating challenge. Each location demands new strategies and better equipment, pushing your tactical skills to the limit.

Whether you’re battling through small villages or abandoned megapolises, the world's fate depends on you. With the power of innovative weapons, unique heroes, and an array of upgrades, you hold the key to humanity’s survival. Will you rise to the challenge?

How to Play Obby World: Squid Escape

Obby World: Squid Escape throws is a mix of parkour challenges, with each game different from the last. Each game tests your timing, balance, and quick thinking. The game begins by letting you choose from a set of different obstacle-based modes, each with its own style and surprises.

You’ll face multiple rounds of challenges, such as:

Red Light, Green Light: The classic stop-and-go test. Run when the light is green, freeze when it’s red. Move at the wrong time, and you’re out.

Carousel Round: Follow the instructions: “run into a room,” “get into groups of two or three,” or “go solo.” It sounds simple, but without a way to communicate with other players, teamwork becomes tricky and tense.

Skywalk Courses: Balance across oversized objects floating in the sky—giant coffee cups, donuts, chocolate bars, and more. One misstep and you’ll tumble straight down, ending your round.

Other modes keep the action fresh, from racing down twisting bike tracks to sneaking through prison breakouts. Each one pushes you to react quickly and stay sharp under pressure.

The controls are simple, but the levels demand precision. One moment you’re leaping across glowing rainbow platforms, the next you’re dodging traps or trying to outsmart guards. Success depends on timing, agility, and a little creativity in how you approach obstacles.

With colorful environments, unpredictable twists, and nonstop movement, Obby World: Squid Escape is built for players who want parkour challenges that keep them on their toes.

Choose your mode. In Rainbow Mode, you’ll dash across glowing platforms in a lively, colorful world. Bicycle Mode shifts the challenge to two wheels, where speed, stunts, and sharp maneuvers keep the race intense. Prison Escape raises the stakes with traps to dodge, guards to evade, and clever moves needed to break free. Each mode has its own style of thrill, and requires quick reflexes and sharp timing. Between games, you can personalize your character with outfits and accessories, giving your hero a distinct look.

More Games Like This

If you like the wild antics of this game, you may like games like Eggy Car, where you have to navigate an egg in a car through obstacles, ensuring it doesn't crack! Other games in our casual collection worth a try include Snow Rider 3D and Sprunki.

Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything.

This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.

Slice Master reviewed

We really enjoyed the fun tactile slicing of this game. The sounds are just perfect. I liked how the kids had to work out which mathematical operator was the best to go for at the end of the level - "is x4 better than +60?" Also, because you play it with just one button, it was a game that the whole family could have a go at, even from the youngest of us. In fact, our grandparents also got involved and turned out to be pretty competitive.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase

How to Play Slice Master

Slice Master is a one-button game controlled by the space pad on your keyboard or the left click on your mouse. All the control lies in this one simple movement. The game has an ASMR quality, and the consistent slicing is oddly soothing to the ear.

The aim is simple: slice everything in sight: fruit, shapes, walls, furniture, and more. You can slice most things, but don’t add the white wall to your target list—it’s just a holding material for your knife.

You will get to shop along the way, using the coins accumulated to unlock sharper blades, swords, maces, and more: anything to help you slice even more!

Tips
Stay away from the pink spiked metal shapes. They are too strong for your knife and will take you straight back to the beginning of the round. Sometimes these can be found at the bottom of a pile of objects to slice, so be careful to lift your knife in time to avoid them
Hit the correct numeric target at the end of each level to multiply your points by the target number and boost your score.

Geometry Game is a free side-scrolling platformer played in sync with musical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning! Inspired by the original Geometry Dash, this is a Scratch version, bringing the classic rhythm-based gameplay to your browser.

"This game became our family obsession during lockdown, but we have recently returned to play it. Combining simple controls and a high level of challenge makes for a fun experience we can all enjoy. Because the play is in time with the music, it’s also a good way to develop children’s sense of timing and musicality. Sometimes we’ve even played it once the kids are in bed, to see if we can improve our skills for the next family session."

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase.

How to Play Geometry Game

Geometry Dash is a 2D platformer game where you are in charge of moving a shape through a bunch of obstacles, all to the beat of the music. The square actually moves by itself, and all you have to do is click to jump when necessary and use the up/down arrows to steer vehicles. The way you dodge obstacles is often in sync with the beat, so make sure your sound is on and enjoy the experience!

The key to the game is timing. The levels themselves scroll automatically, and hitting spikes, walls, or other hazards results in an instant crash and restart. If you fail, it's back to the beginning. The constant die-and-retry loop will have you quickly memorizing the patterns of each level and, more importantly, the precise timing of crucial jumps. This dynamic is what makes the game addictive.

Listen to the beat

Geometry Game is a music game, and many jumps and movements are synced to the beat of the background music, so paying attention to the rhythm is not really an option. Practice Mode lets you place checkpoints to learn tricky sections without starting over, so it's a good place to start or go back to if you're having trouble completing levels.

Watch the obstacles

Levels also feature unique objects like portals, pads, and orbs. Portals can flip gravity, change speed, or switch vehicle modes. Jump pads automatically launch you, and orbs trigger special actions mid-air. These elements replace traditional power-ups, creating dynamic challenges that keep each level pretty much unpredictable.

Tips & Tricks
Practice Mode. Use Practice Mode to break a level into smaller sections. Place checkpoints at tricky spots and repeat until you can clear each segment consistently. This builds muscle memory and makes full runs much easier.
Follow the Rhythm. The game’s music often cues obstacle timing. Pay attention to beats and sync your jumps to the song. You can try humming the beat to get the rhythm down.
Geometry Game Reviews

The game has received positive reviews from critics. Softpedia praised the game's style, saying, "While it can get a bit frustrating sometimes, you can always complete the stages using the practice mode and then jump into the many different user-generated levels."

Geometry Game History

Geometry Dash started without a clear vision, according to the developer RobTop. It could have moved in any direction. It started as a template with a cube that could crash and jump, and evolved into the smash-hit game it is today.

When the game was first launched, it was called Geometry Jump and only had seven levels. Later on, it was renamed "Geometry Dash." Currently, there are four free versions of the game, one being "Geometry Dash Lite," which now includes the first 13 levels from the full version.

Features
Challenging levels that vary in difficulty from hard to almost impossible
Simple controls make the game intuitive to learn from the start
Excellent music that compels you to reach the next part of the track
Fun gameplay synced to the beat!

And for more musical rhythm games, Sprunki will hit the spot, as you'll get to create your own vibrant sounds and melodies.

Platforms

Geometry Dash is available across all platforms: web, Android, iOS, and Windows phones.

Developer

The game was created by RobTop Games for mobile, before being ported to PC as Geometry Game. This Scratch version is made by Griffpatch.

Fish Orbit is a casual fishing game where you cast your hook into the depths of the ocean and even beyond! Explore the underwater world and its legendary fish to unlock a variety of unique characters. Your goal is to become the most excellent fisher on the planet. Get ready for surprises in every layer of the deep, as they get bigger and bigger.

How to Play Fish Orbit

Fish Orbit is a fast-paced fishing game where each cast takes you deeper into the ocean. Drop your line, reel in exotic catches, and unlock new characters as you work toward becoming the ultimate fisher. Every layer of the sea holds surprises, from schools of small fish to rare creatures hidden in the depths.

Your goal is to cast your line as far and deep as possible. Timing is crucial. Tap when the color bar hits green to launch your line at maximum power, yellow for a solid throw, and red for a weak cast. Once your hook is in the water, keep tapping to push it deeper and uncover new species.

Four key stats that influence your fishing include strength, weight, rebound, and resistance. They determine how far your hook travels, how deep it sinks, and how many fish you can bring in with a single cast.

Upgrades drive your progress. Boost strength for longer throws, increase weight for deeper dives, upgrade rebound for better water bounces, and up the resistance to pull in more fish at once. Unlock new zones, collect rare catches, and expand your character roster as you advance.

To accelerate progress, watch ads to earn extra rewards and invest them in upgrades. With patience and careful upgrades, you can steadily work your way to fishing mastery.

Country Life Meadows is a farming adventure game where you turn a humble patch of land into a thriving estate. Cultivate crops, expand your business, and manage a skilled team. Explore untamed areas, unravel intriguing mysteries, and connect with the charming residents of Woodburn as you build your agricultural empire from the ground up.

How to Play Country Life Meadows

Welcome to your new farm! You’ve just acquired Roadside Farm, or whatever name you choose, and it’s time to embrace farm life. But first, here’s a letter from the previous owner that will give you an idea of your situation:

Hi,

Congrats on buying my farm! Sorry to hear you got stranded overnight - wish I could’ve helped fix your car. I don’t remember that rock being on the road… strange. Anyway, I asked around for help, and hopefully, you’ll find an oil pan soon.

You were right about the sunrises - they're stunning, much better than in the city! The soil here is top-notch too. Too bad I had to leave in such a rush. Life happens...

This land is the best spot on that flat hilltop, right near the road. It’s called Roadside Farm, but feel free to rename it. Oh, and please take care of Clarabella!

Best Wishes,

Jim Grey

Now that you’re settling in, it’s time to start farming. Each day brings new rewards, so be sure to check in and claim them. The key to a thriving farm is planting, harvesting, and managing your resources wisely. Sow your seeds, take care of your animals, and keep an eye on your barn and warehouse to track what you’ve gathered. As you grow your farm, you’ll have the chance to expand your land, unlocking even more opportunities to cultivate crops and raise livestock.

Clover is an essential crop for your animals. Cows, turkeys, and goats love it, and if you have bees, they’ll pollinate it, producing honey before harvest. Clover is also used in the production of milk, black feathers, and white feathers. Wheat is another staple: grind it at the Dutch Mill to make flour or use it to feed your sheep. It’s a key ingredient in making flour, vodka, wool, and black wool. If you need milk, make sure to feed your Holstein cows. A full cow is a happy cow, and happy cows keep your farm running smoothly.

Your farm has several important buildings to manage. The Dutch Mill turns wheat into flour, and keeping it filled will power the windmill. The barn stores essentials like wheat, clover, and flour, while the warehouse holds resources such as honey, sugar, oxygen, and propane. As you progress, you’ll gain access to even more supplies, including gear, decorations, chests, and medals. Keep an eye on your stockpile to prepare for the next task.

While ripe crops are beautiful to look at, don’t forget to harvest and replant to keep your farm productive. Wheat should always be replenished, and replanting clover on eight plots of soil will ensure a steady supply. Adding sacks of wheat to the Dutch Mill will keep your flour production running smoothly. The more you maintain your farm, the more opportunities you’ll unlock, allowing you to expand even further. Check the map to see just how vast your farm can become.

Beyond the daily farm routine, there are plenty of ways to engage with the world around you. If you enjoy a relaxed farming experience, you’ll love the peaceful rhythm of planting and harvesting, accompanied by soothing animations and calming sounds. For those who like a challenge, competitions, achievements, horse racing, and leaderboards offer ways to test your skills and earn permanent prizes. The farming co-op lets you collaborate with fellow players, whether by sending Wedding Doves to ceremonies or trading produce at the Market.

Neighbors are a valuable part of farm life. The more neighbors you have, the more gifts you’ll receive, helping you progress faster. You can also personalize your farm with beautiful artwork and decorations, customizing both your Farmhouse and Log Cabin. If you feel like exploring, venture into the surrounding landscapes to forage for mushrooms and edible roots, or head to the mines to uncover valuable ores and hidden riches.

With so much to do, you can play Country Life Meadows your way. Relax and unwind with hours of farming fun, compete to showcase your skills, or grow your farm into a flourishing empire. The possibilities are endless: so start planting and watch your farm come to life!

Features
Play to Relax: Unwind with hundreds of hours of farming fun. Revel in the soothing daily routine of planting and harvesting your crops, complete with beautiful animations and calming sounds.
Play to Compete: Test your skills in Competitions, Achievements, Horse Racing, and Leaderboards. Earn permanent prizes, and rewards, and showcase your public stats.
Farming Co-op: Collaborate with fellow players to achieve common goals. From sending Wedding Doves to weddings to participating in the all-new Market where you can exchange produce with others, teamwork is key.
Neighborly Gifts: Your Neighbors can send you valuable gifts, so the more neighbors, the faster you’ll progress.
Artwork: We focus on crafting beautiful in-game artwork rather than promotional materials, so what you see is what you get.
Interior Decoration: Personalize the interior of your Farmhouse and your Log Cabin in the woods.
Exploration: Venture into vast, picturesque landscapes to forage for mushrooms and edible roots.
Mining: Delve into the depths of The Mines to discover ores and riches.
Barn Management: Our Barn management offers unparalleled control with filtering options that help you maximize your results.
More Games Like This

Finished playing and looking for more? There are plenty more casual games to go around. Try Empire City, a management game, where you strategically govern a thriving empire, building it from nothing. You may also enjoy our merge games like Little Alchemy, a crafting game where players combine the elements of the world to create new items, or Designville Merge & Design, which takes you on an adventure to renovate and design various spaces.

Planet Smash Destruction is a casual game in which you wield cosmic power to create and destroy planets. You can try out different weapons, design custom planetary systems, and release black holes. With easy-to-use controls, it suits both beginners and seasoned players. Unleash your creativity and discover the wonders of space in this captivating physics simulator.

How to Play Planet Smash Destruction

Your goal in Planet Smash Destruction is to destroy planets, essentially for the fun of it. You will journey to various planets and celestial bodies with nothing but courage and weapons to accompany you. Your weapons will help you on your path to destruction, but they also help reshape planets from their original form.

Planet Smash Destruction can be categorized as a sandbox game, so you get a significant amount of freedom to explore space, making each gameplay quite unique. Your imagination is the only limit to full space domination.

The game starts with a view from space of Earth -- it's just sitting there waiting to be destroyed. Fret not; if all feels overwhelming while destroying your homeland, you can always press reset while repeating the mantra - it's only a game, it's only a game.

Choose your weapon

There are several ways to destroy Earth and other planets. On the right side of the screen, select a weapon to destroy your chosen planet. For example, you can choose an alien monster drill to create a donut-like hole in the center of Mars. Or, if the planet is rotating close enough to you, you may want to detonate a bomb. Say goodbye to one or all seven continents with a few consistent laser shots. Want to practice your aim? Send a rocket out to see just how much you can destroy in one go.

The more planets you destroy, the more money you earn. Currency will get you weapon upgrades and new planets to explore via a store purchase, allowing you to destroy even more worlds.

You can tweak your weapons via settings. You might enlarge your laser beam and change its color, make meteorites hit a wider area, move faster, or expand the blast radius of missiles. You can even unleash dozens of missiles for those peskier planets that are more difficult to destroy.

In Planet Smash Destruction you can also enter creative mode and create a brand new planet, populate it with people, set its terrain, add satellites and other human artifacts in its orbit, before turning it into dust!

Monsters

Guess Their Answer is a casual quiz game where your goal is to outsmart opponents by predicting the most popular answers. Tackle three head-scratching questions per round across diverse topics, earn rewards, and unlock unique skins to personalize your experience. With daily quizzes and competitive matches, every game is a chance to prove you know your trivia.

How to Play Guess Their Answer

Guess Their Answer is a guessing game similar to Family Feud, where you try to predict the most popular answers given to specific questions. You start by giving your character a name and meet your opponent.

You’re presented with a question or prompt with an audience watching you. You have to type your answer, and when you get the right answer, the audience will rally by your side. The more audience you have on your side, the more you know you’re winning. You will be told when your opponent gets wrong answers, and there is a barometer letting you know as well, so keep an eye out.

Some of the questions you can be asked are "Name a superhero”. The key is you are trying to guess the most common answer, not just any old answer. If your answer is the most common, the very audience members who responded with your guess will back you up. You have to think of answers that the audience or survey participants might have chosen. Each round features a different category, and your goal is to type responses that align with the most common answers.

Points are awarded based on how popular your answers are. The game typically includes multiple rounds, with the final rounds offering double or triple points. The person or team with the most points at the end wins. Creativity and speed are key since you have limited time to respond. The game allows for some flexibility with misspellings or variations, which can lead to unexpected wins.

Whether you're playing solo or with friends, the challenge is to think quickly, predict what others might say, and sometimes laugh at how quirky or close-to-wrong answers can still score points.

Accept reality

Bridge Race is a competitive casual collect building game where you gather blocks to construct your bridge while outsmarting rivals. Stay alert as other players may try to steal your progress, adding an exciting twist to the challenge. Strategize and race to complete your bridge first in this thrilling test of skill and speed!

How to Play Bridge Race

Bridge Race is an oddly satisfying game where you aim to collect as many blocks of your color as possible and carry them across the board to build a bridge. The objective is to create a path that leads you to the next collection area and, ultimately, to the finish line. Victory is sweet, but the challenge continues as each round gets more difficult.

The game is designed to be both simple and rewarding, with delicate sounds that create a satisfying atmosphere. You'll encounter obstacles like slides and elevators, which add a fun element as you navigate through the level, taking you closer to the next challenge.

But you’re not alone in this race. Other players are also collecting blocks to build their own bridges, and they’re more than happy to challenge you along the way. If you’re not careful, your opponents can sabotage your progress by building over your bridge, undoing all the hard work you’ve done. And if you run out of blocks and need to return to collect more, be prepared for your opponents to steal your blocks, changing their color to match yours and forcing you to start the process over again. You’ll also have to watch out for being knocked down by other players, which causes you to lose all the blocks on your back.

Throughout the game, you’ll encounter rewards scattered across the map. Green rewards multiply the number of blocks you carry, giving you an advantage, while red ones will diminish your collection, so it’s important to avoid them at all costs. Stay vigilant, collect wisely, and you’ll be on your way to victory!

Empire City is a casual management game where you strategically construct and govern a thriving empire from nothing. Build magnificent cities, develop resources, and create a unique culture while engaging in trade and diplomacy. Expand your influence, make historic discoveries, and craft wonders that will be remembered for centuries. Your choices shape the future of your empire: lead wisely!

How to Play Empire City

Empire City is a classic management game set in ancient times where you get to build an entire city, including roadways, residential homes, waterways, workshops, and more -- all from a blank slate with a bit of help from two close advisors: Julia and Flavius.

The game starts with a full intro from Julia and Flavius, which will walk you through step by step how to build your city. Once you have the hang of it, you're on your own. But not to worry, help from your advisors is just a click away.

Julia and Flavius guide you through the following directions:

Julia: "Welcome to the city, Prefect! I’m Julia. I run an inn here, and I know everything about everyone. This is Flavius, the architect."

Flavius: "My projects can do the talking for me! The first one is a residential building. Let’s get to work!"

Julia: "Remember, every building in the city must be connected to a road."

Action: You get to build a road.

Flavius: "Congratulations, Prefect! The building is ready. We can house people in it now."

Julia: "People?! There’s barely room for one citizen. The building needs to be upgraded."

Action: Build a house.

Flavius: "Prefect, we have a problem. We need clay to make the house more spacious, but it’s mined outside the city."

Julia: "If it’s even mined at all! The clay quarry is in bad shape, and the tool storage is totally dilapidated. But our Prefect can solve that, right?"

Action: Fix the clay quarry.

Julia: "Now we can hire a manager! But that can happen later. First, we need to build a road to deliver the clay to the city."

Action: Build a road.

Flavius: "The road is wonderful, Prefect! Collect the mined clay, and my people will deliver it to the construction site right away."

Action: Collect the clay.

Flavius: "Thank you for the help. I’ll get to work upgrading the house right now!"

Julia: "You and Flavius are doing wonderfully! Let’s upgrade another house. It could use a second floor, with a good view of the city."

Flavius: "Regular clay isn’t enough to build another floor. This requires a sturdier material, such as clay mixture."

Julia: "Alas, this material isn’t produced in our city. Although the Prefect could give orders to build a special workshop."

Julia: "If you don’t want to wait, use gems! Their shine speeds up any project. The first time is free, though."

Action: Use gems.

Flavius: "Very grand, Prefect. Now we won’t lack building materials. Give the order to produce clay mixture."

Julia: "Production can take a long time. When it ends, a clay mixture icon will appear above the workshop."

Action: Wait for production to finish.

Flavius: "It’s ready, Prefect! Tap the icon to move the mixture to the warehouse."

Action: Move the mixture to the warehouse.

Julia: "So, are we going to upgrade the house or just pretend that it’s intentionally unfinished?"

Flavius: "Please accept this scroll. I sketched out some improvements. Remember, Prefect, Julia and I are always here to support you!"

You're on your own after this training. Continue building your empire and make Julia and Flavius proud, Prefect!

More Games Like This

Sprunki is a casual music game that lets you craft unique soundscapes. This modded version of Incredibox by NyankoBfLolCombine gives you DJ control to mix loops, vocals, beats, and melodies, pretty much creating your own musical style. The game features vibrant characters and sounds for a completely immersive experience full of rhythmic possibilities. Whether you're a music enthusiast or just love experimenting, it’s a fun and engaging way to express your creativity.

How to Play Sprunki

Sprunki is a quirky, surreal, music-based game that combines creativity with creepy twists. And yes, it does get a bit creepy, depending on your choices, so if horror is not your genre, then this may be a bit of a challenge.

Your goal is to assemble a bizarre band of unique characters and create melodies by assigning them different outfits and accessories. Each customization changes its sound, letting you experiment with endless musical combinations.

The game starts lightheartedly as you craft a cheerful choir. Choose from avatars like TV heads, satellite dishes, and Medusa-like figures, each contributing to the band's unique vibe. The choice is all yours. There are different combinations to uncover hidden tunes, mixing cheerful beats or darker undertones, depending on your choices.

As you progress, the game takes a darker turn. Innocent melodies morph into haunting soundscapes, and your once-jolly avatars begin to appear cursed. The cheerful tree might display missing person posters, and the formerly harmonious sounds turn dissonant, with eerie visuals creeping in. The more phases you unlock, the more unsettling the game becomes, introducing new macabre characters.

While the gameplay focuses on experimenting with sound, each phase introduces new challenges. Some characters contribute little or refuse to "sing," while others evolve into grotesque forms. The gallery section teases spoilers, revealing the grim fates of your band members after each phase.

Ultimately, Sprunki combines rhythm game mechanics, horror elements, and surreal storytelling. Enjoy a casual game of creating bizarre beats and interesting and unexpected transformations.

Sprunki Gamescape

Sprunki has a quirky look that pretty quickly turns dark. The lighter side has a series of characters full of vibrant colors and goofy gear. The darker side turns the skies black, characters become creepy, and dissonant sounds permeate the once whimsical tunes. There is a striking contrast between cute and creepy and horror-tinged visuals and audio.

Sprunki Levels

Sprunki doesn’t have traditional levels but progresses in phases. In the early phase, the game is bright and cheerful, and it moves into later phases where the game shifts and the visuals and music become more complex and eerie.

Tips & Tricks
Experiment with different character combinations to trigger secret animations or unlock bonus characters.
Layer sounds from beats, melodies, vocals, and effects to create full, harmonious tracks.
Use the mute/remove function to vary your composition and build dynamic songs.
Watch visuals for subtle clues, such as flashing characters or background changes, indicating bonuses or progression.
Leave the game idle occasionally to spot small Easter eggs or subtle animations.
About Sprunki

Sprunki was inspired by the popular beatboxing game Incredibox, by the indie developer NyankoBfLol. The game launched in 2024 on Scratch as a spooky take on Incredibox’s musical formula, but was removed for violent and gory content. It once again gained viral attention for its hidden horror elements.

In October 2024, Sprunki became a standalone web game on CrazyGames, playable in browsers on desktops, tablets, and phones. The final update arrived in November 2024, after which the creator discontinued further development. The game nonetheless continues to thrive so much so that there are hints of a “Sprunki Remastered” project, though no release date has been announced.

More Games Like This

Unwind and keep the fun going with some of our most popular casual games, including another music category titled Blob Opera, a creative playground where you control singing blobs, each modeled after trained opera voices. Other fun titles worth a try include Tile Guru, a casual puzzle game where you flip and match colorful tiles in a calm, strategy-filled gamescape, or Little Alchemy and its sequel Little Alchemy 2, where you merge four basic elements to eventually create things from stones to humans.

How to Play Papa's Sushiria

Papa Louie invited you to the grand opening of Papa’s Sushiria. However, you broke Papa’s lucky cat on the way out, and now you are bonded by debt to work at the Sushiria until it is paid off.

Serve with a delicious bubble tea

Enjoy your leisurely hours

Airport Security is a casual simulation game that immerses you in the high-stakes world of airport safety, placing you in the role of a vigilant security officer dedicated to safeguarding a bustling terminal. Your mission is to maintain a secure environment by identifying suspicious passengers, spotting fake passports, and uncovering hidden contraband using cutting-edge X-ray machines. With each decision, you ensure that only law-abiding travelers make it to their gates, navigating unique interrogation scenarios and confronting realistic challenges. Will you rise to the occasion and preserve the tranquility of air travel? Your journey begins now!

How to Play Airport Security

To play, you'll start by meticulously checking passports and scrutinizing any conflicting information that raises a red flag. Your keen eye for detail is crucial, and your job is to highlight suspicious discrepancies and make the critical decision of whether to apprehend the individual. As you pat down passengers, you’ll uncover a surprising range of items—what may seem like harmless possessions, such as bananas and rubber duckies, could easily be hiding more sinister contraband, including live bats and, alarmingly, even firearms. Each interaction poses a new challenge, and the choice to arrest rests solely on your judgment.

Once you've identified a potential threat, you'll escort them to the interrogation room, a high-stakes environment where you can delve deeper into their motives. Here, you'll confront suspects with the evidence you’ve gathered, engaging in tense dialogue to uncover their true intentions. The pressure mounts as you work to discern truth from deception, and if the severity of their actions warrants it, you’ll have the authority to send them to jail. Meanwhile, your role extends beyond mere enforcement; you also have the opportunity to enhance the duty-free area, transforming it into a comfortable and secure haven for passengers.

Be prepared for unexpected twists—some criminals might take hostages, thrusting you into nerve-wracking negotiation scenarios that require quick thinking and diplomacy. In Airport Security, every decision carries weight, and your ability to maintain order amidst chaos is put to the ultimate test!

More Games Like This

There is plenty more casual game fun at CrazyGames. Play one of our many popular titles like Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks, a casual solitaire game where you stack your cards in sequence to win; Pop It Game, a classic clicker game where you pop bubbles in the most satisfying of patterns; or Frogger, where you guide a frog over roads and rivers to get to safety.

Man Runner 2048 is a casual arcade game where your objective is to run and merge men till you reach 2048. Your goal is to get the highest score on each round, because at the end of the level, you will get a chance to shoot a giant monster. The higher your score, the more power you gain.

How to Play Man Runner 2048

Your ultimate goal is to merge men to reach the 2048 level, achieve the highest score possible, and then fire powerful cannonballs to damage giant monsters and take control of the islands.

Each course starts pretty simply. You will need to run through a course head-on, filled with obstacles, while collecting as many points as possible. The gamescape is set up like a runway, and obstacles are everywhere. They could be right in front of you, coming from below, dropping from above. Stay vigilant and keep your eye on the prize. You want to make it to the end of the course.

Along the way, collect green rewards and pink diamonds for significant score boosts, but steer clear of anything red or items that split your points. At the end of the course, you will face a giant skeleton. Aim carefully to hit your target. Experiment to find its Achilles’ heel, sometimes right between the eyes, works for maximum damage to earn extra points. You may not be able to defeat it right away, but each attempt helps you rack up a higher score.

Each round introduces new obstacles, including sliding floors that can help you gather more points if you move skillfully. Be careful of spikes that rise from the ground and bombs that drop from the sky, both of which can cost you the run.

Between runs, you can buy accessories to customize your character.

Tip

Aim for the monster's center when you fire your cannonballs at the end of the round. This is one of its weakest spots.

More Games Like This

If you like Man Runner 20248, you will want to browse our casual category for similar fun. Some fan favorites from this category include Little Alchemy and its sequel, Little Alchemy 2, the classic Bubble Shooter game, Geometry Dash Online, and plenty more.
