Manage an ice cream shop in Papa’s Freezeria! Make the perfect sundaes for customers enjoying summer vacation in this classic restaurant management game.

Papa Louie has advertised this job as a stress-free one on Calypso Island, which is inhabited by only 12 people. Easy peasy! But as soon as you get the job and he leaves for holiday, a large boat with a significant number of tourists docks at the pier…

At least there is a worker's guide to read and an actual training to perform that helps you get started!

How to Play Papa's Freezeria
Make delectable desserts

Life at Papa’s Freezeria starts simple. You get to play as Alberto or Penny. There are a few customers, and the pace is pretty easy-going, with a laid-back beach style.

Build your customer’s favorite ice cream sundae to spec, and they’ll be happy with the product. The game starts with a simple tutorial to ease you into your new role.

In Freezeria, there are four work stations to help you make your sundaes:

Order Station: this is where you accept and record orders, as well as manage customer queues.
Build Station: you actually build sundaes here, as you select the cup size, pour the ice cream and add the additional toppings requested by each client. Make sure to time your usage of toppings and keep an eye on line moving in the green zone.
Mix Station: you must blend sundaes at the Mix Station. Timing is essential here, too. The operation needs to be stopped when the line hits the green.
Top Station: additional items and toppings are added in this final stage, from cherries to whipped cream. Precision is key; the order in which you place these final bits is essential to achieving a good score.
Manage your time effectively

If you think you’re in for an easy summer job, you’re in for a surprise. As the days pass, the shop gets increasingly busy; the customers are more demanding. You’ll juggle multiple sundae orders simultaneously, so time management is critical.

Your topping, mixing, building, and waiting score is added up at the end of each level. Maximize your score for the best tips!

Purchase upgrades

Papa demands that you reinvest your hard-earned tips into the business instead of letting you keep them. It's actually written in the job ad: "Workers are responsible for all shop upgrades".

You can buy various upgrades for the shop to make life easier as the levels get trickier. These include blender booster upgrades, blend level alarms, auto ice cream, and more. Automation is essential as you scale up your customer capacity! Even furniture upgrades provide additional benefits.

Get the scoop on your customers

Know your customer. Papa Louie doesn’t mess around. He has a detailed book filled with his customers' personal details, from sundae fanatics to casual consumers. Study this book and learn what your customer wants.

More Papa's Games

Browse our Flash games for more classics! Be sure to explore the other superb games in the Papa Louie series, including Papa's Pizzeria and Papa's Burgeria.

Features
Run your Papa's Freezeria while he's AFK
Build the most delectable desserts on this beachfront
Satisfy your customers' sweet tooth to get big tips
Reap the rewards of being an expert in ice cream

Chess Online Multiplayer is a casual free chess game you can play online with a friend or against an AI opponent. Earn gold to buy stylish new chess boards and pieces!

How to Play Chess Online Multiplayer

Online chess uses a strategy similar to that of the classic board game. You move your pieces strategically to control the board and capture the opponent's king. Each piece has unique movement rules, such as knights moving in an L-shape and bishops moving diagonally. The game ends when one player checkmates the other's king, placing it in a position where it cannot escape capture.

Practice against AI

Playing against AI is a great way to hone your chess skills. It’s not too easy or difficult to beat the AI, though if you are a skilled chess player, you’ll find beating the bots a piece of cake, as they make plenty of bad choices.

If you find the AI running circles around you, we recommend reading a chess guide to learn more.

Play with friends

Checkmate your friends and show them who has the superior intellect in this mind game of the ages. You can also challenge random opponents online and see how you measure against players worldwide.

Swag up your chessboard

A pro chess player like yourself will want an extravagantly styled chess set to match their skills. That’s where the shop comes in. You can splash your cash earnings here by buying various themed pieces, boards, cursors, and more.

More Games Like This

Bloons Tower Defense 4, aka BTD 4, is a classic tower defense game initially released in Flash. Defend the path by avoiding Bloons from reaching the end.

Tactically place various defenses around the map to shoot at the balloons. Upgrade them and unlock more as you get further through the game.

How to Play Bloons Tower Defense 4

Pop balloons to earn dollars, use your dollars to buy defensive towers or upgrade your existing ones.

Bloons TD 4 features nine tracks with varying levels of difficulty. The three easier tracks feature more convenient locations for placing your defenses and tend to be longer. You can also set the difficulty level, reducing the cost of purchases and the number of levels, and increasing your lives.

There are 16 unlockable new weapons and defenses, the further you get in the level. These items can be upgraded to handle new threats better and eliminate enemies more effectively.

Practice Makes Perfect

Bloons Tower Defense 4 has three difficulty levels to choose from. The beginner level is a good place to solidify your game and work your way up. This game can take time to perfect, so start slowly and build your skills.

What to expect from the Easy level

You get 200 lives
There are 50 rounds
Items are cheaper to purchase

What to expect from the Medium level

You get 150 lives
There are 60 rounds
Items are moderately priced to purchase

What to expect from the Hard level

You get 100 lives
There are 75 rounds
Items are more expensive to purchase

Sandbox Mode

Sandbox is unlocked at rank 26. You get unlimited money and lives. You also get to choose which bloons come and when.

Apopolypse Mode

Apopolypse is unlocked at round 31. You get bloons non-stop until you run out of lives.

Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a delightful casual adventure where you embrace the life of a mischievous feline. Explore a sprawling house filled with interactive objects to climb, scratch, and topple. Each room offers surprises, unique challenges, and exciting mini-games. Unleash your inner chaos-maker as you leave your mark, literally and figuratively, on every piece of furniture and decor!

Bad Cat - Granny's Return

Step into the mischievous paws of a very bad cat causing maximum chaos in Granny's house! Your goal? Wreak havoc, complete tasks, and outsmart Granny to move into the next room.

Start by picking up the photo frame (press E) and throwing it against the wall right through Grandma’s precious picture! Then it’s time to step up the destruction: shoot a rocket to blast a hole in the wall, pop a balloon, and ultimately push Granny over to unlock your path forward.

Along the way, you’ll pull off all kinds of TV antics: steal the TV plug and turn on the TV for even more mayhem. Don’t forget the small touches: knocking over flower vases and other fragile decorations adds to your chaotic checklist.

You’ll have a task list to guide your missions, and if you ever feel stuck, watch for floating hand icons around the room. These handy hints will point you to objects you can interact with (or destroy!).

Use your cat-like agility to jump across furniture, climb shelves, and navigate obstacles. Many of the items you smash on the ground will help you build paths to new areas or objectives, but sometimes you have to cause a little destruction to climb your way to success!

Get ready to cause as much feline chaos as possible: Granny won't know what hit her!

Fish Eat Getting Big is a casual IO game where you swim around the ocean, munching your way through smaller fish to grow in size! This classic IO gameplay dynamics can be quite addictive, so get ready to challenge yourself to eat or be eaten. Gather your friends and engage in local multiplayer mode with up to three players!

How to Play Fish Eat Getting Big

Hunt the sea for fish

Explore the ocean's depths and encounter a wide variety of fish species. You can eat any fish with a smaller number than yours. If you try to eat a fish with a higher number, you’ll die and have to start again.

Grow into a fearsome predator

As you progress, your fish will become fiercer, larger, and more predatory. Continue chomping away at various aquatic creations until more exotic sea life starts to appear. You can keep munching on every living being in the ocean until you make a mistake and die.

Buy and upgrade skins

Every time you die, you earn gold that you can use to purchase new oceanic backgrounds and fish types. The amount of gold you earn reflects your score at the time of death. There are also coins scattered around the sea to collect.

Invite your friends

You can bring up to two friends into the game and battle it out to be the biggest fish in the sea! Each player can choose a unique fish and jump into the game to compete against each other.

Global City is a city-building simulator casual game with intricate graphics and innovative designs. You're the town's mayor and have been mandated to manage resource production, complete quests for rewards, and interact with enthusiastic residents to make this town as thriving as possible.

How to Play Global City

Global City is a task management and building game, so most of your gameplay will involve following directions and adding to already completed tasks. You are the mayor of this town and are initially met with plenty of training and guidance on how to turn a rundown town into a thriving metropolis.

Start by constructing basic buildings and infrastructure, such as houses, roads, and factories. Gather resources, complete tasks, and upgrade your buildings to attract more residents and increase your city's prosperity. Expand your city by acquiring new land, unlocking new structures, and enhancing its overall efficiency. Engage with other players through trade, collaboration, and competition to achieve the highest ranking and build the ultimate global city.

You have a task sheet you can refer to to understand how to continue construction and expansion. Refer to it as it will be your lifeline. This one-button casual game has few strategic moves. Follow the arrows on the screen to know your next best move.

Some of the construction you will be building includes:

Block of flats
Townhouses
Lane houses
European houses

Maisonette
Elite residential complex
Vacation houses

Join friendly communities, trade resources, and compete in tournaments. Strategically collect taxes to grow your population and expand your city into a bustling megapolis.

Fill, bake, and decorate

Hotel Rush: Merge Story is a casual merge game where you join Ted on a journey to uncover his grandfather’s hidden past. As you explore the hotel’s forgotten corners, you’ll merge humble tools into powerful tools, uncover hidden treasures, and piece together family secrets that have been buried for years. Each renovated floor unlocks new challenges, puzzles, and surprises, taking you deeper into a story filled with twists and heartfelt discoveries. With every merge and decoration, you’ll breathe new life into the hotel, transforming it into a masterpiece.

How to Play Hotel Rush: Merge Story

Hotel Rush: Merge Story is an addictive one-click puzzle game where you merge items to grow your collection, unlock surprises, and renovate a charming hotel. It all begins with a simple toolbox: merge two toolboxes of different sizes to create a larger one. The bigger the toolbox, the more tools it holds—and the more surprises it offers! Tap your toolbox to reveal new items like nails, which are the foundation of your merging journey.

Start small by merging two nails to get a hammer. Keep combining: two hammers create a screwdriver, perfect for Grandpa’s DIY projects. Two screwdrivers become a wrench, and two wrenches morph into pliers. The merging doesn’t stop there—keep going to uncover bigger tools and exciting upgrades. Every tap on the toolbox brings a new opportunity to build, upgrade, and discover.

But Hotel Rush: Merge Story isn’t just about tools—it’s about transformation. As you progress, you’ll unlock renovation tasks to restore the hotel to its former glory. Fix flickering lamps, repair broken furniture, and calm Ted, the hotel’s ever-anxious manager. Grandpa and Ted will provide clues, revealing that your ultimate goal is to prepare the hotel for sale to eager investors.

Each level introduces new merging possibilities. By level two, you’ll expand your repertoire with items like gloves, face masks, and safety vests. Merge them to create even stronger gear and uncover more surprises. You’ll also face challenges like fixing the hotel’s elevator to access additional floors, each with its own set of items to merge and problems to solve.

With its endless merging opportunities, quirky characters, and the satisfying progress of rebuilding a grand hotel, Hotel Rush: Merge Story offers hours of idle gameplay.

More Games Like This

There are plenty more casual games to play, particularly some merge game favorites like Designville Merge & Design, a casual game where you get to create and design your way to success, or Little Alchemy, an educational game where you combine the different elements of the world to create new and even stronger ones.

ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang is a casual food game where you are the star of a mukbang stream. You get to enjoy delicious dishes, interact with your audience, and grow your popularity with every bite, all on camera! Each meal takes you closer to becoming even more popular, so keep eating, keep engaging, and watch your virtual foodie journey unfold.

How to Play ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang

Relaxing, fun, and super engaging, ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang lets you enjoy cooking, eating, and styling in a way that’s not only entertaining but also rewarding. Keep streaming, earning, and upgrading to become the most popular mukbang star! Become a livestream star with your channel, serving up drinks, dishes, and endless ASMR satisfaction. There are a few livestreams that you’ll participate in to get as many likes and hearts as possible from your fans.

Curate Your Stream

Start with a drink, pick your glass from thin-rimmed, stemmed, and rounded, and then add ice cubes in shapes from classic squares to cute bears. Garnish with fruits like lime, kiwi, or raspberry (some unlock as you earn rewards). Choose your syrup, give it a shake, add a straw, and get ready to sip your way into livestream fame. But beware — a boring drink could mean negative feedback!

Dig In on Camera

Once the drinks are done, move on to food. Eat tempura, sundaes, ramen, chicken, lobster, and even mix them in one stream for bigger rewards. The more fun and satisfying the experience, the more your audience grows. Once your food is ready, it’s time to go live! Eat, chat, and interact with your viewers as you enjoy the food. Your realistic ASMR sounds will make the experience feel so satisfying that your viewers won’t want to miss a moment. Engage with fans and watch your audience grow!

Go to the Supermarket

Start by shopping for ingredients, then move on to cooking mouth-watering dishes! From spicy noodles to delicious seafood and even sweet treats, the possibilities are endless. Prepare a meal that will make your audience hungry for more! For some of your livestreams, you get to shop for snacks and treats like sushi, dumplings, candy, and ice cream, but don’t get brain freeze! Pay with your card, stock up, and get ready to stream again.

Cook, Stream, and Engage

Shop for ingredients, cook delicious meals, then go live. Eat, chat, and interact while your realistic ASMR sounds keep viewers hooked. Successful streams bring in money. Spend it on stylish outfits for your character, or unlock even more mouth-watering food to keep your audience entertained.

If you’re a livestream fan, this game can get quite addictive. The more successful your streams, the more money you make. Use your earnings to upgrade your girl’s outfits, giving her a stylish and trendy appearance. You can also buy even more delicious food to satisfy your growing audience and keep the mukbang going!

Food Truck Chef is a thrilling casual food game where you travel the globe, cooking iconic dishes from tacos to sushi. Manage your time, upgrade your kitchen, and serve customers to build your food truck empire. With hundreds of levels and vibrant locations, you’ll face exciting challenges that test your skills as a master chef!

How to Play Food Truck Chef

Food Truck Chef is a fast-paced, fun, and addictive cooking game in which you manage your food truck and serve delicious dishes to customers on the go.

There are plenty of places to choose from, all with similar gameplay styles. The pasta street food truck journey is a popular location to begin, and as you progress, you can unlock Pizza Street, Tex Mex Street, Sandwich Street, and more!

The first thing you need to do is complete your training with Chef Sarah. You’ll learn the basics of the game, starting with your first customer.

A customer orders pasta with red sauce. Plate the pasta, add the red sauce, place it on the counter, take the money, and voilà, your first order is complete!

Your next customer wants a caffeine fix, so make sure to serve the coffee immediately after it’s filled so it’s nice and hot.

After your training, you’re ready to run your pasta food truck! Keep cooking and serving to build up your experience and earn rewards.

You earn coins and XP for completing orders, serving customers, and upgrading your kitchen. Fill the XP bar to level up and unlock rewards like coins and gems. You can watch ads to double your coins, which is crucial for buying new kitchen equipment and supplies.

Use your coins to buy better kitchen equipment. New pans (600 coins), new plates (400 coins), and an espresso machine (600 coins) will help you serve customers faster.

Remember to collect tips after serving customers. If you don't, new customers won’t show up!

Get the hot plate as soon as possible to keep your sauces warm and serve dishes quickly.

As you advance, you’ll unlock more additions to your dishes, like adding olives, cheese, and more to your pasta. Keep earning points, buying new equipment, and watching your food truck flourish with happy customers! New recipes will also be introduced. The white sauce, for example, burns easily if you don’t keep an eye on it, adding an extra challenge to your cooking!

Game Tip

To keep up with demand, have warm dishes prepped and ready to serve incoming guests.
Always keep a close eye on your cooking times, especially for recipes that burn quickly.

Teacher Simulator is a fun simulation game in which you play the role of a teacher. Mark exams and ensure the kids are on their best behavior. You may be or have been a student, but now you get to be the one in charge!

How to Play Teaching Simulator
Game Modes
Answer Questions: Teach Kids Essential Life Skills

In Teacher Simulator you’ll ask the class essential questions, such as “What does LOL mean?”. A bunch of students will raise their hands and you’ll have to choose whether their answer is correct or not.

Grading Assignments: Sharpen Your Pencils and Mark Exams

Get your pencils to the perfect level of sharpness and prepare to mark your students' work! Depending on whether the answer is correct, put a tick or X in each box.

Catch Cheaters

Cheating, fighting, and misbehavior are frequent issues in this school, and it’s your duty as the teacher to ensure the kids behave. Some kids think they can copy other people’s work, but you’ll have to make it sure it doesn’t happen on your watch.

Classroom and Hall Management

Caught kids misbehaving or, even worse, having a fistfight? This school is full of real rascals and rapscallions. You can resort to archaic measures like spraying them with a fire extinguisher or zapping them with a stun gun to ensure they step in line!

Get your dream job

Career progression in Teacher Simulator evolves quickly. Earn opportunities to teach new classes by excelling in your current duties. You can teach film, business, general knowledge, and more. The new jobs you get will pay you better. If you’re looking for a complete career change, check out Market Boss or Sweet Shop 3D.

How to Play Papa's Donuteria
Slice and roll the dough

Papa Louie has sympathized with you, a poor boy/girl looking for their first job, and given you a shot at his Donuteria. He’ll teach you the basics of donut creation, starting with rolling and slicing the dough into neat circles. Fry the required amount of donuts until they reach the first line, then flip them to cook the other side until completion.

Coat and add the toppings

The next step in donut creation is the coating process. To add the first layer of deliciousness, donuts are dunked into various glazes and sugar coatings, and filling is pumped into any donuts where the customer has requested it.

After that, it’s to the toppings station! Here, you’ll find all the toppings that define Papa’s Donuts as the best money can buy. Be as accurate as possible to get the highest satisfaction from customers!

Enjoy your leisurely hours

After each day’s shift, you’ll get 3 chances at one of the various minigames. You could be playing Papa’s Raceria or any number of fun little games. If you succeed at the challenge, you’ll be rewarded with something to help you in the game. You can also use your tips to buy new items for the restaurant.

Spruce up the donut shop

Decorative items like tables and posters help improve customer waiting time, while upgrades to the equipment can make the food prep process easier and faster. Eventually, the shop floor will be completely kitted with new furniture, flooring, walls—all the bells and whistles. You have to earn them first, though!

This much-loved classic board game is free to play single-player or locally with friends. Roll the dice and make your way to the top. Hopefully, you don’t land on a snake!

How to Play Snakes and Ladders

You can play with up to six players; each gets to select a color. Roll the dice and move your piece. If you roll a 6, you get another roll for free. You can play Snakes and Ladders with up to 6 friends or AI opponents.

Climb ladders - dodge snakes

There are ladders and snakes of varying lengths scattered around the board. Landing on a snake causes you to slide down the board, while you can climb up ladders you land at the foot of.

Chutes and Ladders

This game also includes Chutes and Ladders. It's the same game, but with chutes replacing snakes. This is a great kid-friendly version of the game and is the most popular version in the US.

About Snakes and Ladders

Snakes and Ladders is a chance-based board game featuring 100 squares. Players must get to the top while dealing with the consequences of every dice roll.

Historically, the game was used to teach children basic moral values. The ladders represented virtues, while the snakes represented vice. Today, it could be seen as a metaphor for life’s journey with all of its ups and downs.

Features
Fun, upbeat music
The ultimate game of chance
Play against up to 6 friends or AI
Also includes Chutes and Ladders
Release Date

March 2018, and was updated in January 2019

Developer

Code This Lab made Snakes and Ladders.

More Games Like This

Check out our classic board games for plenty more family favorites. Other popular titles include Rummikub, Uno Online, and the legendary Checkers Online.

Use the left mouse button to roll the dice.

FAQ
Is there skill to Snakes and Ladders?

Your fate in Snakes and Ladders is determined by the role of dice based on random chance. This game is based more on luck than skill.

Can I play Snakes and Ladders with friends?

Yes, you can play the game locally with up to six other players.

Can I play Snakes and Ladders on mobile?

Yes, Snakes and Ladders is available on mobile, desktop, and tablet, so you can play from most devices.

Where can I play Snakes and Ladders?

You can play Snakes and Ladders online for free at CrazyGames.

Why did Snakes and Ladders change to chutes and ladders?

Snakes and Ladders became a popular Milton Bradley game in the United States under the name of Chutes and Ladders in 1943.

Papa's Scooperia is a casual time management game where you embark on a journey to run your ice cream shop by taking, making, and serving orders. The restaurant can be slow but gets increasingly crowded as the days go by. The more crowded it gets, the greater the pressure becomes. Do a good job, and you won’t only earn the satisfaction of a hard day’s work, but you will also earn a winning in tips!

How to Play Papa's Scooperia

After losing your belongings in Oniontown, you find yourself in a tight spot and must earn money to return home. Papa Louie proposes an exciting alternative: stay in the bustling city and open an ice cream shop! Bake delicious cookies and craft delectable sundaes with a variety of ice cream flavors. Get ready for a delightful adventure in Papa's Scooperia!

Papa’s Scooperia is a classic time management game with friendly graphics and an enjoyable, familiar storyline - you’re working at an ice cream shop trying to impress customers and make tips.

You start your job at the ice cream shop with a training day. You run through the motions of taking orders, scooping cookie dough onto baking sheets, baking to perfection, adding ice cream and toppings, and serving. It's simple as that… until more and more customers come into the shop.

How customers rate your job is essential for the score. The score points accrue and increase the player’s rank. With progress in rank, you can unlock additional customers who will become regulars to the shop, as well as new ingredients, new clothes, and new furniture to enhance your “Scooperia”.

There are four different stations in Papa’s Scooperia.

Order Station

This is where customers come in and place their ice cream orders. The typical order consists of a scoop of ice cream on a freshly baked cookie, accompanied by a choice of toppings.

Dough Station

This is where you will make the cookies from fresh dough. Scoop up the dough and dip it in chocolate, vanilla, or color chips.

Bake Station

Now that you have your cookie dough ready, put it in the oven. Be sure not to burn any of the cookies. When the green bars by your cookie begin blinking, you’re nearly ready to serve. Plate your cookies, click the check, and send it out to the Build Station.

Build Station

Now that you have your base, the cookie, put it all together. Add your ice cream, toppings, and any other items your customer ordered. Send the ticket and ice cream out.

Customers will score you on how well you put the order together. They will also score you on how long customers have waited for their order, how well the cookie was baked, whether the toppings are right, and how well the dish is put together.

At the end of the day, you get to rest, then return and do it all over again.

Bonus rounds

In between baking and cooking, you’ll get the option to play some mini-rounds to gain points. Choose to skip or play.

Tips

When the shop is closed, you still get some last-minute customers coming in. They’re called closers. Use your skills to impress them, as they can be quite critical in their scoring.

Use the tips to buy shop upgrades, new clothing for your character, and furniture for the shop lobby.

History of Papa's Scooperia

This is the fourteenth installment of the Papa series, and the last one to be initially released as a flash game. It was published in 2018. Before starting the game, you can choose to play with either Carlo Romano or Koilee, and the Papa fanbase chose these two characters during game development.

Friday Night Funkin’ is a casual music game that combines 80s nostalgic visuals with music battles. At its heart, it’s a rap duel simulator: you take the role of Boyfriend, a determined wannabe rapper, who faces off against opponents to prove he is worthy of dating Girlfriend, who’s there the whole time, cheering you on from the speakers. The pressure is on. To be a successful rapper, you will need to follow screen prompts, perfect your timing and pattern recognition, and most importantly, never let the beat mmm drop.

Friday Night Funkin' Reviewed

We love dancing and music games in our family. Friday Night Funkin is a great free rhythm game where you press buttons in time with music tracks like the classic Dance Dance Revolution machines found in the 1990s arcade. The kids love it because it's silly and retro and I like the fact that it has a fan-made feel rather than the commercial dance games that cost a lot of money.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase.

How to Play Friday Night Funkin’

The main movement in Friday Night Funkin’ is to follow the colored arrows that scroll up and down the screen. Watch for when stationary markers overlap, and press the matching arrow key (or WASD keys) as soon as you see them overlap. Seems simple enough, but the first few rounds will have you questioning your rhythm.

With every successful match, Boyfriend gets to sing. With every arrow you miss, Boyfriend’s health score drops, quickly hurting his chances of surviving, let alone winning. When you actually get to battle, this is your time to shine and belt out the tunes. If you’re not familiar with music battles, they're similar to any other type of duel competition, but with a twist: your weapons are your words and tunes. You take turns with the opponent, and sometimes you sing together in unison.

You will hear classic songs like Dance Dance Revolution or Guitar Hero, and the objective is to sustain as many notes as possible, holding the arrows, sometimes for their entire duration. You can add variety, which is recommended, as it will boost your score if performed well. Get it wrong, and you will feel the heat on stage.

Difficulty Levels

Depending on your skill level as a digital singer, you can choose from three levels of difficulty in Friday Night Funkin’: easy, normal, and hard.

The more complex the level, the faster the arrows and the sequences become.

Friday Night Funkin' Game Modes

The demo version of Friday Night Funkin’ includes:

Story Mode. This mode takes you on a music battle journey with themed “weeks” of music, each featuring three or more songs against a pretty unique opponent. To win a week, you must clear all its tracks in a row.

Free Play. This mode lets you practice individual songs so you can get some solo time in the studio to get ready for the more important battles.

Friday Night Funkin' Story Mode

In Story Mode, you will follow Boyfriend on a weekly basis. He wants to win Girlfriend’s heart, but first must prove himself over time. Each week is designed with its own setting, opponent style, and themed soundtrack.

Week 1: Daddy Dearest, Girlfriend’s rockstar father.
Week 2: Skid & Pump, costumed kids from the Newgrounds series Spooky Month.
Week 3: Pico, an old Newgrounds mascot and Boyfriend’s hinted ex.
Week 4: Mommy Mearest, Girlfriend’s pop-star mother.
Week 5: A Christmas mall showdown with both parents and a sinister monster.
Week 6: Senpai, a cursed character in a retro dating sim setting.
Week 7: Tankman, a military parody character with sharp humor.
Weekend 1: Pico takes the spotlight against Darnell, complete with animated cutscenes.

Health and Scoring

You have a health gauge at the bottom of the screen with a “tug-of-war” health bar. The more notes you get, the more the bar pushes toward your side. The more notes you lose, the more the bar swings toward your rival. Lose all your health, and the song ends with your head hung low. However, if you survive the track, hold it high, because that will win you the round.

Now, if you know anything about performing in front of people, you know that a good performance is not about “surviving on stage” but about thriving. Each note in Friday Night Funkin’ has a score based on how accurately the note was held. Hit the note perfectly, and expect a “sick” score.

Some songs are easier than others, so take advantage of those to rack up your scores. However, you will be rewarded generously for the more difficult songs.

Strategies and Tips
Use both hands to manage all the controls. Split the controls between left and right hands to hit simultaneous notes. Imagine dancing with only one foot. It’s not gonna win you a competition.
Follow the patterns, and focus less on the arrows. When you need to mirror an opponent’s sequence, this will help.
Follow the rhythm. Every song has a strong beat or melody. Let the rhythm guide your timing instead of relying only on visuals.
Practice in Free Play. This is a lifesaver when it comes to more difficult songs. Practice them at a lower difficulty to master them.
Friday Night Funkin’ Music

Composed by Kawai Sprite, Friday Night Funkin’s soundtrack will have you moving and grooving in your swivel chair from the get-go. Each week brings a distinct style of music from funky hip-hop to spooky organ synths, electro-pop club beats, and even militaristic chiptune rock. This is a crash course in funk.

You may be familiar with a few of the tracks, like “M.I.L.F” and “Ugh” that became a viral sensation online.

Ongoing Development

FNF is an open-source game with an active development community and plenty of fan-made mods that expand the gameplay. In addition to mods made by avid fans, the developers recently added week 7 to the game and plan on turning it into a 'full-ass game' at some point in the future.

Friday Night Funkin is not available on mobile devices yet, but it will be at some point in the future since the Kickstarter got funded! This version of the game is open-source on GitHub and available under the Apache 2.0 license.

More Games Like This

Rhythm games are great fun to play solo or with your friends. The mechanics are simple, and whether you succeed often depends on your sense of rhythm and visual cues. If you enjoyed this game, you can browse our selection of casual games or try Geometry Dash, another tricky game where following rhythmic cues is essential.

You can also check out fun games like Snow Rider or World's Hardest Game.

Features
Original music with a range of influences from nu-jazz to Vocaloid dance beats
Extensive career mode with plenty of unique characters
Various difficulty modes are available to suit your rhythmic ability
Cool 90s B-Boy visuals
Also known as FNF

FAQ
What is Boyfriend's name in Friday Night Funkin'?
Boyfriend's name is simply 'Boyfriend', as stated by the developers.
Where can I listen to the Friday Night Funkin' soundtrack?
KawaiSprite has a bandcamp where you can listen to the Friday Night Funkin' soundtrack.
What is Friday Night Funkin' vs Whitty?
Whitty is a popular mod for Friday Night Funkin' starring Whitmore, a hot-headed rockstar who has beef with your girlfriend's parents.
Is Friday Night Funkin' free?
Yes! It is free to play in your web browser without having to download anything.
Who made Friday Night Funkin’?

Friday Night Funkin’ was created in 2020 by programmer Cameron “ninjamuffin99” Taylor with artists PhantomArcade and evilsk8r, and composer Kawai Sprite.

When did Friday Night Funkin’ come out?

Friday Night Funkin’ was first released as a prototype on October 5, 2020 for Ludum Dare 47.

What is Friday Night Funkin’?

Friday Night Funkin’ is a free rhythm-based indie game where players help Boyfriend win rap battles against quirky opponents by pressing the correct keys in time with the music.

Where to play Friday Night Funkin’?

How to Play Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter

Skilled FPS players will love Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter. The game features excellent, clean 3D graphics with a fluid and intuitive control system that allows you to maneuver quickly and tactically. Fragen is an intense shooting FPS game where you face adrenaline-filled battles on your own or in a team. Whether you choose free-for-all or team deathmatch, your goal is to survive and dominate. You will need to customize your arsenal, up your game plan, and outpace your rivals in every fight. It's non-stop action for the start.

How to Play Fragen

In Fragen, you take on the role of a soldier in full combat gear, ready to fight your way through an abandoned complex filled with enemies. As you roam, you’ll face shooters everywhere, so stay alert. Switch between close-range and long-range guns depending on your position, and always keep an eye both ahead and over your shoulder.

Start by choosing either a solo or team battle, then pick your mode. Solo battle options include free-for-all, sniper only, or secondary weapon only. Team battle offers modes like team deathmatch, gun race, sniper only, and secondary only.

The game features a battle pass where you can earn skins, gear upgrades, and exclusive rewards. Weapon customization lets you fine-tune rifles, shotguns, snipers, and more to fit your style.

For best results, use a controller or mouse, as playing solely with the keyboard can slow you down. Speed and precision are key to survival.

Your arsenal consists of primary and secondary weapons. Check their stats carefully for headshot damage, range, fire rate, and capacity to find what best fits your play style and the current environment. Weapons can only be purchased once you’ve earned enough reward points.

Solo battle modes include:

Free for all
Sniper only
Secondary only

Team battle modes include:

Team deathmatch
Gun race
Sniper only
Secondary only

Rewards vary daily and can include cash, armor, weapons, and more. Since there are no maps to guide you, rely on your instincts to navigate the terrain.

Use the tactical cover system to take advantage of terrain and obstacles, gaining the upper hand in firefights. Prove yourself in ranked modes and clan challenges by climbing leaderboards and competing as a team.

Fight through stunning environments, from neon-lit streets to desert bases and industrial zones. With smooth controls, intuitive aiming, and immersive graphics and sound, Fragen delivers realistic and intense battles for both newcomers and veterans alike.

Get ready for nonstop action where every battle counts, whether you’re going solo, teaming up, or climbing the ranks. With deep customization, tactical gameplay, and stunning environments, this shooter delivers fast, immersive combat that keeps you coming back for more.

BuildNow GG is an online build-and-shoot game featuring various game modes, weapons, and maps. Build and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard and hone your skills in offline training mode.

How to Play

BuildNow GG is part of an emerging genre of online games that combine tactical building with third-person shooter gameplay.

Build, shoot, and party

In the game, you build ramps, roofs, and walls as quickly as possible while taking on another opponent. For new players, aim training is an excellent way to learn the basic controls. The game is online, but you can also start a private match with your friends in party mode. You can host up to six players in a private game.

Master your weapons

The weapons cover the standard loadout you’d expect in a shooting title, and you can switch between them while you battle. The loadout features a pistol, a machine gun, a sniper rifle, a shotgun, and a pickaxe. All guns have unlimited ammo and feature realistic ballistics.

Customize your profile

BuildNow GG features extensive customization options. You can customize the visual quality, FPS limit, HDR and more in the graphics settings. The options also include full customization of the key mapping so you can create the ideal profile for shooting and building.

Game Modes

BuildNow GG features five game modes located on different maps. These are:

Freebuild - a sandbox-style map where you can play PvP and practice without limits
V-Arena - 1v1 battle or 6 players FFA, last man standing wins
BoxFight - 1v1 Boxfight or 4 player FFA, last man standing wins
Aim Training - improve your aim on static and moving targets offline
Zone Wars - 6 player FFA in a random zone
More Games Like This

Browse the building games section for similar titles. Closely related games include 1v1 Battle and the classic 1v1.LOL.There is also a vast collection of shooters in the FPS and third-person shooter categories. Browse shooting games for the full collection.

Bullet Force is an online multiplayer FPS game featuring fast-paced action. Battle against other players on tactical maps using a range of weapons at your disposal. Crate custom games and buy new perks to improve your character.

How to Play
Basic gameplay

Hop into online FPS battles and put your reactions and aim skills to the test on a range of intense battleground maps from small to large. You can play live against up to 20 players using a plethora of weapons like the M4A1, colt 45, M67 grenades, AWP sniper rifle, and many more.

Game modes

You’ll find all the classic FPS game modes on Bullet Force. You can play TDM (Team Death Match), FFA (Free-For-All), Conquest, and Gun Game. All of these game modes feature live-action battles between you and other players. However, you can also play offline against bots too! If you just want to play quickly, you can jump into a game instantly with quick play.

Customize your soldier

There are over 100 camouflages and a vast array of optics, laser sights and other weapon attachments to make your weapons your own. Along with weapons skins is full character customization, ranging from aesthetic changes to performance-boosting perks and killstreaks. You can equip these in-game to get an edge over the competition.

Create a custom game

You can set up your own public or private game in Bullet Force. The custom options are extensive. You can choose the game mode, max players, ping, and the specific weapons players can and can’t use.

More Games Like This

Bullet Force is an excellent FPS game with classic charm. If you love this kind of raw skill-based shooting game, check out Kirka.io and Ev.io for more. You can also check out another Blayze FPS game Forward Assault.

BodyCamera Shooter is an FPS shooting game where you see everything from a body camera fixed on your fighter, taking you through a pretty realistic experience through abandoned buildings and rubble, aiming to kill or be killed. You'll understand the concept if you're familiar with the Bodycam game. Enter the battlefield and enjoy a unique gaming experience! BodyCamera Shooter offers ultra-realistic first-person shooter action directly in your browser and on your phone.

How to Play BodyCamera Shooter

The goal of a BodyCamera Shooter is to stay alive by neutralizing threats and surviving waves of enemies in unfamiliar territory. The emphasis is often on tactical decision-making, realism, and immersion, with a strong focus on precision and careful movement. You must navigate through environments, often with limited resources and visual awareness, to complete these objectives while maintaining your own survival.

The key to this game is combined reaction time and precision. There are numerous moves to make, and uncertainty greatly outweighs tactical precision, forcing you to adapt and react quickly to unpredictable situations. WASD or arrow keys will navigate your player, but your strength lies in using your keypad or mouse to aim and shoot.

Focus on mastering movement while aiming and shooting at first. You'll likely get killed while practicing this, but it is hard to move on to more skillful moves until this is down pat.

Once you gain a bit of momentum, incorporate a bit of running (shift key) and jumping (space bar) to avoid enemy fire and navigate your surroundings more quickly.

The R key will be vital once you master your craft; it will reload your weapon quickly. Use this when surrounded by enemy fire to avoid wasting time with automatic reloads.

You can upgrade your soldier through six different levels, each corresponding to a new weapon that will be unlocked as you progress through the levels.

There are four different scenarios for the combat: the first two will be available immediately, while to access the Counter-Strike looking map, you will have to reach level 5, and the last one will only be accessible after reaching level 10.

FPS perspective

Game graphics are hyper-realistic and will get your adrenaline pumped. The gameplay is sometimes so real that you question whether the graphics were based on realistic scenarios and scenery.

The bodycam is positioned at chest level, providing a more realistic field of view, although it is still relatively limited due to the nature of your environment. You can use surrounding sounds as guidance, but you’re more likely to hear your footsteps than your opponents. The fish-eye view is a remarkable feature of this game, and adapting to it will be a key to the success you’ll achieve in this game.

Features
Realistic controls and graphics
Juicy effects
A variety of weapons
Well-developed levels
Leaderboard
Dynamic gameplay
Smooth animations

Sniper Shot: Bullet Time is a thrilling shooting sniper game that puts a powerful sniper rifle in your hands, challenging you to eliminate your enemies with precision and style. Line up your shot, and pull the trigger. Witness the intense, slow-motion bullet animation as it makes an impact. With each shot, you can experiment by targeting different parts of the enemy’s body, adding a layer of strategy to every kill.

How to Play Sniper Shot: Bullet Time

In Sniper Shot: Bullet Time, an FPS game, you step into the shoes of a highly skilled sniper entrusted with the critical mission of taking down enemies from afar. As you enter this matrix-like grid, take a moment to familiarize yourself with your surroundings. Everything can easily look the same in this monochromatic background.

Scan the environment for potential targets while keeping your weapon ready. The game immerses you in thrilling slow-motion sequences that amplify the intensity of your shots, allowing you to savor every dramatic headshot and strategic kill.

Success in this high-stakes world demands mastery of various shooting techniques. Use your reloads wisely and perfect the art of no-scope shots to get rid of enemies quickly and efficiently. The key is to aim for vital body parts to deliver devastating blows that not only ensure enemy elimination but also add an exhilarating layer of strategy to your gameplay.

But don’t forget to stay vigilant—your enemies are not just sitting ducks. Watch your back and anticipate incoming fire as you navigate the battlefield. Their objective is the same as yours—to eliminate the enemy.

As you progress through increasingly complex levels, keep a close eye on the number of enemies remaining, ensuring you accurately identify each target before squeezing the trigger. Each new wave brings tougher opponents, testing your skills and reflexes like never before.

Good luck, and watch your back!

More Games Like This

There are plenty of shooting games to browse through, with popular titles like Left 4 Dead, a zombie survival game where you must do everything to live through the apocalypse, or Hazmob FPS Online Shooter, where you engage in critical battles against other players. Have a look at some of our sniper games to narrow down your searches.

Who are these orange-tinted glass chaps? They were once ordinary people, but they drank a strange liquid that turned them orange and gave them a hankering for human flesh. Now there’s a full-blown apocalypse somehow, and all you can do is shoot them down relentlessly for sport while staying alive.

Run and shoot relentlessly to survive

Sure, it’s the apocalypse, but style still matters. Horde Killer: You vs 100 features an extensive range of character customization options. Assault Bots (previously Bot Machines) is an excellent real-time multiplayer vehicle battle game made by Blayze Games. Choose from an array of weapons, jump into the battlefield, and obliterate your opponents. Blayze games also make Bullet Force, Plated Glory, and more highly popular games!

Rebrand

The game has been rebranded as Assault Bots since 21 December 2020.

Bot Battles

The vehicular combat in Assault Bots is immense fun. The simple mechanics leave considerable room for you to harness your strategic and aiming skills to blow up your enemies, which quickly becomes an addictive and enjoyable experience.

Team Deathmatch

The game mode now uses team deathmatch. Work together with your teammates to eliminate as many opponents as possible within the time limit!

Capture the Flag (legacy mode)

As well as destroying the opposition, you must capture as many flags as possible, as this is the critical objective. You capture flags by keeping your vehicle within the capture range of the flag while defending your position against enemies. This is where you can implement your personal and team strategy to get a competitive edge over the other side!

Customize

One of the aspects of Assault Bots that keeps the gameplay fresh is the ability to switch up your arsenal of weaponry. In any game, you'll have two slots free to choose from an array of weapons, including a minigun, machine gun, RPG, grenade launcher, and more. Each weapon has its strengths and weaknesses.

You can also apply add-ons like health-regen and turbo, as well as customizing the body and movement of your vehicle to create your favorite Assault Bots for Battle.

Time Shooter 2 is a first-person shooter where time stands still until you move. Plan your shots and moves carefully. Dodge enemy fire in epic slo-mo combat and make your way around the map using time to your advantage.

How to Play Time Shooter 2

Time Shooter 2 is a shooting game inspired by the style of SuperHot, featuring the same thrilling action that keeps you determined to beat each level.

The futuristic graphics support the premise that time moves only when you move, so plan your moves wisely. Controlling time is to your advantage. You will be able to stop a bullet in midair to identify how to dodge it. You will also be able to get a good grasp of your surroundings and plan your next ambush.

Anything in the game can be a weapon, and they are all well within reach. Pick up the weapon best fitted to the job and navigate the map, carefully taking down enemies and controlling time with your movements. Anything can be a weapon, so don’t be afraid to use whatever the situation demands.

You can receive endless ammo or invulnerability by watching a short ad for one level only.

Time Shooter 2 Tips
Check your surroundings before you move
Take out enemies with long-range weapons first unless you are in immediate danger.
Pick the weapon best suited to each task—if many enemies have guns, consider the AK-47!
Look out for enemies waiting for you with an itchy trigger finger
More Games Like This

Time Shooter 2 is based on the original concept that contributed to the success of SuperHot. Check out more of our shooting games and FPS games.

You can also try different types of shooting games by playing Bubble Shooter or Agar.io.

Downtown 1930s Mafia is a third-person shooting mafia game where gangs fight for their territories. Picture it: you’re in the middle of a city, surrounded by brick buildings with long streets that lead to harbor views. Black market, bank robbery, smuggling, illegal alcohol, and raids are all part of your everyday doings. It’s you against them.

How to Play Downtown 1930s Mafia

Downtown 1930s is an action-packed multiplayer third-person shooter where you choose your weapon color, car, and character to take control of the streets in the fictional Empire City. Equipped with a vintage car, a powerful weapon, and a tailored suit, your goal is to lead your gang to survival, dominate the city, and maintain respect in this ever-evolving world. With gameplay influenced by community feedback, Downtown 1930s is constantly being improved, offering a dynamic experience where the action never stops.

Features include an open world, intense gunfights, and high-speed driving. You can engage in epic gang drive-bys, choose your character, and even shoot at gas station pumps for explosive splash damage. Plus, the game includes a filter for bad words, ensuring a fun and friendly environment. Invite friends to play together in the same room, whether you're fighting in the streets or strategizing your next move.

The game offers two types of rooms: the Full Fight room, where no admin controls the action, and anyone can challenge you to a fight: just be ready for tough gameplay; and the Admin room, where a player manages the room and enforces rules. If the admin leaves, the room turns into a Full Fight room, so make sure to respect the rules and other players for the best experience. Empire City. It is a third-person shooter under permanent development driven by advice and ideas of the community.

Features
OpenWorld

Rooms

There are two kinds of rooms:

Full Fight room, the room has no admin, anyone can fight you. Do not complain about tough gameplay. Still respect every player.
Admin room. The room has a player admin. Follow the rules of that room, or you might be removed from it. If you are the admin and leave the room, the admin functionality for that room is gone, and it converts into a Full Fight room.

Muscle Gun.IO is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where you get over 55 customizable weapons, each with its own unique upgrades, so you can outgun your opponents and dominate the battlefield. Use your weapons and might to fight battles with other players. The more you win, the more you earn, so you can boost not only your gameplay but your stats as well. With intuitive controls and fast-paced maps, you can create custom matches or dive into modes like Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, and more.

How to Play Muscle Gun.IO

In Muscle Gun.IO, an intense first-person shooter, your primary goal is simple—defeat your opponent before they defeat you. Thrust into the heart of battle, you'll navigate unfamiliar terrain, armed and ready to outmaneuver and outgun your enemies. With adrenaline pumping, every encounter becomes a test of skill and strategy as you fight for survival in a variety of challenging environments. Whether you're sprinting across open fields or sneaking through tight corridors, staying sharp and alert is key to victory.

The multiplayer game offers a range of dynamic modes that transport you to different battle zones, each equipped with unique challenges and weapon sets. With 55 customizable weapons available, you can upgrade your arsenal using points earned through combat. Each weapon upgrade allows for deeper customization, so you can adapt your loadout to match your playstyle, the battlefield, and your opponent’s strength. Whether you're a sniper picking off enemies from a distance or a close-combat brawler, your choice of weaponry will make all the difference in outlasting the competition.

The more you play, the more you'll get to know the variety of maps offered and the territory they represent. It's key to study the ins and outs of these locations because it will help you find hiding spots and to better understand where your opponent may be hiding. Be careful of leaving yourself a completely open target to your fierce enemies who want to take you down.

Check out more of our FPS games to continue the adventure. Play some of our more popular titles like Shell Shockers, where you control weapon-wielding eggs to fight opponents till they crack. Time Shooter 3: SWAT brings several new features and challenges to the Time Shooter series. The orange men have been identified as terrorists, and it’s your mission to take them down and free the hostages.

Join your horse-headed homie as you raid the various rooms and vaults of the bank for diamonds, jewelry, and cold, hard cash. Take the hostages to safety for a financial reward. Despite being a ruthless criminal, you do have a heart.

Unlock new areas

After each level, you can upgrade your abilities and unlock new areas. Unlock more raid-worthy areas to earn more money. Fight in increasingly outrageous battles with a tonne of weapons. The further you get, the more powerful and frequent the law enforcement response is. Thankfully, you’ll be joined by two new bank-robbing buddies in later levels who can help you deal with all the police.

Uncover hidden secrets

As you progress, you’ll uncover more sinister secrets lurking in the bank vaults and beyond, making it truly questionable whether you should save the staff members in this building. The vaults and backrooms are home to some of the bank's most experimental treasures and one very special artifact. What dark dangers and exotic treasures will you uncover? There’s only one way to find out.

More Games Like This

Once you’ve finished being a career criminal, check out some more of our top free FPS games. Some popular choices in this category include Shell Shockers, Krunker, and DEADSHOT.io.

Death City: Zombie Invasion is a shooting horror game where you must fight off waves of zombies at every angle while completing task-driven quests. As the city falls into chaos, your mission is to uncover the cause of the apocalypse and fight to survive. Upgrade your weapons, buy new guns, and improve your skills to increase your chances. Play through different modes like sniper missions, survival challenges, and resource exploration. Dive into the intense horror of this post-apocalyptic world and battle to stay alive!

How to Play Death City: Zombie Invasion

You and your small crew have reached the bitter end—the zombie apocalypse is here, and survival is your only option. Huddled around a flickering fire, you plan your attack, surrounded by hordes of undead in a brutal, kill-or-be-killed world.

Zombies are everywhere, easily spotted by their eerie blue forms, and you’ll be fighting them on a full 360-degree battlefield. Keep your head on a swivel—while you're battling enemies in front, they can sneak up from behind. If you take too many hits, it’s game over, and you’ll know you’re in trouble when the red glow around you starts closing in.

Follow the arrows and prompts—they’ll lead you to the essential resources you need to stay alive. But your biggest enemy? Reloading time. Those critical moments can leave you vulnerable to swarms of zombies, so make every shot count.

It’s you and a few brave souls against a world overrun by zombies. From a bird’s-eye view, you’ll see the cities you need to reclaim on your road to freedom. Prepare for intense missions in terrifying places like End of the World, Rush Time, Out of Inferno, Forest Danger, and Be Full of Peril. Each location will push you to the brink, with unique challenges and different characters to play.

Lucky Spin

Take your chances with the Lucky Spin wheel to snag crucial resources like DNA, medicine, coins, and diamonds. But don’t get too greedy—you’ll need to watch ads if you over-spin, and there’s a cooldown period to keep things balanced.

Upgrades

Arm yourself for the battle of your life by upgrading to powerful assault rifles, grenades, and faster-firing weapons. Pay close attention to your weapon’s stats—damage, speed, reload time, and accuracy—because as you dive deeper into the chaos, every advantage counts.

With danger lurking at every turn, it's up to you to upgrade, strategize, and fight your way through hordes of the undead. Will you conquer the apocalypse, or will the zombies claim your last breath?

More Games Like This

Want a bit more fright to your night? Try some of our more popular shooting games like Left 4 Dead, a fan game based on the famous zombie survival game where your aim is to survive the zombie apocalypse, or Hazmob FPS Online Shooter, a multiplayer shooting FPS game where every second counts. You will also want to check out our horror games for even more eerie fun.

Mazean is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where you command sleek robots with powerful laser guns, explosive grenades, and dynamic force fields. In this high-octane battle royale, your mission is to dismantle rival robots and seize the coveted power-up crowns to assert your dominance in the arena or die trying.

How to Play Mazean

Your mission in Mazean is to outmaneuver and outgun other players as you engage in fast-paced, futuristic combat. Choose your weapon and color of ammunition to strike your opponents with. Keep your fingers on the WASD keys and your hand on the mouse to shoot. This game is fast-paced, and you can easily be disassembled from all angles.

As you roam around the maze, your opponent can pop out at any moment, so stay alert. You are on a structure on water with cliff edges that may give you vertigo. Don't worry; you won't fall off, so just concentrate on spotting the enemy.

With its intense gameplay and cutting-edge visuals, Mazean challenges you to prove your prowess and rise to the top of the robot leaderboard! Don't be afraid to attack head-on, but only if you're ready to aim and shoot quickly, as opponents are quick to counterattack. The maze can be used to your advantage. Hide behind walls, and if you're not ready for offence, have your opponent find you. Be ready!

Warzone Armor is a multiplayer shooting action game where two teams fight to the death. Your mission is to drive into enemy territory, destroy their units, and earn points for your team. The team with the highest score at the end of the match claims victory. With fast-paced action and strategic gameplay, Warzone Armor delivers intense vehicular combat like never before!

How to Play Warzone Armor

In Warzone Armor, you will first choose which team you want to fight for—the red team or the blue team. This multiplayer battle game has teams from all around the world fighting for dominance in intense vehicular combat. Choose from a range of powerful vehicles, each designed for maximum destruction.

You’ll start with the Rhinoceros, a heavy tank that you own, and from there, you can unlock more advanced vehicles by earning rewards through daily missions and by destroying enemy units. These rewards can also be used to upgrade your vehicle, improving your firepower and survivability on the battlefield.

Other vehicles you can choose from include:

Inferno - Heavy Assault Vehicle
Horse Hunter - Light Rocket Launcher Vehicle
Nightingale - Light Armer Helicopter

For a quick advantage, you can temporarily unlock vehicles by watching ads, but these are only available until you leave the room.

Your mission is to infiltrate enemy territory, destroy opposing units, and rack up points for your team. Every kill, mission failure, or death impacts the score, and the team with the highest score at the end of the match claims victory. With its fast-paced action and strategic gameplay, Warzone Armor keeps you on edge, testing your combat skills in a fierce battle for victory!

Wild Hunter 3D is an action-packed hunting simulation game that takes you on an immersive adventure into the wilderness. Your mission is to track and hunt various wild animals, including bears, crocodiles, deer, buffalo, and wolves. With 100 challenging levels set across three distinct game worlds such as dense forests, icy tundras, and arid deserts, you'll experience a variety of environments that test your skills and strategy.

How to Play Wild Hunter 3D

Step into the wild and take on the role of a skilled hunter. Each hunt presents different animals to track and shoot, but the rugged landscape makes them difficult to spot. Staying alert is key, as the terrain provides plenty of cover for your targets.

Your hunting goals appear in the top-left corner, showing how many deer, boars, or other animals you need to hunt. Completing these objectives earns reward points, and after each successful shot, you’ll see a distance meter displaying how far you were from the target. You can move around to find a better position, but the most rewarding shots come from a distance.

Precision is everything. If you miss, the animal will be startled and run, making it much harder to hit. Moving targets requires skill, and a poorly timed shot could turn the hunt against you. If an animal becomes aware of your presence, it might charge, and a wild boar stampede could end the round instantly.

To improve your aim, you can adjust both general sensitivity and scope sensitivity. Moving closer may give you an easier shot, but true hunters thrive on long-range accuracy. Survive 100 rounds, master the wild, and prove yourself as the ultimate hunter.

Sharpen your aim, manage your resources, and prepare for the thrill of the hunt in Wild Hunter 3D!

Features
Rewards for successful hunts to enhance your gameplay.
A selection of 5 weapon types is available in the in-game store.
Realistic animal behaviors, such as fear and escape.

Fortzone Battle Royale is a high-stakes survival shooter where you face off against rivals in a massive, scenic battleground. Explore forests, cross rivers, and scavenge for resources as the action ramps up quickly. Outsmart enemies, collect powerful bonuses, and fight to be the last one standing in this fast-paced test of skill and strategy.

How to Play Fortzone Battle Royale

Begin by choosing a male or female character, then personalize your look with a variety of options for legs, body, and hair. Unlock and equip unique skins to prep for the battlefield.

There are several game modes to choose from, which include:

Single Battle Royale: Available from the start
Team Battle Royale: Unlocks at Level 4
Royale Duel: Unlocks at Level 6
Random Mode: Jump into any unlocked mode

Your match begins midair, launched from a flying bus. Choose your landing spot wisely, whether it’s flatland, thick bushes, or water you’ll have to wade through. The storm is closing in fast, so move quickly, gather resources, and head for shelter. Elevated structures on stilts often contain valuable rewards, so scour them.

Scavenge the area for weapons, gear, and supplies. You’ll start with a basic pickaxe, but upgrade to ranged and more powerful weapons as soon as possible to protect yourself. Use the destructible environment to your advantage—build fortifications for cover or smash through obstacles to escape danger.

Need to move fast? Jump into a vehicle and speed through the terrain, but be prepared: enemy skirmishes can break out at any moment.

Complete missions, survive longer, and eliminate opponents to rise through the levels. Play solo or squad up with friends, your approach is your own.

Are you ready to earn your spot among the top fighters? Drop in, gear up, and prove you're the last one standing in Fortzone Battle Royale!

More Games Like This

If you want to continue battling, browse our action category for more thrilling challenges. Forge swords for fearless fighters in Jacksmith. Cuphead is a fast-paced run-and-gun game with 1930s cartoon-style animation. Ducklife, begins with one duckling and a mission to rebuild your storm-hit farm.

Stickman Clash is a thrilling action battle game where you battle as stickman warriors armed with an array of exciting weapons. Engage in fast-paced combat, outsmart opponents, and showcase your skills in dynamic arenas. The game's captivating action and challenging mechanics keep you hooked as you strive to become the ultimate stickman champion!

How to Play Stickman Clash

Stickman Clash combines fun, chaos, and unpredictable physics, making every battle a unique experience! Stand out in battle by customizing your stickman! Choose your character's colors, heads, and weapons to reflect your unique style.

Choose from an arsenal, including boxing gloves, ice cream, boots, daggers, guitars, katanas, bombs, portal guns, and scythes. Each weapon adds a unique twist to your strategy.

Battle in stunning environments like a sea surrounded by a giant octopus. But beware, the creatures are the least of your worries as chaos unfolds!

Stickman dynamics make every move unpredictable, and your movement is limited by the WASD keys. Your character flops around, making precise targeting difficult. However, constant movement can work in your favor: it’s harder to hit a moving target and easier to surprise your opponent with unexpected strikes.

Stickman Clash is designed for one or two players, and three- and four-player modes are planned for even more chaotic fun!

Survival mode

Work together to fend off waves of monsters and defend your base. Use bombs strategically to clear crowds without harming teammates.

Boss Fights

These epic battles test your skills. The pickaxe-wielding boss is especially challenging, dodge its attacks and counter with well-timed bombs. Teamwork and precision are your best allies here.

Game Tips

Stay agile: The more you move, the harder you are to hit.

Use the environment: Maps come with unique challenges and opportunities.

Master timing: Especially in boss fights, precision and teamwork are key.

Experiment: Try different weapons and strategies to discover what works best for you.

More Games Like This

There is plenty of action to go around, so browse our vast selection of games to continue playing. Try Cuphead, a game where you control a warplane and fight boss battles; Cookie Delivery, where you take on the dangerous and difficult work of a cookie delivery person; or Run 3, an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien.

Words of Wonders is a crossword puzzle where you connect letters to reveal hidden words. Test your vocabulary and find all the words to progress and reach more challenging levels. Will you become a master wordsmith in this delightful word game?

How to Play Words of Wonders

Words of Wonders is an engaging word puzzle game that combines the excitement of crossword puzzles with the thrill of word search. Players form words by connecting letters in a grid, unlocking hidden words,, and progressing through levels.

You'll see a grid of random letters when you start the game. Each grid represents a level; your task is to find words by connecting adjacent letters. You can swipe your finger over the letters in any direction (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) to form words. Longer words and more complex combinations may unlock bonus rewards, so watch for opportunities to maximize your word choices.

Connect the letters to form a word. It will be revealed if the word you formed is on the crossword grid. Not all words will be on the grid, so use the letters you have already discovered to ensure you create words that will fit the puzzle!

Completing the grid allows you to unlock the next level, which gets progressively more challenging. The difficulty increases with more letters and words to find, so keep your brain engaged as you move through the game.

Some examples include finding the words “WON,” “OWN,” “NOW,” or “TOP,” “POT,” or “OPT” from a set of three letters. Or a mixture of three and four-letter words to form “WALL,” "ALL,” and “LAW.”

If you find yourself stuck, there are hints and boosters available to help you out. These tools can reveal letters or help you find the next word, though they're limited, so use them wisely. There are also rewards for completing levels or discovering difficult words, such as coins or additional hints, which can help you advance further.

Progress through the levels and collect unique background images with each new milestone. The levels get more difficult by introducing longer words and more letters, increasing the chances of getting it wrong and challenging your vocabulary skills!

Some levels feature specific themes, like landmarks or animals, where the words you form are related to that theme. As you progress, you’ll unlock different "worlds" or locations, each with unique challenges and puzzles. You also get fun bits of info throughout, like learning that The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

The goal is to find all the words in the grid before you run out of moves or time. Each level has a set number of words to complete in order to progress to the next stage. You may also encounter bonus rounds or challenges that offer extra rewards when completed.

As you move through levels, you'll earn points, coins, and other rewards, which will help you advance in the game. Some versions of the game also let you compete against friends or other players, adding a competitive element to the experience.

With its relaxing pace and engaging gameplay, Words of Wonders is a fun way to challenge your mind and expand your vocabulary while enjoying an immersive puzzle-solving experience.

Enjoy a range of exciting and challenging word puzzles in Words of Wonders. The game features an easy starting point to suit players of all ages and experience levels. See how good you are at finding all the words and become a master wordsmith!

Game Tips

Use the letters you have already discovered as a clue to find the word
Use the hammer icon to reveal a letter of your choice
Click on the hints button to reveal a random letter
Earn gems to buy hints and reveal letters
More Games Like This

Once you’ve reached your linguistic limits in Words of Wonders, check out more of our curated word games. There are many fun word games for all knowledge levels. Two popular choices to play next are Word Wipe, a word search game with a twist where you use letters from all around and in any direction; Word Scramble, a popular word game where you decode scrambled letters to uncover hidden words; or Word Search, a simple yet classic game offered in different languages.

Open House is a puzzle match-3 game where you're unexpectedly tasked with turning an abandoned residence into your dream home via one puzzle at a time. Each puzzle brings about new furnishings and upgrades to keep you hooked. You have options, so redesign rooms with your style choices, swap out furniture, and watch your estate transform from rags to riches.

How to Play Open House

You, Oscar, are fresh off a rough flight, and things couldn’t have started worse. Somewhere during the trip, all your belongings fell out of the plane. You beg Theo, the pilot who took you to this island, to turn back so you can find them, but he refuses, saying he has too many passengers. He takes off without you.

Trying to stay positive, you decide this might be the perfect chance to start over in your new beachside home. After all, it’s only a suitcase… and luckily, you were wearing your favorite shirt during the flight. Time to see your new place.

You greet your neighbor, who’s not exactly welcoming, then head toward your new home only to find it looks nothing like the pictures from the real estate listing. The porch is falling apart, the rooms are wrecked, and it’s clear today is not your day. You can’t help but wonder if you’re on some sort of prank show.

Your first quest is to remove all the covers from the furniture in hopes of finding a hidden camera. To do this, you’ll complete match-3 puzzles that appear on the screen. Each match earns points and helps you move forward.

As you work, you notice the place is so bad that it even has critters running around. It’s time to contact the real estate agency. You're sitting at your computer when the desk collapses. You’ll need to replace both the desk and the chair before you can write to Mr. Fraudley, the man who sold you this disaster of a house. You send him a message explaining the mess, and he blocks you immediately.

Just when you’re feeling hopeless, your neighbor Charles surprises you by finding your missing suitcases, but the purple flower, which means a lot to you, is still missing. He advises you to get a wardrobe to store your clothes. After that, you’ll need a good night’s rest, which means buying a new bed.

Between each home repair or furniture purchase, you’ll play match-3 puzzles to earn what you need. Every successful round brings you closer to fixing up the house.

You keep trying to leave the island, but something always stops you. In the meantime, you keep decorating, cleaning, and repairing. Over time, you might just discover that this wrecked beach house has the potential to become the dream home you never knew you wanted.

More Games Like This

Mahjongg Solitaire is an online mahjong puzzle board game that features traditional rules and modern visuals. There are no shuffles, and the game is timed, but the game's pace is relaxed.

How to Play Mahjongg Solitaire

Spot the patterns

Mahjong is a tricky puzzle game. There are so many tiles, many of which look the same but feature slight differences. Along with the need to spot these patterns, you can’t move any pieces with both sides blocked. The left or right side needs to be accessible, at least.

Finding a couple of “free” tiles is the challenge here, with a tile-free being when there are no tiles on top of it. In addition, either its left or right side needs to be open. In this version of Mahjong Solitaire, you can look at the top of your screen to understand how many pairs of tiles are “free” to be matched, plus you can match the special tiles, those with a colored background, anytime.

Use hints when you’re stuck

Mahjongg Solitaire features hints if you get stuck, but unlike some other mahjong games, it does not have a shuffle feature. The games are also timed, meaning there is some urgency to how many tiles you can match.

When the game ends, you’ll get a score for the tiles you matched and a bonus for how far you got in the game before your time ran out.

Tile groups in Mahjongg Solitaire

Mahjongg Solitaire features 144 tiles divided primarily into three suits. The primary suits are:

Dots - feature circles
Bamboo - feature lines
Characters - feature Chinese characters

In Mahjongg Solitaire, you’ll also notice special tiles that can be matched even without the same image. These are highlighted in blue or green.

More Games Like This

Mahjong Solitaire is an excellent choice for both beginners and regular Mahjong enthusiasts. However, there are many other titles in our collection of Mahjong games. Other puzzle games you may like include board games such as 2048, Rummikub, and Ludo.
