How to Play Chess Free

Chess Free follows the classic rules of chess. The objective is to checkmate your opponent's king, meaning it is in a position to be captured and cannot escape.

You can play against the computer, compete online with real players, or share the same screen with a friend. With 18 difficulty levels ranging from Beginner to World Champion, you can play based on your level.

Depending on your level, you can choose a "handicap," so you have a bit of an advantage. You can also enable hints and interactive tips to help guide you throughout.

The rules are basic—players take turns moving their pieces. Pawns move forward but capture diagonally, knights move in an L-shape, and other pieces have unique movement patterns. Strategy is key in chess. Protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent's moves. The game ends when one player's king is checkmated, resulting in a win or if a draw occurs under certain conditions.

In chess, a draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. This can happen for several reasons, such as stalemate (where a player has no legal moves but is not in check), repetition of the same position three times, 50 moves without a capture or pawn move, insufficient material to checkmate, or mutual agreement between the players.

Made a mistake?

No problem—use the move cancel feature to undo and rethink your strategy. After each match, detailed analysis highlights errors and suggests better moves, while the option to replay specific moments helps reinforce learning.

You can save your rating and pick different time control modes like bullet, blitz, and rapid. Customize the board and pieces to your liking, review your move history, and even express yourself with playful cartoon emotions as you interact with your opponent.

Special Chess Moves to Know

Castling

Castling is a special chess move involving the king and a rook. It’s only allowed if neither the king nor the rook have moved previously, and there are no pieces between them. Additionally, the king cannot be in check, and it must not move through or land on any square that is under attack. This move helps protect the king and connect the rooks for better defense.

Taking the pass

Taking the pass, or en passant, is a special pawn capture in chess. If your opponent moves a pawn two squares forward and lands next to your pawn, you can capture it on your next move as if it had only moved one square. Your pawn will take its place, but this capture must be done immediately.

Ludo King™ is a classic board game also known as Pachisi or Parcheesi. The objective of the game is to bring all of your four colored tokens to the designated home column.

How to Play Ludo King™

You can start an online game or play against the computer, with just one additional player or play against three opponents in a 4 player challenge.

Choose your color and then start the game. Each player will take turns to roll the dice.

Ludo Rules
roll a 6 to take your tokens out of the base onto the starting square. You must bring all the tokens out and move them towards home strategically.
when you roll a 6 you have the right to roll the dice again. If you get a 6 three times in a row you'll forfeit your turn.
rolling less than 6 means that your turn is over after your move.
if your token lands on a square that holds an opponent's token, their token is forced back to the base and you gain the right to roll the dice again.
squares with a star are safe landings: tokens on star-squares cannot be sent back to the base. There are 4 squares with a star on this board.
when the same player has two tokens on the same square, those form a block, that other players cannot pass.
you need to get all four tokens to the home triangle to win the game. Tokens can only enter the triangle on exact dice rolls.
History and features of Ludo King™

Being one of the top games played worldwide, Ludo King™ has been rated as the best casual game in the board games genre. Ludo King™ is a cross-platform multiplayer game available on Desktop Android, iOS, and HTML5. The modes available are Online Multiplayer and Computer Mode.

Ludo King™ is the digital version of the classical royal game Pachisi. It was played as an indoor game in the courts of Indian Kings. Play the age-old board game with great design and features!

Ludo King™ follows the same rules as the traditional Ludo game. The dice numbers and strategy have equal importance and winning depends upon smart moves of the tokens you make while moving towards home. Save your tokens from getting captured and race ahead of all opponents to become the Ludo King!

Ludo Around the World

Ludo has different names in different regions and countries like Fia, Fia-spel (Fia the game), Le Jeu de Dada (The Game of Dada), Non t'arrabbiare, Fia med knuff (Fia with push), Cờ cá ngựa, Uckers, Griniaris, Petits Chevaux (Little Horses), Ki nevet a végén, برسي (Barjis/Barjees). People also misspell Ludo as Loodo, Chakka, Lido, Lado, Ledo, Leedo, Laado, or Lodo.

Similar Games

Visit our board games section to play more online board games.

You’ll find more family favorites like Word Search and 2048.

Features

Play with the Computer bot in computer mode
Enjoy preset chat while playing online

Ludo King is the perfect time-pass game to unwind!

Tower Swap is a clever puzzle game combining match-3 mechanics with addictive tower defense gameplay. Stop the dragons from reaching your castle by building your defenses through tactical tile-matching decisions.

How to Play
Build your defenses

Match 3 pieces of the same resource to upgrade them to a weapon or defense piece. When you have 3 of the same weapon or wall beside each other, you can merge them to create more powerful units. However, merging also means less coverage over the map, so sometimes you should delay the decision to merge.

Protect your castle

You have a limited number of swaps available before the dragons attack, so you have to use them wisely. Position your defenses so you can weather the attack! Before the boss round the game will show an arrow indicating the area where the drag will appear. Day 10 and day 20 are the first boss dragon levels, so you need to be prepared. Once you kill a boss, they release a large number of smaller dragons.

Combine resources

Combine 3 of these resources to build the following defenses:

Stone - creates a defensive attack tower
Gunpowder - builds a cannon
Ice - creates an ice wall
Logs - creates an attack turret
Gold - forms a chest containing swaps and sometimes other items like TNT and anvils to immediately upgrade resources.

All of the created defenses above can then be merged again to build an even more powerful unit.

Sign up and join a clan

It's worth signing up for an account in Tower Swap! It is a simple process and will allow you to build a custom avatar using extensive options, join a clan to compete, earn gold, and unlock chests with rewards. At the end of each game you'll receive gold coins that you can use to buy lives and open chests early.

More Games Like This

Tower Swap is a unique game that combines elements from match-3 games and tower defense games. One of the most popular tower defense games is Tower Defense Clash. As for merge games, Farm Merge Valley is hard to beat!

Castle Craft is a mystical adventure puzzle game where you merge resources while looking for Fiona's missing husband, Michael, all the while uncovering plenty of mysteries along the way. Begin in a fog-covered land, using ancient keys to explore hidden realms and trace the path of your lost family through different eras. Discover mysterious lands and piece together an enchanting legacy.

How to Play Castle Craft

Step into the wonderous world of Castle Craft, where you play as farmer Fiona, determined on her heartfelt mission to reunite with her husband after a mysterious separation. Your adventure begins in a simple garden, where you combine garden beds and plants to breathe new life into the land—this is the merge element of the game. As you cultivate your wheat fields, you will harvest crops to trade for mystical keys that dispel the fog, revealing hidden territories and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

As Fiona restores the land, her journey takes her toward new clues about her husband Michael’s whereabouts, such as his misplaced headphones, and she encounters friendly helpers along the way. Among them is Aiden, a kind woodsman who helps her clear obstacles like a stubborn tree stump. Together, Fiona and Aiden gather timber and merge logs to create essential tools and craft materials, unlocking treasure chests filled with valuable rewards to continue on her quest.

Every decision you make shapes Fiona’s path, allowing her to rebuild and expand her world. What begins as a small garden evolves into a thriving medieval kingdom, complete with bustling marketplaces and grand castles. As you progress, the adventure deepens, introducing new lands teeming with hidden treasures, mysterious puzzles, and historical figures who assist in unraveling the mysteries of time and family.

To embark on this journey, start by merging three wheat sprouts to cultivate a full wheat crop, then continue merging similar items to develop the garden further. Harvest the wheat to trade for keys that unlock new areas, dispelling the fog and revealing untapped potential. Treasure chests, once opened, offer unique items and heroes to aid Fiona in reclaiming and revitalizing the land. Each merge brings you closer to tracing your family’s footsteps through history and unraveling the secrets of the past.

Mr. Mine is an addictive idle mining clicker arcade game that puts you in charge of building a mining empire from the ground up! Start by drilling deep into the Earth’s crust, extracting valuable minerals and hidden treasures.

With each click, you’ll uncover riches that can be sold to fund the expansion and upgrading of your mining operations. As your business grows, you’ll be able to unlock new technologies and hire workers to dig even deeper, inching ever closer to the Earth’s core.

How to Play Mister Mine

The goal of the game is to mine for resources. The deeper you go, the greater the rewards. Mine deeper underground to obtain more resources and minerals to sell. You'll also encounter treasure chests the further you dig. These chests contain random rewards from small to vast amounts of money and resources.

Unlike your typical idle game, Mister Mine requires active participation from players. This is evident in two ways: miners must find stones or minerals that require clicking, and players will encounter Bosses in the mines' depths that need to be fought back. You also need to monitor closely the percentage of capacity you reach. Once it’s at 100% your miners will stop working, so you’ll need to either sell all or some of your resources or use them to build or upgrade your tools.

Your miners will be digging through 3 different worlds:

Earth, up to 1032 km of depth
Moon, from 1032 to 1132 km of depth
Titan, after 1132 km of depth.
Complete quests

There are 112 different quests to complete, each of which will give you a different reward, enabling you to improve your business further.

Upgrade your gear

You start the game with a humble shovel for digging. As you earn enough currency, you can upgrade your digging methods, progressing from a shovel to a jackhammer, and then to a drill, and finally to a nuclear excavator. Beyond that point, upgrades get supernatural, replacing workers with aliens and demons!

Hidden gems

Dig until km 50 to encounter the Golem (talking to it is one of the quests!) and reach km 400 to meet the first of six Earth bosses.

More Games Like This

Browse our clicker games for many more addictive idle and clicker titles.

Other popular games include Idle Breakout and Little Alchemy.

Developer

Playsaurus developed Mr. Mine.

Steam

You can get tickets from the following places:

How can I get building materials in Mr. Mine?

The main source for building materials is caves. You can get up to 10x BM per treasure, and there are multiple BM treasure spots per cave. You will also find building materials in chests and excavations.

Clicker Heroes is an original idle clicker game. Go on an epic adventure and slay monsters, upgrade heroes with the gold you collect, find treasures, and kill bosses. Clicker Heroes is a game that helped propel clicker games into the mainstream alongside other classics like Idle Breakout.

How to Play
Click to kill

Embark on a quest to become a powerful warrior. Strike down each beast you see by clicking them repeatedly, then reap the gold rewards left behind. Every click you make has a single damage value that you can continuously upgrade for more power.

Hire heroes to help

Hire different heroes to help you take down monsters faster. Every hero has their own DPS and a set of upgrades that are sometimes unique. Often the hero upgrades allow further significant increases to their DPS. Heroes allow you to kill enemy mobs and take gold without lifting a finger.

The heroes get progressively more expensive, but you get what you pay for in strength and powerful upgrades. The further you get, the more heroes emerge, becoming your next big purchase that allows you to move further into more lucrative lands.

Explore new lands and beat bosses

Each region has new and exciting monsters to fight. Start at the forest and progress into drylands and other locations. At the end of each region, there is a difficult boss fight - the boss has extra health and takes all your might to vanquish! If you fail to beat the boss, you’ll bounce back to the previous stage where you can build your skills further before entering the fight again.

Developer

Clicker Heroes is developed by Playsaurus.

July 2014. The web version can be played exclusively on CrazyGames!

Battle Arena is a thrilling RPG adventure battle game that seamlessly blends heart-pounding action with strategic gameplay. Create your team from over 50 unique heroes, each inspired by iconic characters you know and love. Dive into intense real-time PvP battles where your skills and tactics are put to the ultimate test. Join forces with fellow guild players to take on epic quests across breathtaking locations, from ancient ruins to mystical landscapes. As you progress, you can upgrade your heroes and gear, enhancing their abilities and unlocking new powers.

How to Play Battle Arena

In a world overrun by demons, you must choose a region at a time to combat your opponent. Battle Arena fights start off in Serenity Valley, where you can assess your enemy's squad in just a tap. You get to select your heroes for battle. You begin with only three heroes to play with, each with a different weapon and skill. But the amount of heroes you can eventually upgrade to is countless.

Early in the game, you will fight Dark Lord, who is less than happy to see you. To win the initial battle and every one afterward, you must use your hero's unique skills—some wield swords while others shoot arrows. Just tap on their avatars at the bottom of the screen to strengthen your attacks.

In Battle Arena, your objective is pretty much to build and upgrade your heroes and compete in various challenges, particularly in the arena. The gameplay revolves around gathering resources and gaining experience points to level up. Players can participate in raids to acquire new heroes and enhance their existing ones. The key to success in this game is to strategize by selecting the right battle heroes to maximize team effectiveness.

As you engage in battles, you must use different abilities and relics, which provide unique advantages during combat. Upgrading heroes is crucial to improve your performance in battles.

Always pay attention to your heroes' health and manage resources wisely, especially during expeditions and arena fights. Using a mix of heroes with complementary skills can lead to successful team combinations and help defeat stronger opponents.

Ultimately, the goal is to push through the ranks in the arena by strategizing hero placements and leveraging their abilities effectively. You can earn significant rewards as you progress, which can be reinvested into your hero roster.

More Games Like This

Explore a wide array of adventure games at your fingertips! Check out some popular titles like Firestone Idle RPG, an MMO where you battle against hordes of Undead and Orc enemies; Warlord Fantasy RPG, a fantasy adventure that offers an immersive online experience; Immortal Taoists, where players embark on a quest for immortality; and Magic World, where fierce battles with mythical creatures and epic clan wars will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Prison Escape is an adventure puzzle escape game where you are a brave prisoner on a mission towards freedom. You’ll have to solve tricky puzzles and face unpredictable mini-games throughout your escape attempt to get to freedom. Outsmart the odds and the guards, and you will be well on your way out of prison.

How to Play Prison Escape

You are stuck in a prison, the last place you want to be. Your goal is to plan and carry out a successful escape without being caught by the guards.

You start with a key, but it is not for your cell. The key you need to get out is in the next cell, and the only way in is through the toilet pathway. To enter, you must quietly unscrew the toilet bolts. Be careful because if you make too much noise, the guards will hear you. A “caught meter” shows how loud you are.

Look under the bench to find a fork. Move the bench quietly, then use the fork as a screwdriver to remove the toilet bolts. Once the toilet is loose, move it aside and crawl through the vent into the next cell. In the next cell is Rhino, a tough inmate who will call the guards if he spots you. You must convince him not to by beating him in an arm wrestling match. Give it your all because your life depends on it.

Escaping requires moving through multiple rooms, each with its own challenges. Some cellmates are not friendly, but their brute strength can be useful. Some can even break down walls, which could help you find a way out.

Gather useful tools like forks, keys, and lockpicks to aid in your escape plan. If you get stuck, do not hesitate to use hints, especially for tricky lockpicking. Always stay hidden when guards are near. If guards spot you, quickly find places to hide, including other prison cells, to avoid capture.

Your ultimate goal is to reach the safe. Inside is a gun, which can level the playing field against the guards. Find a silencer, too, or one loud shot will immediately trigger alarms. Guards are not your only obstacle. Make it far enough, and you will face a dangerous series of alligators blocking your path. How far can you get? Can you escape prison alive?

More Games Like This

Puzzle games can be quite thrilling, which is why we have a whole collection dedicated to them, all online and free to play! Try a popular 2048 to satiate your need for speed, or Word Search, a fun word game that will have you scratching your head and questioning your vocabulary.

In this episode, your name is Tom, and you meet your friend Harry, who plans to keep you and the other kids from your neighborhood safe from the Kidnapper while you're waiting for your parents to return.

The story begins with your parents leaving you at home. Your mom leaves you a note, asking to collect eggs from the hen-house and bring them to Tom. While cycling to your meeting point, you’ll encounter the famous Kidnapper…

You'll have to find Tom and, together with him, you will fortify the tree house so the spooky Kidnapper can't get you again. On the way to your goal, puzzles, moments of fear, screams, unexpected twists and turns, and lots of fun await you!

You will experience some jump scares in this story set in rural United States during the ‘90s, but Horror Tale is rated PEGI 12, so it’s very moderate and not as violent as other titles of the same genre.

8-Ball Billiards is a free online pool game in our sports category, ideal for one or two players. You can play solo against AI or challenge other players in two-player mode. The game is easy for anyone to play, so pick up a cue and line up your first shot.

How to Play 8 Ball Billiards Classic

8 Ball Billiards Classic is much like the classic in-person game: your goal is to pocket all your balls (either solids or stripes) and sink the 8-ball to win. Use your mouse to aim the cue stick and adjust the power of your shot. Click and drag the cue stick back to set your shot’s power, then release it to strike the cue ball. This is a 2-player game, so carefully plan each shot to outmaneuver your opponent and clear the table before they do!

You can use the settings to choose the ability of your AI-controlled opponents and, if you are good at it, you can also remove the visual help that allows you to understand the trajectory of your shots.

Pick a ball

8-Ball Billiards is an intuitive billiards game where you must pot all the striped or spotted balls, depending on the color assigned to you. The balls you’re assigned depend on what ball is potted first, so shoot for the win!

Line up your cue

The controls are easy. Simply click and drag to find the right level of force, then line up the angle with the ball that seems easiest to pot next. Remember that this is pool, so save the 8-ball until you have potted all your balls, otherwise, you will lose!

Features
Easy and intuitive controls
Play against the computer or a friend
Keep track of your stats
Smooth graphics and animations

8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer is a competitive sports pool game that lets you test your skills in exhilarating 2-player matches against friends or go head-to-head with players from around the world. Perfect your game by competing against expert bots to sharpen your strategies and techniques. Whether you’re aiming to outwit a friend or conquer global rivals, every shot counts in your quest to become the ultimate billiards champion.

How to Play 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer

8 Ball Pool Billiards is just like your classic pool game, where your objective is to pot your balls into the pockets. This game adds a fun twist in that you can play with random players from all around the world, helping you enhance your game to a pro-level with continued practice.

The game begins with a break shot where you hit the cue ball to scatter the other balls. Your objective is to pot the balls into pockets using the cue ball where possible. The first break will tell you whether you are stripes or solids, depending on what ball you get in the pocket first.

In each turn, aim to strike the cue ball to hit your target ball into a pocket. If successful, you continue your turn; otherwise, your opponent takes their turn. The key is to use strategic shots to position the cue ball for the next play and try to control the table by positioning balls to your advantage. The direction of where your ball will land is outlined from the stick to the ball with an arrow, giving you an indication of the target path.

The player who pots all their balls first wins the game.

Choose from numerous game rooms such as a private two-player game between you and your friend, a quick play game where you choose your level and play against the public quickly, or a local play where you may need to wait a bit to be matched with a live partner.

How to Play Table Tennis World Tour

Swing and shoot

You only need to drag your mouse to move the racket toward the ball. The way you swing the racket affects the ball’s direction. You can move the racket closer or further away to achieve a more controlled shot. Try to catch your opponent off guard with a good angled hit to build up the points.

The match is over when the first team reaches a score of 11. Keep the pressure on your opponent to get there before they do! Each tournament you play has six games against other players worldwide. You can move on to the next level when you obtain the trophy for the first country.

Soccer Legends 2021 is a sports soccer two-player game and the newest installment in the widely popular Soccer Legends series by MadPuffers, bringing the excitement of fast-paced soccer action to the next level. Packed with fresh updates, this game introduces a variety of new players and teams, each with their own unique skills and playing styles. Whether you’re a seasoned fan of the series or a newcomer, Soccer Legends 2021 offers a dynamic and entertaining experience that combines arcade-style gameplay with competitive strategy. Play solo against AI or challenge your friend to a 1-on-1 match!

How to Play Soccer Legends 2021

The objective is simple: get the ball into your opponent's net while defending your own, but with these high-powered skills at your disposal, each match becomes a thrilling test of strategy and timing. The combination of character abilities adds an exciting twist, making every game feel fresh and unpredictable.

Choose your game mode

Set up a game in tournament or friendly mode. You can play Soccer Legends solo or co-op with a friend. You can also set up the teams in a 1v1,2v2, 1v2, or 2v1 configuration.

Progress through the tournament

Choose your team and players from a diverse lineup of unique characters, each with their own distinct abilities. Every player comes equipped with one of two special powers—either a fireball kick that blazes across the field with unstoppable force or the ability to teleport, allowing you to quickly reposition and outmaneuver your opponents.

To win the tournament, you will need to keep winning and outplay your increasingly challenging opponents. Master the art of the superkick, which lets you launch the ball at blazing speeds toward your rival’s goal, often catching them off guard.

Basket Random is a chaotic 2-player arcade sports game with unpredictable physics. Bounce and battle for the ball across wild courts, with each dunk launching you to the next level!

How to Play Basket Random

Basket Random shares similar features with other games in the "Random" series: your characters defy the laws of physics and may react unexpectedly to your input. You can challenge the CPU or play with a friend.

This two-player basketball game shares the same concept as a typical basketball game: shoot the ball into the net, but with a few unusual and humorous twists. You can challenge the CPU or play with a friend.

There are two teams, each consisting of two players. Controls guide both your players, but be warned that their actions may not coincide with exactly how you expected them to move. Slam dunks are still very possible!

Use the W key to control player one and the up arrow to control player two. Fight frantically over the basketball, bouncing and spinning in the air, trying to make the shot. Whatever team scores first wins that round. The first team to reach 5 wins the game!

After each basket, you’re transported to a new place where the court and the surroundings have changed, and physics and attire may differ, shaking up each new round with random changes! In some cases, players will have longer arms, in others, the ball might be heavier, or baskets might be worth double points! Bobble around, shooting hoops and having fun in this wacky take on basketball.

Punchers is a 3D boxing sports action game with ragdoll physics. Use move keys to dodge enemy punches and hit back with random punch combinations. You can play against another player or AI.

How to Play Punchers

Punchers throws players into the boxing ring for an intense boxing match where technique is key. Use the WASD keys to maneuver your fighter and get ready to throw jabs, cross punches, and more. The game features both realistic real-time matches as well as slow-motion combat, allowing players to perfect their moves and time their punches with precision.

You’ll be scored on total punches, landed punches, power punches, and accuracy. While you can spam the keys, success depends on skill and precision rather than random attacks. Take advantage of slow-motion mode to practice your moves and learn the timing needed for effective jabs and cross punches.

Each punch has a recovery move, meaning you need to manage your timing carefully. Too many reckless attacks can leave you open for counter-punches. A stamina meter tracks your energy, helping you decide when to go on the offense or focus on defense to recover.

After each round, you’ll get feedback on your performance, including stats like your best punch and overall effectiveness. If you win, expect a fun celebration with cheers, but if you lose, brace yourself for a bit of frustration.

Tournament: Play a large collection of pre-made and user-made courses with 9 holes each. The fewer strikes you have at the end of the course the better.
Practice: Practice each level individually to improve your shooting and aiming skills. Completing the levels are easy but mastering them takes time.
Versus: Play turn-based matches for up to 4 players locally on the same device. Challenge your friends and family.
Splitscreen: Play on the same device with up to 4 players by dividing the available screen space.
Online multiplayer: Play against your friends in real-time globally.
Growing collection of courses
The game features hundreds interactive holes with dynamic parts and moving obstacles.
Levels contain a huge variety of ramps, turns, tunnels, slopes, jumps, sand traps, special boosters and portals.
Boosters like wind zones or jump areas physically accurately interact with your ball.
Features
Mini Golf Club has high replayability thanks to the advanced physics engine.
You can play the same level multiple times and you get a different gameplay experience each time.
The game supports touch, keyboard, mouse and controller inputs.

Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

How to Play Bloxd.io

Bloxd.io is a sandbox game in which you navigate challenging obstacle courses by timing your jumps and movements accurately. In survival mode, you gather resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to stay alive. There are several game modes to choose from to start the game, each with a variety of challenges.

Bloxd.io Game Modes

Choose from one of the many game modes to begin your Bloxd.io journey.

BloxdHop.io

In the BloxdHop game mode your mission is to reach the end of the map within the given timeframe. To reach the end, you must hop through the level parkour-style onto blocks of various sizes.

DoodleCube

This game mode is similar to drawing games like Gartic.io. Players create objects based on the theme presented, and other users vote on how representative they are of that object.

EvilTower

The mission is to reach the top of the Evil Tower! Similar to BloxdHop, you use your parkour skills to reach the end. EvilTower is inspired by Roblox’s Tower of Hell.

Peaceful

Peaceful mode is like creative mode in Minecraft. You can roam freely collecting resources and building here.

CubeWarfare

This game mode adds exciting battles. Compete against other players in a third-person shooter setting where you can also build blocks.

Full list of game modes.

EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

How to Play EvoWars.io

Embark on an epic quest across the digital battlefield, where you’ll collect powerful orbs to evolve your warrior into unstoppable forms. As you slash through enemies with swords, axes, and a brutal arsenal of weapons, each battle pushes you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. With more than 15 unique character models to unlock, your journey is one of constant evolution and power.

You control a constantly advancing warrior with your mouse, swinging your weapon to defeat enemies and collect XP to evolve into stronger forms with bigger weapons and greater attack range. As you play, you'll unlock more evolutions and customize your warrior with different weapons and gear to eliminate all other fighters on the field while growing stronger.

As you accumulate points, you will be able to upgrade gameplay dynamics. It will take some time to reach your desired destination. It's not the easiest game to master.

The key to this 2D top-down game is winning battles. Each victory allows you to grow stronger, but the battlefield isn’t just about brute strength; you’ll need to define your play style and use every opportunity to outmaneuver your enemies. Whether you’re charging headfirst into combat or taking a more tactical approach, dominance is at your fingertips.

There is a very large online community around EvoWars.io and when playing it you'll face opponents from every part of the world: it is particularly popular in Vietnam, where it is one of the most popular browser games.

Game modes in EwoWars.io
Deatmatch: Free For All, the classic Battle Royale mode where everyone is an enemy
Teams: you are part of one of the two teams, either red or blue, and your objective is to defend the team’s Guardian while defeating enemies and, ultimately, the enemy’s Guardian
Duel: a 1 vs 1 match with a random opponent. You and they both start at a random level. The first to win three duels wins the match
Monster Hunt: a cooperative mode where you and the other players face hordes of AI-controlled monsters
Classic: it’s the old version of EvoWars
Tips
Focus on collecting orbs around the outside of the map when you are at a low level rather than battling against other players.
Your weapon range improves as you grow larger, but you also become slower, so remember to remain cautious and alert.
When you're smaller, you can move faster; use this to your advantage and play more evasively at lower levels
Features
Intense slashing gameplay to eliminate opponents
You can level up to increase the size and evolve to more than 15 character models
Define your play style and use every opportunity as much as possible
Sprint ability at the cost of your experience points
More IO game action

If you like EvoWars, make sure to try our other smash hit .io games, such as Agar.io, and ZombsRoyale.io.

If you are up for something different, try Sprunki or Friday Night Funkin', instead.

Growden.io is an .io farming game where you manage a small plot of land, starting off with some carrot seeds and a vision for success! This community-based game is based on progressive management of your farm, so be sure to stay logged in to get the whole experience. Grow a garden from a humble carrot and tomato harvest to a gorgeous, rare plant paradise filled with blossoms, fruits, and exotic crops that showcase your farming mastery!

How to Play Growden.io

Growden is one of those games you start playing on a random evening and find yourself still playing two months later. Its rotating community rooms filled with players from all around the world, constant reward system, and continuous growth cycle make this game very hard to put down.

You start with basic $10 carrot seeds that disappear once you pick them. Then you move on to strawberry seeds for $50. Work your way up to something more uncommon, like blueberry seeds for $100, or rare seeds like tomato seeds for $800. (The rarer, the more expensive!)

How to plant seeds and harvest in Growden:
Buy seeds, then click on them in your inventory to put them in your hands.
Click on the brown plots in your farm to place them wherever you want them to grow.
Wait as your plant begins to grow. (Meet other farmers or shop as you wait!)
Once it’s fully grown, harvest by clicking E and enjoy the rewards!
Sell your plants at the shop when ready.

When you've mastered the basics of farming, you will soon find yourself itching to save for the ultimate seed (cue the music): the moon blossom, which costs tens of millions.

Everyone Wants the Moon Blossom

Before you get to the moon blossom, you’re likely going to encounter any one of these seeds: eggplant, bamboo, pepper, beanstalk, pumpkin, cacao, cauliflower, cactus, watermelon, dragonfruit, mango, coconut, nectarine, pear, avocado, banana, pinklily, pineapple, kiwi, candy blossom, cherry blossom, or sugar apple.

Slow and steady wins the farm race, but once you get a candy blossom or cherry blossom, you’re likely to reach a whole new level of farming where your earnings begin reaching six or seven figures.

The more money you have, the more you can deck out your garden. Buy eggs at the egg shop. Each garden is allowed five pets. Pets help you harvest—not too much, but considering the game allows them to harvest while idle or away, you could find yourself with interesting items in your backpack when you’re back from a break.

Only 100 items fit into your backpack, so after each harvest, be sure to go sell your goods. You can sell one thing, price your items, or sell your entire inventory. It’s always fun to price new, shiny, and one-of-a-kind fruits.

Mutated Plants

Mutations on your plants happen during weather events. Mutated plants are worth more. The types of direct mutations are: Silver, Golden, Rainbow, and BIG mutations (which make your plants HUGE; this is a very rare mutation).

There are currently 5 weather events, with more coming soon: Daytime, Nighttime, Desert, Rain, and Frosty. Grow a Garden is receiving continuous updates, which will unlock new weather events, mutations, seeds, plants, and more.

Gifts in Growden

This is a community-based game. The community is very active and includes a Discord channel. Where there is community, there is sharing. Depending on what room you are in, you can find some very generous players who gift you expensive flowers or fruits.

On the downside, there is also stealing, but this is a bit less common than kindness in these gardens. There is a chat, and if a farmer steals, you will get a notification and can call them out. Usually, a public note will deter further stealing.

Essential Tips to Grow a Garden in Growden.io
Stay logged in so you can keep your progress. If you log out and refresh your browser, you're likely going to lose your garden.
If you ever feel uncomfortable in a room, refresh your page, and it will get you to a new room.
Stay anonymous in the chat and don't give out any personal info.
More Games Like This

If you like Growden, you may want to check out our .io selection of games with classics like Agario, or go for similar graphics in Bloxd.io, or try something different like Skribbl.io.

Controls
WASD and arrow keys = move
Space = jump
E = pick up plants or talk to the seed shop/sell area
Hold the right mouse button = move the camera
FAQ
Is Grow a Garden on CrazyGames?

Growden: Grow a Garden is on CrazyGames and can be played for free on desktop or mobile.

Is Grow a Garden free to play?

Yes, Grow a Garden: Growden is free to play, depending on where you play it. CrazyGames features Grow a Garden: Growden for free.

Why is Grow a Garden so addictive?

There are several reasons it's hard to put Grow a Garden down. There is a very generous reward system that incentivizes players to keep coming back, and the community in the rooms is constantly rotating, which makes each room a completely new social adventure.

Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

How to Play Smash Karts
Battle and earn XP

Face off with other players in the arena for 3 minutes of kart-smashing mayhem. The game features several maps to explore, and it is continually updated with new ones. Each public match you play will give you XP, which you can then use to level up. 

Leveling up will reward you with coins, hats, wheels, and character tokens. You can use character tokens in the prize machine to unlock new characters with varying rarity levels.

Pick up weapons

Drive over the boxes containing question marks to pick up random weapons and power-ups. You’ll find anything from invincibility to missiles, machine guns, and mines to use against your opponents. Get in your kart and cause some chaos!

Available Weapons

Rockets: fairly straightforward, helpful for hitting opponents in front of you.
Machine Gun: it rapidly fires several projectiles and can take down enemies around you, as long as you are close by.
Bullets: with these, you’ll fire a series of bullets that will go straight from your position. It can be useful to fire at enemies in crowded contexts or on long, straight alleys.
Mines: you can deploy three mines that serve as a static trap for your challengers. Mines are particularly effective when placed around corners or hidden behind item boxes.
Cannonballs: using this will send four cannonballs in the direction of your choice. Cannonballs require precision to be effective, but can eliminate multiple adversaries simultaneously.
Spiky-Go-Round: activating the spiky-go-round will add rotating balls with spikes to your vehicle, which will make any contact with opponents lethal for them.
Nuke: a very powerful missile that has a wide impact radius.
Lobgrenuke: with a lobgrenuke you are placing a TNT-like static bomb on the ground. It gets activated when one of your enemies passes nearby or a few seconds after deployment.
Snowball Blaster: fires ice at opponents and blocks them for 3 seconds in a block of ice. Touching this block while active will eliminate the kart containing it.
Invincibility: the most powerful of all weapons, allows you to neutralize any shot aimed at you and, at the same time, to take down any kart by simply touching it.
Customize your kart!

Choose between a selection of wacky little characters and karts. You can customize your kart and characters in the customize menu. There, you’ll find a selection of karts, characters, hats, and holiday items! Use your coins, character tokens, and gems to buy various in-game items.

Play in events

Various seasonal events occur throughout the year, so make sure to come back and play Smash Karts at special times of year for new content. New maps are available around Halloween, Christmas, and other festive occasions, and you can reap unique rewards.

More Games Like This

Kart games like SmashKarts.io combine two awesome game modes: deathmatch arena and kart driving.

Agar.io is another popular game that challenges players to compete against online opponents in multiplayer mode. For easier driving options, you can try playing Eggy Car or Snow Rider.

Action-packed multiplayer kart battles
Level up, earn coins, and save your stats
Several weapons, from miniguns to bombs!
Customizable karts and characters

FrontWars.io is a multiplayer .io battle game where players battle it out to dominate as much of the globe as possible. You begin small and slowly work your way to conquer the world. Take control of 72% of the map, and victory is yours.

How to Play Front Wars

Front Wars is a real-time strategy game where you go to war with other players in an attempt to expand your territory and protect your people. The game panels are pretty intricate and give you a lot of info to keep track of attacks and alliances. Use these wisely to plan your next moves.

The Event Panel shows everything happening in the game. You’ll see alliance requests, incoming attacks, and Quick Chat messages. You can focus on a player sending an alliance request, track incoming attacks, and retreat troops if needed, though this costs 25 percent of your attacking troops. Boats can return to their starting point if the land has changed hands, but nukes cannot be recalled. Quick Chat makes it easy to send preset messages or emojis to allies and opponents.

Alliances are important. You can send or receive troops and gold to help your allies, whether they are under attack or building up their strength. Betraying an ally ends the alliance, pauses trade for a few minutes, and leaves you with weaker defenses. You’ll also be marked as a traitor for 30 seconds, so think carefully before making a move. Bots and human players react differently depending on your actions, so diplomacy matters.

The Radial Menu is your main control hub. Right-click a location to build, attack, send boats, request alliances, or betray an ally. The Options Panel lets you pause or unpause the game, check the timer, access settings, and see detailed information about other players. Hover over a country to see if it’s a human, a smart AI, or a bot, and find out how they feel about you.

The Game UI helps you track your progress. The leaderboard shows top players by land, troops, and gold, while the control panel lets you adjust your attack ratios. Icons tell you who is an ally, a traitor, or has stopped trading, which helps with planning your next move.

Buildings and Units in Front Wars
City: Increases population and lets you expand your territory
Defense Post: Protects borders, slows enemy attacks, and increases enemy losses
Port: Lets you build Warships and trade with other ports, either automatically or manually
Warship: Patrols water, intercepts enemy trade ships, and attacks enemy vessels
Missile Silo: Launches atomic, hydrogen, or MIRV bombs
SAM Launcher: Intercepts enemy missiles with different success depending on the type of bomb

Bombs have different effects. Atom Bombs cause localized destruction, Hydrogen Bombs hit larger areas, and MIRVs split to hit multiple points, affecting only the player you targeted.

Interacting with other players is simple:

Chat messages and emojis let you communicate quickly
Target markers help coordinate attacks with allies
Alliance requests grow your network of support

Tips

Always try to help allies with troops or gold to strengthen relationships. Focusing on building relationships in Front Wars is key to winning.

More Games Like This

Check out our .io category for more battle games like this one. Try 1v1 LOL, Diep.io, or Smash Karts, and continue the fun!

Controls
Space = alternate view (terrain/countries)

Cmd + Left Mouse Button = open build menu

C = Center camera on player
Q / E = Zoom in/out
WASD = move camera
1 / 2 = decrease/increase attack ratio
Shift + Mouse Wheel Up/Down = decrease/increase attack ratio
\ + R = reset graphics
Middle Mouse Button → Auto-upgrade nearest building

Military games sure do exist. Front Wars is a classic battle io game, ideal for strategy seekers.

Front Wars is available on mobile, as well as desktop and Steam.

Shell Shockers (Shellshock.io) is a multiplayer .io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns. You control one of these weapon-wielding eggs in one of four online game modes where the aim is to shatter your opponents with bullets and bombs. It's the ultimate online egg shooting game!

Kids love games where they shoot other players. Whatever you think about guns this seems to always be the case. We let our children play Shell Shockers before the older rating games with guns because it's a less violent way to have fun online. In fact, they enjoyed it so much that even though they are older they still go back to play this again and again.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase.

How to Play Shell Shockers

Jump into the game and select your character name, customize your egg,  and choose one of four game modes. In this game, you must work hard to protect yourself and dish out damage to opposing eggs. Try out each game mode and see if you can conquer the Shell Shockers arena. 

Tips and tricks
Play tactically
Act quickly
Collect egg ammunition
Think like an egg
Game modes
Teams

Join a team (either red or blue) and fight against the enemy eggs until your team has the most kills collectively.

Free For All

Every egg for themselves. If you see an egg, you shoot. Unless you want to be scrambled yourself. There is only one winner in this mode.

Captula the Spatula

Two teams battle for control of the spatula. The team with the spatula earns points for kills, but these can be lost if the player holding the spatula dies.

King of the Coop

King of the Coop was added in December 2021 with a host of cosmetic items and a new map. Two teams battle to capture a defined area known as the coop. The players on the winning team get 250 golden eggs each!

Weapons

There are seven main weapon types in Shell Shockers. Each weapon has its advantages and drawbacks. If you have eggcellent aim, a weapon like the Crackshot would be great. If you’re more of a spray-and-pray type, try out the Whipper. The complete weapon list for Shell Shockers is:

EggK-47 - classic medium-range automatic
Scrambler - high-damage shotgun
Free Ranger - semi-automatic sniper rifle
RPEGG - huge damage RPG
Whipper - close to medium range rapid-fire rifle
Crackshot - bolt-action sniper rifle
TriHard - accurate medium-range burst-fire rifle

Additionally, each player has an additional gun and can pick up grenades from the map.

Currency

The game uses Golden Eggs as currency; you can use them to upgrade the way your character appears in the game or the weapons it uses. Mind you, using the Golden Eggs in the shop won’t allow you to buy items that give you an advantage during combat.

More Games Like This

For more online shooting games, check out our multiplayer io games and browse the selection, which includes the highly popular Agar io.

If you are looking for something totally different, consider trying Bubble Shooter or 2048.

Various weapons and game modes 
Egg customization and a shop for more items

Taming.io is a survival-based .io game where magical pets aid you in combat. Gather resources, build your base, and evolve through upgrades while battling rivals and their creatures.

How to Play Taming.io
Craft and Upgrade

In the beginning, it’s just you and your pet. You can choose to spawn besides a wolf, a rabbit or a bear. You should quickly start harvesting resources to defend yourself, attack others and generate additional future resources.

You can collect four different types of goods:

Wood
Stone
Food
Gold

Wood and Stone are essential to create tools and weapons, but also to build your base and the defensive structures supporting it.

Food is useful to heal and to recover stamina, while gold is used to buy equipment, but it also contributes to your score.

As you start your harvest, you begin aging and each time you age, you’ll receive a selection of rewards that boost your capabilities as a survivor. These rewards can be anything from food items to recovery health, tools, and weapons.

Waste no time getting started. Start building your fortress and fortify it with walls and turrets. One of the most important buildings to unlock for your base is the windmill. This structure generates gold for you automatically.

Tame Pets

The unique angle of Taming is the pet battles. You can choose from a selection of pets at the start, but you can also tame up to two additional wild animals. The primary method for discovering new beasts to tame is to locate wild baby animals on the map; these are often found sleeping. There is no guarantee that the animal you are approaching will be happy to be tamed, but you can increase your chances of success by using items like apples and stones, which give you a 1% boost to tame certain animals.

You can also equip yourself with special gear, like the Tamer’s Cap and the Luck Hat, as well as a dedicated tool that shoots apples, aptly named the Appletor, to have more opportunities to tame animals.

Any animal has a magical type, and there are four different types of magic in Taming.io:

Fire
Water
Plant
Electric

Try to build a squad of pets with complementary magic types to increase your chances of success in this game.

Build a Team

Since Taming is a multiplayer .io game, you share the world with numerous other gamers. It’s a good idea to get in touch with some of them to form a team. Doing it alone will be more challenging as you face other teams and higher-level players who will dominate you.

More Games Like This

Taming.io is similar to other multiplayer io games, such as Agar io.

A different approach to playing with animal-like creatures is found in Sprunki, where you use them to create music. Another musical game on CrazyGames, although unrelated to the world of animals, is Friday Night Funkin’.

Features
Fight magical battles with other players
Tame wild animals to fight for you
Collect various resources 
Build and fortify your base
Unlock more rewards as you age

Poxel.io is a, io fast-paced first-person shooter that throws you into intense pixelated battles across diverse maps. Choose from a wide arsenal of weapons, master different game modes, and outplay your rivals to claim the top spot. Every match is a test of skill and strategy: do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

How to Play Poxel.io

Invite your friends to play with you by hosting a game with them and playing in real-time together. Play the game more to continue progressing and advancing your levels so you can earn PX coins and buy skins, characters, hats, back items, and more! Keep playing the game, and you can eventually reach the top of the leaderboard, so you can show the world that you are #1 in Poxel.io

Poxel.io is fast-paced multiplayer chaos where sharp reflexes and smart movement are your keys to survival. You’ll need eyes in the back of your head to stay alive and to climb your way to the top of the leaderboard.

You’re dropped into a maze-like battleground armed and ready. Your goal? Take down enemies while dodging incoming fire. But don’t just shoot anything that moves, some players are your teammates. They’ll be clearly labeled, so watch your fire. What goes around definitely comes around.

You can host private games and invite friends to battle in real time. The more you play, the more you progress, the more you earn PX coins and gems, which you can use to unlock cool content.

Poxel.io Tips

Stick to the walls: Keep your back covered to avoid sneak attacks.

Take the high ground: Rooftops offer a better view and sniping opportunities.

Stay alert: Enemies can come from any direction, so keep moving and scanning your surroundings.

Unlock & Upgrade

🌍 Explore over 30 unique maps

🔫 Battle with 20+ weapons, including AK-47s, rocket launchers, snipers, crossbows, grenades, and even knives

🎯 Complete missions to earn PX and Gems

🧢 Unlock 1,500+ skins, characters, hats, back items, and more!

Play often. Play smart. Play with friends. Reach the top and prove you're the best in Poxel.io.

Game Modes
FFA: Free for All, everyone is your enemy.
TDM: Team Deathmatch, in which two teams fight for the highest score.
KC: Kill Confirmed, Collect dog tags from the dead, and reach a certain amount to win the game.
Domination: A team-based mode where you battle to capture the designated points

What does io stand for in games?

In games, ".io" originally comes from the .io domain extension, which is the domain for the British Indian Ocean Territory. However, it became popular for web-based multiplayer games after the success of Agar.io in 2015.

Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!

How to Play Doodle Road

You start in Doodle Road by practicing drawing a straight line from the car to the target. Sounds simple, right? Wait until you see how straight your line really is! The true challenge is how easy it is for your car actually to drive across that path.

Next challenge – draw a line to the target, but now there's a wall in your way. Remember, your car can’t fly! So, think about how to draw your path – you don’t have to go over the wall; you can go under it! As you go, you'll see that drawing a straight line is harder than it looks. If you don’t start the line from behind your car, it’ll just dangle off into oblivion.

How do you get over an L-shape? Or a huge gap in the ground? And the challenges keep coming. By level 5, your engine shuts off, so you’ll need your physics brain to figure out how to use hills and momentum to get across.

Some levels have trampoline-like springs that’ll launch you toward your target. The challenges change each time, keeping you on your toes. Buckle up because it's going to be a bumpy ride, depending on how well you draw!

Obby World: Squid Escape is a casual parkour game where you jump your way through a whirlwind of obstacles and surprising challenges. Anything is possible in the variety of games offered. You will find yourself leaping across deadly gaps, racing through winding tracks on a speedy bike, and making daring escapes from high-security prisons. Each mode offers new thrills, so get ready to test your reflexes.

How to Play Obby World: Squid Escape

Obby World: Squid Escape throws is a mix of parkour challenges, with each game different from the last. Each game tests your timing, balance, and quick thinking. The game begins by letting you choose from a set of different obstacle-based modes, each with its own style and surprises.

You’ll face multiple rounds of challenges, such as:

Red Light, Green Light: The classic stop-and-go test. Run when the light is green, freeze when it’s red. Move at the wrong time, and you’re out.

Carousel Round: Follow the instructions: “run into a room,” “get into groups of two or three,” or “go solo.” It sounds simple, but without a way to communicate with other players, teamwork becomes tricky and tense.

Skywalk Courses: Balance across oversized objects floating in the sky—giant coffee cups, donuts, chocolate bars, and more. One misstep and you’ll tumble straight down, ending your round.

Other modes keep the action fresh, from racing down twisting bike tracks to sneaking through prison breakouts. Each one pushes you to react quickly and stay sharp under pressure.

The controls are simple, but the levels demand precision. One moment you’re leaping across glowing rainbow platforms, the next you’re dodging traps or trying to outsmart guards. Success depends on timing, agility, and a little creativity in how you approach obstacles.

With colorful environments, unpredictable twists, and nonstop movement, Obby World: Squid Escape is built for players who want parkour challenges that keep them on their toes.

Choose your mode. In Rainbow Mode, you’ll dash across glowing platforms in a lively, colorful world. Bicycle Mode shifts the challenge to two wheels, where speed, stunts, and sharp maneuvers keep the race intense. Prison Escape raises the stakes with traps to dodge, guards to evade, and clever moves needed to break free. Each mode has its own style of thrill, and requires quick reflexes and sharp timing. Between games, you can personalize your character with outfits and accessories, giving your hero a distinct look.

More Games Like This

If you like the wild antics of this game, you may like games like Eggy Car, where you have to navigate an egg in a car through obstacles, ensuring it doesn't crack! Other games in our casual collection worth a try include Snow Rider 3D and Sprunki.

The only way to avoid the gaps in Obby World: Squid Escape is with precision and jumping just at the right time.

EvoWorld.io is the multiplayer survival game previously known as FlyOrDie.io. You start as a small fly and level up as you eat more food. As you evolve, other players become part of your diet.

Each level comes with a new special ability and more things to eat. The choice is simple, you Fly or Die!

How to Play EvoWorld.io

Eat items and animals outlined in green, earn XP and progress on the evolution ladder. Avoid animals with a red outline, because they will eat you! You’ll be fighting for survival against hundreds of other players, so make sure you keep moving and keep eating. Keep an eye on your water level, as you’ll need plenty of water to survive.

There is just one playing mode: free-for-all.

Special Abilities

As you progress through the game, each animal will have its own unique and remarkable ability. You can use that special ability, and activate it by pressing the space bar or the S key, to get through the game quicker. When you start out as a fly, you’ll have “beginner’s luck”. This gives you a 50% chance to avoid a predator's attack. Use the special abilities to your advantage.

Game Levels

There are 45 different animals and eight stages of evolution in EvoWorld.io. You start as a simple fly, and fight your way up through the animal kingdom.

Once you’ve played through the ordinary and real animals, there are demons, mythical beasts, cosmic entities, and the undead. The grim reaper sits right at the top of the food chain with his scythe, which he uses to take down prey.

Biomes

There are multiple biomes in EvoWorld.io. Each one has an entirely different landscape. You’ll find different prey in each location, so don’t be afraid to explore the map and see what’s out there.

About the Developer

EvoWorld was made by Pixel Voices, an .io games developer.

Tips
Don’t stay in one place for too long
Use the special abilities to your advantage
Hide in the clouds or inside bushes to avoid being eaten
Drink plenty of water
Eat as much prey as you can!

Stick Epic Fighter is an action-packed, arcade physics-based fighting game where you are in control of a stick fighter to battle enemies in a dynamic, geometric world. Your mission is to evolve your character into an unstoppable force by unlocking powerful upgrades, mastering epic combos, and unleashing devastating fatalities that will destroy your foes. Conquer waves of enemies with precision and skill as you dominate each battle. Only after crushing every opponent will you unlock the portal to the next level, where even more significant challenges await. Sharpen your reflexes, perfect your strategies, and prove you have what it takes.

How to Play Stick Epic Fighter

You begin in a classic arcade-style side-scrolling screen, where you’ll quickly get accustomed to the game’s controls. Use the up arrow to jump, the down arrow to attack, and the left and right arrows for movement. Before long, you’ll encounter enemies—attack them by holding the down arrow to unleash a series of sword strikes. Holding down the attack key continuously lets you deliver multiple hits, which is essential since enemies require several strikes to be defeated.

Though you can jump and sprint past enemies to reach the end of the level quickly, you won’t be able to progress to the next round until all foes are eliminated. If you leave any behind, you’ll have to backtrack and take them out. Once every enemy is defeated, and you reach the final portal, your stickman will celebrate with a happy dance, signaling that you’ve successfully cleared the level!

As you advance, the difficulty ramps up with more enemies and tougher challenges, so stay alert and fast on your feet! Use the arrows for guidance on enemy locations and areas you may have missed. Throughout the course, prompts will also direct you to jump to high platforms or descend into lower areas.

Each round rewards you with points that can be used to purchase upgrades, boosting your power and making it easier to defeat stronger enemies. Plus, you can customize your stickman by changing skins, giving your hero a fresh look as you fight your way through each increasingly intense round!

More Games Like This

Keep the fun coming. Browse our action category for more games that pack a punch. If you liked Stick Epic Fighter, you might like House of Hazards, where you avoid traps and finish tasks faster than your friends; Getaway Shootout, a two-player game where you race three others to the finish line; or Cuphead, a boss battle where you control a warplane carrying Cuphead. Check out our arcade games for even more fun.

How to Play MX Offroad Master

Tackle the mountains

Ready, set, go! This fantastic downhill bike adventure features daring tracks high up in the hills and features retro PS1-era vibes. Tackle various terrains skilfully without crashing your bike. It's important to balance speed and control, so do use your brakes: any minor hit will result in having to restart from a checkpoint and, after three hits, you are out and must start from scratch.

Kit out your character

Crazy Motorcycle is a driving game where you guide a noob rider on a high-speed motorcycle to the finish line. Navigate through thrilling levels, jumping over gaps and dodging obstacles. Get ready for an adrenaline rush as you tackle exciting challenges on your way to victory!

How to Play Crazy Motorcycle

Crazy Motorcycle combines Minecraft graphics with classic 80s arcade gameplay. Your movements are limited to left, right, up, down, and jumping. Simple but all crucial to your survival on this obstacle-ridden bike course. You also have control over the sound being on or off. Ah, the good old days were when choice was more tangible. The lack of frills is no measure of fun in this thrilling bike race in the sky.

There are four available worlds to play in, with different terrains and obstacles in each of them. In every world, there are 16 stages to complete before getting to the end.

The object of the game is to reach the finish line while avoiding obstacles and collecting rewards to fatten your final score. You will mainly be going straight with the occasional moves to the right and left to avoid hitting obstacles or, worse, meeting your fate with the abyss below you by falling off the race track.

You can't get away with a straight run, and even on level one, you must maneuver to avoid falling to your demise.

The race course is also not entirely linear, and there are breaks in the course with nothing below you but chance. This is where your jumps will come into play. The wider the gap, the more speed and jump you will need to cross the divide.

If you see a series of swerving roads ahead with moving obstacles, slow down to retain your balance and avoid getting knocked off the road. The key to moving items is to move with them, even if you get close to the edge. Not all items can be jumped over.

Grab the red flags along the road; they represent checkpoints and allow you to restart from there should you fall, while yellow flags let you collect coins, which you can use to buy new voxelated skins in the menu.

Lastly, you can compete against other players by checking your score against theirs in the leaderboard, also available in the main menu.

Gear up, strap on your helmet, and prepare to perform stunts of a lifetime as you race against the clock.

How to Play Moto X3M

Sit back, hold on tight, and get ready for a thrilling bike ride (with pretty exciting music). Each level of Moto X3M ramps up the thrill with increasingly complex obstacles that require precision, skill, and, above all, patience. Don't get too distracted by the fun; every mistake comes at a price, and that price is time. And time is the key to nailing the coveted 3-star rating, where only the fastest, cleanest runs bring you victory.

Mastering each level means finding that sweet spot between speed, braking, and stunt work, all while dodging obstacles designed to slow you down.

Moto X3M offers 22 distinct tracks, each progressively challenging. While the early levels ease you, later tracks become obstacle-filled gauntlets of ramps, loops, and hazards. With each track’s unique layout, there’s plenty of replay value as you strive to beat your best time. The game can get pretty addictive.

As you conquer each course, you will earn stars and can use them to unlock two new bikes! It’s more than just a visual upgrade; new bikes give you added motivation to return to tracks and push for faster times and higher scores.

Moto X3M features vibrant 2D graphics, fluid physics-based animation, and a playful, slapstick tone. Crashes are humorous, with ragdoll physics and cartoon-style explosions keeping the action lighthearted. Each track has its own theme, from sunny beaches to underground caves, while energetic music and sound effects heighten the thrill of racing and performing stunts.

Push your speed to the max, but don't rush into unknown obstacles without caution. Every fall adds seconds, impacting your star rating. Aim to squeeze in as many air stunts as you can over big jumps to shave precious seconds off your final time!

Advanced Moves
Flips & Combos: Chain flips on long jumps to reduce your final time.
Back Wheel Boost: Landing on your rear wheel at the right angle gives a speed boost.
Timer Delay Trick: Wait for the perfect moment to start moving and effectively pause the timer.
Hidden Shortcuts: Some levels allow creative routes to bypass obstacles or save time.
Game Levels

Levels unlock sequentially, growing in difficulty from beginner-friendly ramps to extreme obstacles. Stars earned on each level unlock new bikes, adding visual variety and motivation to replay tracks. Checkpoints prevent frustration, letting you retry tricky sections without restarting the entire level.

Tips & Tricks

Keep your wheels on the ground for maximum speed when needed, but don’t hesitate to brake approaching tricky obstacles.

More Games Like This

There are many games in the Moto X3M series, like Basketball Legends and Basketball Stars. You can also browse our driving category and try popular titles where you drive fast in Snow Rider 3D. How fast can you go on ice? You can also test your driving precision in Eggy Car, where you are responsible for keeping an egg from falling out of your car, on the steepest of hills.

Features
22 levels with superb replay value
Various obstacles and challenges
Earn more stars for taking less time
Spend stars on new motorbikes
Developer

Developed by Ukraine-based MadPuffers (formerly FlashRush Games) in 2015, Moto X3M began as a Flash browser game and transitioned to HTML5 and mobile platforms. The “X3M” in the title is leetspeak for “Extreme,” reflecting the game’s daring stunts. Some levels hide Easter eggs, like secret vehicles or collectibles, rewarding curious players and adding replay value.

In addition to all the Moto X3M games, they have created smash hit basketball games like Basketball Legends and Basketball Stars.

There are six games in the Moto X3M series:

Moto X3M 6: Spooky Land
Moto X3M 5: Pool Party
Moto X3M 4: Winter
Moto X3M 3 (not available anymore)
Moto X3M 2 (not available anymore)
Moto X3M

FAQ
Is there a Moto X3M 4 game?

There are six Moto X3M games. Moto X3M 4: Winter is the fourth of the series.

How to play Moto X3M?

Press the up arrow to accelerate, use left and right to balance, down to brake, and perform stunts to gain time, but avoid crashing!

Who created Moto X3M?

MadPuffers created Moto X3M. They've also made many other games, such as Basketball Stars and Soccer Masters.

Can I play Moto X3M on my phone or tablet?
Yes, you can play this game on any device, including your phone and tablet!
Is Moto X3M a good game?

With average ratings above 4.5 in both the App Store and Google Play Store, Moto X3M is definitely a fan favorite.

How does one get 3 stars in Moto X3M?

Complete each track as fast as you can: the time needed to get 3 stars is different on each level. Backflips reduce the total time by 0.5 seconds, so do as many as you can

How many Moto X3M games are there?

The Moto X3M series includes six official games: Moto X3M (2015), Moto X3M 2 (2015), Moto X3M 3 (2016), Moto X3M Winter (2017), Moto X3M Pool Party (2019), and Moto X3M Spooky Land (2019) though Moto X3M 2 and 3 are no longer available online, while the other titles can still be played on various gaming platforms.

Offroad Island is the ultimate driving truck simulation game that puts you behind the wheel of powerful trucks, rugged trailers, agile quads, high-speed bikes, and much more. Get ready to explore three vast, open-world environments, each filled with challenging terrains, hidden paths, and stunning landscapes. Perform daring stunts, collect valuable coins, and tackle tough trials to earn major rewards as you push your skills to the limit. With every twist, turn, and jump, the adventure gets more intense. Buckle up!

How to Play Offroad Island

Your goal in Offroad Island is to explore the map, gather gold, and complete races. There are three expansive, open-world maps, each offering its own set of challenges and terrains. From the stunt-filled Woodlands to the muddy, dense forests of MuddyHill, every map is uniquely designed to push your off-road skills to the limit. Whether navigating rugged trails, conquering steep hills, or mastering tight corners, these environments will keep you on your toes.

The game boasts a stunning collection of vehicles, ranging from iconic Cherokees and rugged Hummers to classic hotrods. But that’s just the beginning! You can also purchase quads, SxS vehicles, crawlers, bikes, and even hook-up trailers for your ride. Explore the premium vehicle collection for a selection of custom motors to make your off-road adventure even more thrilling.

Once you’ve chosen your vehicle, the true fun begins with a wide range of customization options. Personalize every detail—from the body and paint job to rims and tires. To enhance performance, tweak everything from engine power to weight distribution, suspension, and gearbox settings. The in-depth tuning menu lets you fine-tune each component to create the perfect off-road machine suited to your driving style.

The graphics in Offroad Island are quite realistic, where every terrain comes to life. As you drive, your vehicle’s wheels tear into the dirt, splashing mud and leaving behind a trail of debris that coats your ride. The suspension reacts dynamically to the ever-changing ground beneath you, providing a truly immersive experience. Whether you're conquering rocky hills or drifting through muddy swamps, the varied terrain ensures every ride feels authentic and challenging.

More Games Like This

Once your Offroad Island journey comes to an end, you can check out some more of our free roaming driving games or car games. Two other popular choices are Drift Hunters, a 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks, and Smash Karts, where you race, collect weapons, and blast rivals to unlock characters and rewards!

How to Play Horror Tale Kidnapper

In this episode, your name is Tom, and you meet your friend Harry, who plans to keep you and the other kids from your neighborhood safe from the Kidnapper while you're waiting for your parents to return.

The story begins with your parents leaving you at home. Your mom leaves you a note, asking to collect eggs from the hen-house and bring them to Tom. While cycling to your meeting point, you’ll encounter the famous Kidnapper…

You'll have to find Tom and, together with him, you will fortify the tree house so the spooky Kidnapper can't get you again. On the way to your goal, puzzles, moments of fear, screams, unexpected twists and turns, and lots of fun await you!

You will experience some jump scares in this story set in rural United States during the ‘90s, but Horror Tale is rated PEGI 12, so it’s very moderate and not as violent as other titles of the same genre.

Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge is a casual multiplayer game where pretty much anything can happen. Play with other people from around the world, or with your friends in one of the many challenging yet wacky game modes.

How to Play Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge

You’ll need to wait in each game mode until enough other players are found to join you. You don’t directly interact with them, but you can get inspired by their moves.

Choose your mode:

Random Map
Colored Floor (Disco Version)
Dangerous Bridge
Escape (From Hell!)
Panic Room (Horror Movie Style)
Disco Mode

In Disco, a colorful floor awaits, but every few seconds, most of the colors disappear. If you are standing on a tile that is gone, the bouncers will fling you off the dance floor. Collect as many coins as possible while staying on the safe colors.

Dangerous Bridge Mode

Cross the bridge in various settings: a construction site, a rooftop, or an island with shark-infested waters below. One wrong move and it's game over. Make precise jumps and do not rush until you have built confidence.

Hell Mode

Start on a stone slab with molten lava flowing beneath you. Jump across other slabs while avoiding the lava unless you want to stay in hell for eternity.

Horror Movie Mode

This mode places you in a seemingly normal home, but it is anything but normal. You must find the key to escape. You have 10 seconds to search without anyone chasing you. If you take longer, a villain on a bicycle will start chasing you. If they catch you, it is game over. Interact with objects using the E key.

Random

This mode sends you to any one of the games above.

This multiplayer game is perfect for playing with players worldwide or with friends and family. Want to play with friends? Access private rooms to keep the game among familiar faces.

Tip

You’ll receive a suitcase full of daily rewards. Spin the Wheel of Fortune to see what gift you get. Gifts can include coins, dynamite, shoes with a bit of extra pep, lifelines, and more.

More Games Like This

We have plenty more games with a similar vibe in our casual collection. Try some popular games like Little Alchemy (and its sequel Little Alchemy 2), Friday Night Funkin, Sprunki, and more.

Exhibit of Sorrows is a short horror game set in a curious circus-themed exhibit. Explore this strange interactive museum, follow instructions, and don’t upset the clown!

How to Play Exhibit of Sorrows

Not all is well in the Exhibit of Sorrows. Progress through this progressively creepy exhibition and explore the strange dolls on display. Each piece of art is a puzzle, requiring interaction to reveal the keys. Be prepared to do terrible things to escape.

The dolls you'll find in this unique art showcase are:

Mr. Floaty
Mr. Washy  
Ms. Stretch
Mr. Handy

The mood gets darker and more unsettling as you progress. You will encounter the same exhibitions in disturbing new forms as you become increasingly more panicked to escape. You will have to make cruel decisions in order to leave.

Regardless of the sinister undertone to the game, there is a story to learn that will keep you gripped to the end. And the end totally depends on the choices you make during the game; there are different possible endings, so you can play this multiple times and discover the different finales.

Exhibit of Sorrows is an excellent horror game worth seeing through.

Short history of Exhibit of Sorrows

This game was developed by Maxim Tsai, known as adayofjoy on Reddit and Itch.io, in collaboration with US animation artist Theresa Kao, who is interested in exploring how animation can be adapted to macabre contexts. Exhibit of Sorrows only took four months to develop, and it is a successful example of an indie game finding a large audience.

Unsettling experience
Free to play
